name: Denni Peek
text: Great food and great service. I haven't had any issues. Consistently hot, fresh, delicious food.

name: Jason Gilbert
text: Go get a frozen pizza instead, don't waste your money at this dominos.The only good thing about this place is when it's closed.

name: Matt St. John
text: We have repeatedly had problems with this particular store.  Tonight, we tried calling from various phones for over an hour.  They didn't even bother to answer.  I would hate to know that I was too lazy or ignorant to know how to answer a phone call at a business that offers delivery.  This is the WORST dominos we have ever dealt with and we won't bother with them again.

name: Matt Qualls
text: Best costumer service ever!! Have yet to be disappointed all around!

name: Eric Wilson
text: The best buffalo chicken pizzas ever.

name: Brad Bell
text: Awesome store with great service

name: Reba Phillips
text: Great Quality Pizzas with Delicious Toppings. Crispy Base is my Favorite and they made that really good. Awesome staff always their to help. When i went inn This place was Rushed by People but they Served me my pizza in just 20min. Surely Visit again.

name: Coonass
text: Good pizza, bad location. I'd eat there again.

name: Jesse Dalton
text: Crust was outstanding. Toppings and cheese in good proportion. Sauce on the pizza was good. The marinara that came with the Calzone wasn't what I expected. It was like a cross between marinara and hot sauce. I'm not sure this was intended, but it gave a unique bite to it. All in all it was a pretty outstanding shop, they sell by the slice, so make a great lunch option.

name: Elizabeth Gardner
text: OMG I'VE BEEN EATING HERE FOR YEARS AND I'VE NEVER BEEN DISSATISFIED. THE FOOD SO AWESOME AND THE MAN THAT RUNS THE PLACE HAS GOT TO BE THE NICEST PERSON I KNOW💛💛💛💛💛 LOVE IT

name: Kierra Ealey
text: I've definitely had better calzones.

name: Matthew Holmes
text: Really? Can deliver to a motel but won't deliver to the Pilot Truck stop right up the road. Their loss.

name: Xander Felargo
text: The pizza is really good and the guy that runs the place is nice. I don't think I'll ever stop coming here.

name: jack roberts
text: I love it because they deliver close to home

name: Redd “Reddhead” Blatt
text: They won't answer the phone getting pissed

name: Ron Olsen
text:
No Delivery Today Because of Traffic?
Google Maps has 0.4 mi away Sad..

name: EverybodyKnowMe
text: Great pizza, dope crust.

name: Teresita C-Price
text: Love the wings

name: KEISHA COMBS
text: I LOVE THIS PIZZA

name: Aaron Stringer
text: This place no longer exists

name: Tiffany Posey
text: I love this place

name: Lakesha Davison
text: Great calzones

name: Chris Orange
text: Good food

name: Kim Sims
text: Now that's a pizza! Remind me of New York.

name: C. M.
text: Love the delivery service!!!

name: bluedaniel16
text: Awesome Pizza Place

name: Lawrence Edmond Jr
text: GREAT PIZZA !!!

name: Shavon “vonnieboo” Fincher
text: Food

name: Emily Johnston
text: The best meals.  Never had a morsel that wasn't delicious. And since I have an issue with portion control and over eating, this keeps me in control!

name: Chasity Lowe
text: Food portions are always perfect! The food is always fresh and flavorful! Ordering is so convenient, especially for a teacher. Coming home in the evenings, I have my plate full and do not have the time to make myself healthy meals for lunch. I always enjoy the times that I am able to order from Port City Preps because it is easy and the meals are spot on for what I need. During the pandemic when they started offering the take and bake family meals, these were also so wonderful! My family sometimes passes like ships in the night around dinner time so it was great to have something better than a bowl of cereal or a frozen pizza that we could all enjoy together without having to stay up til 8 or 9 to cook a meal. Would recommend this company to anyone! Great food! Great customer service! Great people!

name: Katie McGraw
text: I have been ordering meals for about a month and every single plate has been phenomenal! Perfect portions of delicious food.

name: Reid Smith
text: The food is incredible. The website is extremely user-friendly. I’ve never had any trouble and they are very timely and efficient with your orders definitely recommend to anyone looking to eat healthier in a much easier way than cooking when you don’t have the time.

name: Amy Rowe
text: Port City Preps is the most excellent food delivery service I've ever used. The menu is always expanding, the food is always fresh and delicious and the prices can't be beat. I seriously would spend more at a fast food joint every day but with Port City Preps, I can have HEALTHY food delivered directly to me at home or at work for a price that always fits my budget. I HIGHLY recommend Port City Preps!

name: Courtney Haupt
text: I use Port City Preps as a meal prep company for myself and gym athletes. You can trust the ingredients and all the nutrition info is easily labeled on the website and food packaging and that is something that is important to me. I have also used Port City for several catering events and the Craig has always been able to work within whatever budget I had.  Craig was also able to come up with some creative and delicious ideas that everyone at the event loved - not to mention there was always extras!

name: Samantha Catlett
text: Port City Preps catered my wedding in June 2020, they did a phenomenal job! All of our guests raved over the bacon wrapped scallops, broccoli balls, crawfish bread, and chicken kabobs! The staff was extremely professional and took excellent care of our guests. The display was beautiful. They had to overcome a venue that was entirely outdoors on a very humid summer night, they pulled off our 100 person buffet style reception without issue! I very highly recommend. You will not be disappointed and neither will your guests.

resp.text: Thank you Samantha for taking the time to leave a review of your experience, and thank you even more for letting us be apart of your special night! It was a beautiful wedding, and we were so happy to be apart of it.

name: Josh Williams
text: Their Big Mac wraps and fried rice bowls are great.

name: Alexis Dove
text: Owner and Head Chef Craig does not disappoint. He uses fresh, local ingredients to create delicious meals. From take and bake casseroles to healthy individual meal preps I’ve never had a meal that I would not reorder. The added convenience of Port City Prep’s delivery services makes ordering from them a no brainer!

name: Kristen Haring
text: I was lucky to have Port City Preps cater my wedding. The food was amazing and was everything that we envisioned. Craig was very good about staying in communication with me. They set up and cleaned up and made it one less thing for me to worry about on my big day!

name: Tristian “Willis” Grove
text: They make healthy food taste like unhealthy food if that’s what you want. The menu varieties is what keeps me using their services!!

name: Jack Morrisroe
text: We have used this business multiple times for both catering and family meal orders. The quality of the food and freshness of the ingredients make port city preps stand out. The reliable and experienced catering service brings us back as a repeat customer.

name: Jordan Barbarin
text: I absolutely love these meals, my family gets them weekly! I love the fact that they rotate the menu and are constantly adding new things. It makes it a lot easier to stay on tract. The creative spin these guys put on some of these meals is nuts, things you wouldn’t think to make at home. All around 5 stars. I do recommend!

name: Victoria Jones
text: Loveeeee Port City Preps! Been using Chef Craig’s services for over a year now. I get the weekly meal plan and hand select all of my meals for the week. The food is always fresh and delicious. When I started my weight loss journey, I was struggling with the diet part. So I began using Port City to help count calories, fat, etc and it was PIVOTAL for me! I lost so much weight thanks to his easy meal plans. I also plan on using Port City to cater my wedding! Will always highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review! We appreciate you for being a long term customer more than we can express, and we look forward to sharing your big day with you!!

name: Ellen Talbot
text: Craig is talented and his food is incredible! His presentation as a caterer is also really impressive, the total package for sure. This team would be a great choice for any event!

name: Chelsea Moore
text: My family loves PCP! Having the food delivered straight to my front door saves me so much time! The food is very fresh and taste amazing and customer service is spot on. Highly recommend!

name: mandy parker
text: Great food and just as great customer service. Makes eating healthy enjoyable AND easy with delivery. Definitely recommend!

name: Sean Phillips
text: I have tried other meal prep companies but Port City is a step above. Chef Craig's meals are next level. Keep it up guys!

name: Ellen Talbot
text: Craig is talented and his food is incredible! His presentation as a caterer is also really impressive, the total package for sure. This team would be a great choice for any event!

name: lonnie brown
text:
ive been ordering from Craig for a couple years now! The food is always fresh and juicy(grilled chicken). he's helped an on the go, really busy Dad lose 35+ lbs  by providing healthy, clean, and delicious meals :)
he got a customer for life over here!

name: Atutudes
text: Delicious healthy food, reasonably priced, and delivered. Win/Win/Win. I have thoroughly enjoyed everything I have received. Chef Craig is a gifted chef.

name: Sean Phillips
text: I have tried other meal prep companies but Port City is a step above. Chef Craig's meals are next level. Keep it up guys!

name: Jessica White
text: Delicious and healthy meals! I order on Sunday, my food for the week is delivered to my office on Monday morning. It makes eating healthier the easiest thing ever, without sacrificing tasty food!

name: Josh Williams
text: Their Big Mac wraps and fried rice bowls are great.

name: HankMardukas15
text: This place makes it easy to eat healthier. Place an order and they deliver the next day. They offer very healthy options that taste well above average. It has changed the way we eat. Very happy with service as well. They will only continue to get better as the business grows.

name: Tyler Kennedy
text: I've been buying several meals per week for over a year now, all delivered, and can't think of a single issue ever occurring. Food is great, healthy, and service is excellent.

name: Lauren Sanders
text: Incredible food & top notch customer service. It makes this ER Nurses life less chaotic when it comes to deciding what to bring for lunch & I know it’s going to taste wonderful & is healthy!!

name: Keefe Ollis
text: Great food!! Went to a wedding they catered and wow!! Ended up buying from the meal prep side of the business! Keep it up!

name: Allissa Willamor
text: This place catered my wedding and let me tell you, I was more excited to eat at my wedding than anything! They let us come in and taste different things. They cooked us up something special since I don’t eat meat and it was the best thing I’ve ever had. They were very prepared with everything and even went to the venue the day before the wedding to get a feel of the kitchen. The set up was very classy and they kept everything stocked and nicely kept. Paper plates, cutlery, and napkins were provided as well. They were very attentive and picked up plates during the reception. We didn’t even have to lift a finger. When everything was finished they cleaned up and packed up and left everything spotless like they weren’t even there. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a caterer for any event!

name: Jessica White
text: Delicious and healthy meals! I order on Sunday, my food for the week is delivered to my office on Monday morning. It makes eating healthier the easiest thing ever, without sacrificing tasty food!

name: Susan Harris
text: My absolute favorite meal prep! Delicious food, and wonderful staff!

name: lonnie brown
text:
ive been ordering from Craig for a couple years now! The food is always fresh and juicy(grilled chicken). he's helped an on the go, really busy Dad lose 35+ lbs  by providing healthy, clean, and delicious meals :)
he got a customer for life over here!

name: Marissa Hodge
text: Amazing food and you can’t beat the prices

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, and thank you for being a customer!

name: Jeremy Day
text: It has something for everyone, the variety of different food that is made is great for everyone’s taste in food.

name: Larry Onderdonk
text: Port City Preps is always fresh delicious and on time! Highly recommend!!!

name: Anthony Arnold
text: Top notch service & food is great!

name: Kyle Sweetser
text: Great company, great staff, great food!

name: XtotheY *
text: One of the premier catering companies in the Southeast!

name: Christopher LaRocca
text:
Anything less than a five star is ridiculous. This is the best pizza on the island (Sorry mama lotties, I had genuine love for you).

This is a tiny kitchen, close staff- family owned. BE PATIENT WITH THEM.

Quality ingredients, delicious thin crust pizza. You can tell it's fresh.

name: Paige Chiaro
text: This pizza place was great! They're conveniently located,  the pizza is delicious,  and their open until 11pm (though I think sign said during summer open until midnight). Several other local pizza places close by 9pm which in my opinion is way too early near the beach.

resp.text: Our summer hours we are open from 11am to 11pm Monday through Thursday, Friday and Saturday from 11am to Midnight, and Sunday Noon to 10pm.

name: Kim Parker
text: I'm not a big pizza fan but the family is. This place is awesome. I loved their veggie pizza with pepperoni. We ordered 3 times during our stay. The crust is super thin and crunchy! Very happy family from Ohio!

name: Gheymarne
text: Surfside Pizza & Ice Cream was good. Its pizza crust was quite delicious. The staff was amazing and patient. Full of suggestions and extremely bubbly. I think this place may do well in the area. The pizza sauce had a good taste. SURFSIDE PIZZA & ICE CREAM is a quality place. That's all the good stuff. I didn't like that the toppings were so much. Cheese pizza was $10.00. When adding toppings it can get quite expensive. I suggest going with a specialty pizza to avoid that. Toppings were $1.50 each. Nice environment and family friendly. Right across from parking and public beach access.

name: Justin Williams
text: This was the best pizza my family and I have ever had. They are generous with toppings and the flavor is amazing. We are here on day 3 of vacation and have had it twice. We will most likely be eating it again, too. The staff is super nice and the turn around for your order being ready is quick.  I HIGHLY recommend this place!

name: Sylvia Turner
text: Pizza was hot and fresh! Ice cream was amazing! Your staff are friendly and smiley and we all around had an amazing experience! Thanks guys!

name: Clara Baumer
text: i absolutely adored surf side pizza. the food was pretty good but what truly made my experience was a gorgeous and quirky worker. i believe her name was carolina? if you go to surf side, make sure to have her scoop your ice cream. you truly will not regret it. she’s amazing❤️‍🔥

name: King Vol
text: Pizza was great. On vacation and ate Lamberts for lunch. Just wanted smaller dinner.  This pizza hit the spot. Delivery was prompt, and driver was super nice.  A great experience while in a unknown area.  I highly recommend surf side while vacationing in gulf shores, orange beach

name: Brandon Clayton
text: Hands down the best Buffalo Chicken Pizza we’ve EVER had!!!!

name: Alicia McMilleon
text: Me and my son walked here from our condo. What a wonderful surprise!! I can tell you that we didn’t expect how good it was. We inadvertently gave them a challenge with our order but they delivered! We got a 14” with half of my sons toppings and half of mine. Two toppings on one side and four on the other, but it was cooked perfectly on both sides! It really hit the spot and got us ready to hit the beach again, with a full bully and a face full of smiles. Can’t wait to try it again!

name: Hailey Felkins
text: We ordered a large all meat pizza and garlic Parmesan wings. This is one of the only places in Gulf Shores that is open late but is delicious. The staff was super sweet it was almost time for them to close but they didn’t mind if we sat and ate at the restaurant while they closed. I highly recommend and will definitely be back on our next trip.

name: Bob Roberts
text: I was in there a couple nights ago to give the place a try. Pizza was good, place was kinda small with pretty decent beach feel to it. The employees were friendly and provided good service. I would give them a 5 star. The main reason I gave the place a 1 star is because of the manager. As we were eating one of the people in the kitchen must have made a mistake. The manager, I am guessing or maybe the owner as he was really the only adult in the place, started screaming and cussing at the staff. This in its self made an unpleasant experience and I will never return because of it. I really felt bad for the young people that work under those conditions.

resp.text:
We regret you had a negative experience.
We value our work force, and we strive to always maintain a happy kitchen.  The situation you spoke of was handled poorly.  We have used this review to educate our staff on how to communicate more proactively.  Thank you for bringing this concern to us.

name: Kristina
text: Delicious pizza, wings and ice cream!  Fast and friendly service.  Love the outdoor eating as an option.

name: Samantha Miller
text: I’d give it a -10 if i could. We are not from around here, and we’ve been at the beach all day and have small children. I made a delivery order at 6:00 on the dot and was told 45 mins. We are ONE MILE from this place. 1 hour and 15 minutes passed and still no pizza. I called at 7:15 and they said 20 minutes and it was already in route. . 45 minutes passed still no pizza…. I called and asked for a manger after two hours of wait… he was very rude, and didn’t apologize and was not informative at all… pizza showed 15 minutes later and was very cold and did not have much of a taste. HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND. Absolutely terrible customer service and experience.

resp.text: We have read your review and taken steps to address what happened.  We apologize and hope you give us another chance to win you back as a customer.  Your next pizza is on the house!

name: Micah Ermert
text: Me and my mom are on vacation and wanted a quick bit to eat. It was absolutely perfect for that. Food is fantastic and service was very very nice

name: Amanda Alviso
text: Just arrived to the beach after a 2 day drive and a family of 4 was starving. Called to get delivery and they said 45min. After an hour and 15 min I called to check on status because the kids were starving! I was told it was on its way. Within a few min it arrived ( of course) but the driver parked in the wrong condos so I had to reach across a hedge to get our pizza. It was bland and burnt on all the edges and of course the kids were disappointed! They rated it a 1 but I figured I would give it at least a 2 for effort! We will not be eating here again nor will recommend it to anyone in the future

resp.text: Sounds like a very unfortunate situation.  We strive hard to meet our delivery deadlines.  We apologize for the confusion, and we hope you will give us another try in the future.

name: Ciara
text: Had a few ice cream flavor options to pick from, nothing overly exciting. Kinda pricey at $4.50 for a scoop in a cup. The pizza was not good, it looked like cafeteria food. There was a 30 minute wait for it, but someone else in my party brought one back to our house. Glad I grabbed pizza somewhere else.

name: John Devericks
text: Awesome place for pizza and ice cream. We ate here twice on our trip and both times it was great.

name: Dat Boi COZ
text: Service was outstanding. Best chicken,bacon,ranch pizza I've ever had!

name: Kevin
text: Great Pizza! Went in one night for ice cream but the pizza smelled incredible! We went back the next night to try the pizza and it didn't disappoint!

name: Stephanie McBride
text: Don't wait in line for two hours at Pappa whatever's, this place has great pizza with no luck ng waits!

name: Hussain Noordin
text: Keep up the awesome Customer Service & Great Food! So glad to have found this place.

name: April Dutton
text: We got our pizza pretty quick and the delivery girl was very friendly and professional. I was satisfied😊

name: james boheman
text:
This place is fast.
And their pizza is awesome..

name: Crashing Dead
text: ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC!! staff were extremely nice, all homemade ingredients to! Ice cream is even better! This place is so good that the only complaint i have is the stairs being the obstacles between me and a nice beautifully made pizza

name: Cecily Gregory
text: Excellent thin crust pizza. Toppings were fresh and plentiful.  The staff was incredibly friendly.  Definitely recommend!

name: Jaymie Wickstrom
text: This was a good place to go. Normal wait time for pick up. The crust is delicious. The workers pleasant.   The pizza is thin crust so buy an extra.  We had 3 pizza for 9 people.  It wasn’t enough. 14 inch is small. Our fault not theirs.

name: Brenda Foshee
text:
Great pizza and love their ice cream!! 😋
Great friendly service 👍

name: Craig Craver
text: One of the best pizzas I have ever had.  We WILL order from here again when we are back in Gulf Shores.

name: Jason Mullikin
text: Ordered their help me ronda, absolutely fantastic. Being a New Yorker, this pizza took me home. I wish I found this place sooner, will definitely be back for the years to come

resp.text: Thumbs Up! :)

name: Nick
text: Expect crazy wait times on the weekends during prime time.  45 minute expectation set.  Took 2 hours.  From a business standpoint, a bigger kitchen or higher prices may alleviate this.

resp.text: Our wait time was crazy!  It was our first Memorial Day Weekend for our pizza place and honestly we were not prepared for that level of business.  We have revamped things and set up some new systems to speed things up in the kitchen, and to give our customers a more accurate wait time.  Hopefully, next time you visit you will be pleasantly surprised.  Thank your for your input.  We strive to be the best pizza place on the island!

name: None of your Buisness
text: This place has the best pizza I have ever ate in South Alabama

name: Lilly D
text: Delicious thin crust pizza! Extremely Fast service, our pizza was ready when we arrived even though we were a little bit early. The other pizza places we called had over a 3 hour wait. It was only 30 minutes here.

name: Mary Jane Lewis
text: Thin crust pizza is delicious! The Braided Breadsticks are amazing! Prices are reasonable. Food was ready in the time frame I was given. Employees seem very friendly.

name: Anonymous
text:
On vacation in gulf shores and just ordered pizza from here and it was TERRIBLE. We paid 60 bucks for 3 pizzas and it was the biggest waste of money. Everyone is disappointed, better off offering from dominoes. Pizza was dry, tasted like cardboard, chewy, hardly any cheese...... like I said terrible.
Save your money and don’t order pizza from here. You’re better off being hungry than going to Surfside.

resp.text: Anonymous, are you sure you have the right pizza place?  We are super generous with our cheese toppings and we use only fresh cut  ingredients and the highest quality crust.  This whole review sounds a bit dubious, and as noted, comes from an "anonymous" source.  We take the quality, freshness, and taste of our pizza very serious.  Even more important, we value our customers.  Had this person contacted us directly we would have refunded them and researched what happened to make it right.  As it stands now, we are left to defend an "anonymous" one star review that we don't even know is legit. :(

name: Amy B
text: Fabulous pizza! And the ice cream is good too! So glad they opened up close to our condo!!!

name: Colten Wilcox (Q)
text: We didn't have ice cream, however the pizza and bread sticks here were extremely delicious. The staff were incredibly nice and catering, and the seating at the building was nice, especially at night.

name: Hunter Hanson
text: BEST PIZZA EVER. From Dallas. come here every year. This place is amazing🤙🏽

name: Barbara V
text: Excellent thin crust pizza with handmade dough made daily.  Will definitely add this to our list of places to eat on our annual trip to Gulf Shores.

name: p m
text: Delicious thin crust pizza.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Ice cream was great as well.  Overall excellent experience.

name: BFPEast LLC
text:
Saw the sign when we were on a
walk. Ordered  for pick up and it was hot and ready at pick up time. Thin crust. I recommend the large kokomo and breadstick braids. Awesome people. Liked it so much we walked back for ice cream.

name: cm stokes
text: Nice, clean little spot. Very happy and friendly staff.

name: Phoenix Mann
text: Pizza and breadsticks were delicious... wonderful marinara ... super quick and staff was so nice and helpful... been twice in three days... kids loved the ice cream.  Highly recommend!!!!!

name: Jesse Ball
text: Good pizza and friendly service at a busy little place.

name: Seth fontenot
text: Excellent!!!! Pizza was awesome.  Service was awesome.  Fontenot's from Texas

name: Thomas German
text: No masks as advertised. Smallest thinnest large pizzas I've ever seen.

name: Katy Lucas
text:
Great pizza, music, and ice cream.  Great friendly staff and family atmosphere.

From happy St.Louis family

name: Ann Noblitt
text: Great pizza! Had the ham and pineapple and it was delicious. Great service.

name: Brandy Lynn Elizabeth Murray
text: It was very friendly! And pizza was the best I've ever eaten! My favorite was the chicken, bacon, and ranch pizza!

name: Barbara Vershave
text:
Pizza was delicious
Very tasty and cooked just right
We will definitely order from surf side pizza again

name: Michele Nero
text: Delicious! Fresh, quality ingredients with friendly service.

name: hannah hopkins
text: Called our food in was told it would be 30 minutes and we could come pick it up. My husband went to pick up and waited in line only to be told our order was never put in. He waited another ten minutes in the store to get the pizzas. When arriving back to the room with the food, the pizza was over cooked. We were all starving at that point but a bit disappointed.

name: J C
text: Can't speak of the pizza or ice cream. But, there were gnats flying all over the inside of the store, and they were covering many of the ice cream display covers, and on the order/check out area.

resp.text: We had a freak swarm of gnats fly through our doorway last night.  All we can figure is a down pour of rain spooked them inside.  It was a very strange and freak thing.  They never got as far as the kitchen.  We cleaned everything and dealt with the situation.  To give a 2 star review for this act of nature if kind of unfair, but I can certainly understand how the optics looked the moment it happened.

name: Mitchell Overstreet
text: Best pizza on the coast!!  You won’t be disappointed.

name: Christopher Wiley
text: Fun little corner shop with good pizza.

name: Brandon Burrows
text: Shockingly surprising good pizza for being this far south

name: Jaime Goebel
text: Great pizza and ice cream! Will definitely go back!

name: Aaron Smith
text: Great pizza! Friendly staff. Been there twice already!

name: Cameron Farms
text: Delicious and friendly folks!

name: Bruce Nickens
text: Great pizza great prices !!

name: Sara Knapp
text: Great food, Fast, nice staff.

name: Stephen Audas
text:
Been in gulf shores for seven years
Best pizza on the island

name: dalton stewart
text: Amazing pizza and amazing service.

name: Fake Laughter
text: The pizza here is delicious!

name: Greg Hall
text: Very pleasant staff and good pizza.

name: Nicholas Oliver
text: Best pizza in gulf shores

name: Nathan Gibson
text: Pizza was very good.

name: Christina Hall
text: Delicious!

name: StaticBlxgaming
text: It was great

name: Melanie Obendorfer
text: Excellent pizza!

name: Trisha Kissel
text: Yummy Pizza & Ice Cream!!

name: Jessica Rowland
text: Stopped by after hearing from a co worker how good it was and it didn't disappoint. The girl working was so sweet and very helpful. The cookies and milk was an awesome combo and super yummy. Really enjoyed my experience and will be returning.

name: Jonathan White
text: Large fresh cookies

name: Caitlin Webb
text: The cookie I had was so good! It was soft and warm and the service was great. The girl helping us was very friendly and helpful. It was also very clean inside. Will definitely be returning.

name: Mikaela Boecher
text: Oh my lord. This is the most brilliant idea ever and I'm so glad it is here in gulf shores. The cookies were amazing and warm.

name: Chandler Rigdon
text: Every cookie I ordered was super warm. I don't know if i got lucky and they were all freshly baked, but definitely will be returning. They were delicious.

name: Jennifer Jones
text: My kids enjoyed picking their cookies and ice cream for their ice cream sandwich. This will be our new regular dessert shop when we come to orange beach again!

name: [REVELATION666]
text: Revelation approved! Awesome spot, great people and those sweets are exceptional. Best part, I'm two doors away from them.

name: Maria Ayoub
text: My new favorite dessert spot!! The cookies are baked to perfection and the ice cream is phenomenal. My favorite item I tried was the deluxe cookiewich!

name: Kelly Mitchell
text: Great cookies! Loved the chocolate chip. Very friendly staff. Neat place to visit!

name: Holt Reddy
text: went here after our server at Lulu's recommended it and we are so glad we did. We will be stopping by today right before we head home. Wish we would've known about it sooner.

name: Hailey Simmons
text: Super cute place, and yummy cookies! New favorite dessert spot

name: Victoria Stinson
text: Get the ice cream cookie sandwich. It like a pizookie from bj’s but better!

name: Kelesy Woods
text: Best cookies & ice cream in gulf shores! You gotta try it.

name: Natalie Alman
text: Mr. munchies cookies are great and the staff is too

name: Emma Miller
text: Absolutely wonderful place

name: TheWrap Element
text: GA FOOD Service is by far the top food delivery and food distributor in the SE US. Helping families all the way up to institutions with all their ready made high-quality meals on time with real ingredients.

name: Gloria Chaney
text: VERY VERY POOR SERVICE.IT STARTED OFF GOOD AT FIRST.THEN MY DELIVERY DATE KEEP GETTING CHANGED WITHOUT ME KNOWING.I HAVE A EXTREMELY BUSINESS SCHEDULE BECAUSE I AM A CAREGIVER FOR MY MOTHER.SO THEREFORE I DO NOT BE AT HOME HARDLY.TAKING MY MOTHER TO AND FROM OCCUPATIONAL AND PHYSICAL THERAPIES NOT COUNTING HER DOCTORS APPOINTMENTS.IT WAS TIMES WHEN SOMETHING CAME UP AND I WOULD CALL AND LET THEM KNOW SO THAT A DRIVER WOULD NOT STOP.ONE TIME THE DRIVER DID NOT STOP. I HAD TOLD THEM DAYS IN ADVANCED THAT I WAS NOT GOING TO BE HOME HAD A TAG ON MY DOOR ANYWAY.WHAT MADE ME CANCEL FOR GOOD. ONE DAY THE MEALS WAS LEFT OUTSIDE BOXES SOAK AND WET. DRIVER DID NOT GET A VISUAL ON ME GETTING THE BOXES INSIDE MY HOME.DID NOT KNOW HOW LONG THE FOOD WAS OUT THERE WAS NOT GOING TO BRING IN AND MAKE ANYONE IN ME HOUSEHOLD SICK.LACK OF COMMUNICATION.HAD A EXTREMELY BAD EXPERIENCE WITH THIS COMPANY.IT IS SAD THAT MY MOTHER CAN NOT GET THESE SERVICES THAT SHE QUALIFY FOR.GOT TIRED OF CALLING COMPANY COMPLAINING ABOUT THE SERVICE.I REALLY HOPE NO ONE ELSE GO THRU WHAT I WENT THRU.DO NOT DESERVE A ONE STAR.

name: Shirley Smith
text: My experience with this company was horrible they say they came to my address for times and then all of a sudden then they said they came at a certain time which I was asleep at and then also the person who was delivering the food said that I had moved. I spoke with a customer service agent Keevie she could not help me so I ask to speak to a manager and was informed that she could not get a manager to me but I could have her email surprisingly the caseworker called me a minute later with the manager on the phone and also she could not accommodate me because I needed to change the date of delivery so I canceled with this company what happened to a company trying to accommodate the customer this company is good as long as you don't need any special stipulations

name: Linda Nobles
text: Good.service was good. I LIKE IT I'll  go back.

name: XneAnd Xnly
text: They don't answer the phone for nothing I can't never call and make an order

name: Ambris Bright
text: Jhonny is very awesome due to meeting him thru my fiancé cj the food is delicious and great reasonable prices great staff as well such a blessing

name: Kevin Scott
text: Johnny is great. His food is great. Little slow on answering the phone but the reason for that is he does it all. It's his personal phone he takes orders cooks and delivers. When I call he is usually driving and writes my order down. I agree on the answering phone part but once you connect with him it's never disappointing.

name: Kathleen Martinez
text:
We absolutely love this place. We order here allot. Always hot food. Always prompt service. When I say we eat here allot. I mean allot
Love this delivery place 💗

name: Kayla Harris
text: Chicken was so good 😊😊🔥 an they delivered was a plus.. this is my new wing spot. Must try !!

name: Kwan McHellon
text: Great food and amazing prices! The owner truly takes pride in what he does and always makes sure to put the customer first! If your looking for food that's cooked with love this is definitely the place to go!👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

name: Andy Dufrane
text: Hands down one of the best meals ive eaten ever.I mean it was so 👍 perfectly seasoned and cooked.

name: Michele Metcalf
text: Awesome place! I love you guys. Feed my family at a great price and delivers!!!! Food was delicious 😁

name: Tonia Cosby
text: We ordered for the first time tonight & SOOOO glad we did!! Not only were the burgers, fries, & wings AWESOME & the food hot, the customer service was GREAT, too!! We will DEFINITELY order again!!

name: Thomas Montgomery
text: Only chicken place that delivers in Huntsville. Great food, reasonably priced, fast service! I’d eat here everyday if I could....

name: Kay H
text: the wings are very good and well seasoned. I have ordered them several times from the South Parkway location and each time I have been pleased. The customer service is great and I recommend them to anyone looking for good wings at a great price

name: Yvonne Johnson
text:
Amazing fried chicken at an affordable price! This place holds a special place in my heart and in my stomach. First off, it's fried chicken; who doesn't love fried chicken?! It's also me and my fiancé favorite spot. Real down home Southern Fried Chicken & fixings!  Chicken Delivery is an Huntsville staple so if you haven’t tried it, you're missin' out, y'all! A fast food chicken restaurant that has a walk up counter or delivers to your doorstep. They also have sandwiches and baked potatoes. Last but not least, their sweet tea is amazing every time! I love this place from the tea, to the sides, to the fried chicken! Service is quick and friendly as well. Definitely a place to check out if you love fried chicken that's delicious all the way through it. It's seasoned so well. Ugh. Drooling thinking about it.
PS. They also do catering. Every event has been an absolute hit, and crowd pleaser. I will continue to use them and pass along the word of mouth advertisement. A review is the least I could do. I owe this restaurant. I got the fiancé from eating this GOODNESS to my LIPS giving me my HIPS (wink). Okay so what if I had hips before eating here. Can’t a girl dream!

name: Derrick Long
text: I would have given 5 stars but they pick and choose when to answer the phone, and this is almost every day. I know cause I order frequently. It's sad that the food is good but the service sucks due to non availability. If you can't handle being busy close your doors for good. I tip them very well so I expect them to answer the phone during business hours.

name: George Freas II
text: Best chicken tenders that you can buy!  Huge, tender, succulent pieces of chicken breaded the Southern way!  The potato wedges are excellent as well.

name: Calvin Byrd
text: Great food, and worth every penny

name: JR Rudeseal
text: 1st time ever eating here. I will be back for sure. The bacon cheeseburger is great, fries are good also. I will recommend them to anyone. Great burger!!!!

name: Lisa Cooper
text: The customer service is awesome my food was delivered before the time I was given and it was hot, fresh, and it was some of the best chicken I've had in Huntsville

name: Justin Beebe
text: Dinners has the most amazing food, as well as drivers, but I've called three times today, and no one answered any of the times. I consider myself lucky when I can get them on the phone, but I'm never certain when they will.

name: Shannon Dante
text: Always great food. Love going local, and it's more than worth the price.

name: Sara Ray
text: I have never tried their food because no one ever answers the phone, and I have tried on several occasions. Sucks because I hear the food was pretty good.

name: ricky Robles
text: I'll give them a four on answering the phone. Other than that I love their food just need someone by the phone all the time

name: Alex Floyd
text: Great food, but can’t place an order half of the time because no one answers the phone for long periods of time. I called for a whole week straight l, and still no answer.

name: Jennifer Dement
text: The chicken tenders are great but the mashed potatoes are instant potatoes and the macaroni and cheese was cooked down to mush.

name: Cindy Guerrero
text: Love their food! Reasonable prices and fast delivery!

name: giggle_vapes giggle_vapes
text: Best food love then there the only ones that deliver at night on are street

name: Kat Suarez
text: Don't get the rating twisted, this food is the best delivery food I've ever ordered, HANDS DOWN. But DAMN if they don't EVER answer the phone. I tried to order probably over 100 times back about 1-2 years ago, and just over time forgot about them because I lost hope and thought they were probably about to shut down.... Now, today, I remembered them and Googled them and was SO EXCITED that they are seemingly still open....SEEMINGLY!!!! Apparently missing out on HUNDREDS OF ORDERS FOR OVER A YEAR didn't kill their business. I'm impressed... But still incredibly pissed off that these people haven't figured out that getting orders from your customers is imperative for receiving business..... BECAUSE THEY STILL WONT ANSWER THE PHONE AND TAKE MY FREAKING ORDER. 👿

name: Aerastophaniey Moore
text: The food is great but they NEVER answer the phone. Ever.

name: Detra Colbert
text: Haven't been able to get anyone on the phone in 4yrs. I thought they was out of business. I miss their food.

name: Morgan “MoMo” Collier
text: Great food great prices all the food is well worth the cost! Delivery is prompt and he's such a nice guy!

name: Amy Jones
text: They are awesome n on point with order n condiments ....BTW the food is great and delicious....... I eat out 3x a week from here!!!! ❤❤❤❤ it

name: Nikki Johnson
text: I absolutely love this location.  They are very professional and the food is always amazing!

name: Rare Babe'
text: They are on point each and every time. With fast delivery and hot food.

name: myrobotface
text: Hands down, best chicken in town!

name: Youlunda Haygood
text: Every time I call nobody answers the phone. I used to order from them in the summer but this is the very reason I stopped. Everybody does not have a car or a way to get there.

name: THEE J-ME ALAN
text:
Ordered the chicken strips today with wings.
Chicken strips were soggy and looked under cooked. Very disappointed!! I couldn’t believe how fast they got here then I open the box..🤮💩

name: HK NoLabelxxCrew LGBTQ
text:
Giving 3⭐️'s out of 5 b/c they NEVERR answer the PHONE.....ALTHOUGH, the FOOD is 5⭐️'s all the way ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

It's 2:50 and I've been calling the number every 3-5 minutes now, for OVER AN HOUR, trying to order. I'm STARVINGGGGG!!! I had this reward of eating 10 honey money (closest thing to honey gold, but BETTER) in my head since I ate lunch there yesterday! I'm stuck at work & need them to deliver. I've even sent THREE sms alerts to the number, since it's a t-mobile number that gives that option, after it says the voicemail is FULL!!! Wtcrap?? Lunch specials end at 3:00 there 😾😡😤. #pissed #hungry #sad I didn't bring my lunch because I'd planned to eat there! #Bummer

name: Shaniqua Abrams
text: The chicken is the best!

name: Michael Smith
text: I called and they don't deliver 4 miles away. That's stupid.

name: Dontez
text: Good food, but never answer the phone

name: Saul Gòodman
text: best delivery food in Huntsville !   they do get a sad face with the whole phone thing but the folks and the food rock + very fair prices

name: Sara Farrin
text: Food is great and so is the service!

name: danielle sibila
text: I have tried on at least 10 different occasions to reach this place and have never had someone pick up the phone.

name: Stephen Rice
text: Can't ever get them to answer their phones. For a DELIVERY service. Lol. FAIL

name: Lori Mann
text: Called for 1 hour straight couldnt get a answer

name: Kareemah El-Amin
text: Never get an answer when I call.

name: Daniel Reynolds
text: Johnny is great guy

name: Lost Soul
text: Rubbery chicken

name: Tiatianna White
text: Disgusting

name: Noah Morgan
text: Good experience

name: Susan mcgriff
text: It's a cooking class

name: Michelle Owens
text: If you're thinking of ordering pizza at the Domino's Pizza in Priceville, AL, you're better off ordering from somewhere else. My first encounter with them, I placed an online order 30 minutes before closing, & was told they couldn't complete my order, even though it showed online that they could. On top of that, I was STILL charged for my order...that I never received! Yeah...I'm not even joking. I received a phone call telling me they already closed off orders or something, but that my card had been charged. I was like..."Whaaattt??!!" How can I be charged for food I never received?? I mentioned that they didn't close until midnight, & he said that was correct, but because they don't "normally" get orders that late, they had already closed off orders or whatever he said. I guess he's never heard of people that work second shift?? So, now I'm out $22.00 & no food! Beware!

resp.text:
Michelle Owens
I am very sorry to hear about your experience.  We want to make this right.  Please email us at teamdaks.customercare@gmail.com so we can look into the matter.  Please include what store you shop with, your phone number and address so we can fully address this for you.

name: Richard Shepard
text: Just an awesome place to stop on your way home from work and grab a pizza. The pizza is always hot and fresh. This place deserves 5/5.

resp.text:
Richard Shepard
We work hard to earn your 5 star and seeing your review means everything to us. Your feedback will be used in in continued training at the store level as we strive to provide a great meal and service to our community.
THANK YOU!

name: Kevin Breuers
text: Still have some kinks to work out. Ordered contact less pickup. After some time with no contact went to window.  Saw 4 workers talking at counter who could have run my pizza out.  .  Pizza toppings all slid to side because of huge pizza bubbles in crust.

resp.text:
Kevin Breuers
Thanks for choosing us and your review is very important. I apologize your experience was not at a 5 star level and I want to make things right. Can you email me at teamdaks.customercare@gmail.com when you have a moment so I know exactly what happened and how I can fix this?

name: joe voll
text: If I can put negative stars I would.  I am an over the road truck driver.  The person on the phone said that they are not aloud to deliver to my truck and that I would have to leave my truck and walk across a busy street and then wait there to get my delivery then I would have to walk back across the street with my food in hand to get back to my truck.  I always call and order when I am in a different location and it never seems to be a problem to deliver to an 18-wheeler. All the other location I have gone to in Alabama do not have a problem with.   What a waste of time to call this place or even order from them.

name: James “XDMAN” Nicholas
text:
Yard Birds Chicken Company keeps getting better and better. They changed the menu yesterday and added cheese grits and bottomless Chicken & waffles everyday! I love chicken and waffles, but the portion was big enough that I could only eat one waffle, crispy fried breast and wing. To the owner you are a man of your word when you said you would fix the problems. We have been back a 4th and 5th time and every thing was fantastic!

2nd visit maybe I just have bad luck, Stood at the door for several minutes with my wife. They were not busy and we even asked an employee if we could just sit. Someone will be with you. I want to like this place but....... a simple hey we see you would help. I would actually rate it lower but the fried chicken is good and that got them an extra star. 1st visit Ate lunch at Yard Birds Chicken Company. Today was the grand opening so I will forgive them for forgetting the jalapeño cornbread then giving me biscuits and having to ask for ranch multiple times. The chicken was excellent, They use a crumbly crust almost like you use on fried green tomatoes. And It almost seems like they smoke the chicken first then batter and fry. It was tasty and next time I will have to have the hot. Now for the bad the corn bread was cold, not just room temp but cold. If it was warm then man it would have been great. As a suggestion please please add a honey butter with the warm cornbread or biscuits and it would be perfection.

name: Chastity Webb
text: Went on a Tuesday around lunch. It wasn’t busy as there were only about 4 other tables. Waitress was nice but service was slow. Menu advertises steak fries, we received potato wedges. Not sure is that is a typo on the menu or a stock issue as their collard greens were also out of stock that day. Wouldn’t care to visit again.

name: Justin Williams
text: Went Friday night, the place had a nice crowd. Sat at the bar and ordered right away. Bartender was very nice and talkative. Food was great! Need to cook the potato wedges just a hair longer though. Will definitely be back to try the wings another day.

name: Nick Pearson
text: Best Chicken you can get in Trussville. I have eaten in twice and done Take-Out twice. Never had a bad experience and food always tastes amazing. The portions are huge and prices are just right! If you haven't tried it yet I suggest you do so!

name: Linsey Honeycutt
text: My husband and I went to Yard Birds today to try the "bottomless chicken and waffles " It was delicious! The service was great and The chicken was freshly fried and hot when delivered. He ordered the original waffle. I ordered the chocolate chip waffle. Huge portions! No way we could do seconds! We had get a to go box for our first round!! We also ordered a bourbon pecan pie to go. We have not tried it yet, but it's beautiful in its box and smells amazing! We will be back!!!

name: Katy Gibson
text: Stopped in for the weekend brunch of ENDLESS chicken n waffles ($10 each), So good! The staff was friendly and helpful. Try it you'll love it. Plus the restaurant donates a part of their profits to military and first responders.

name: Peggy Cox
text: We visited the new Yard Birds Chicken in Trussville last evening. Very nice experience. Very clean, very friendly and very good food. Prices are reasonable and service is excellent. A nice, relaxing dinner. Absolutely the best Mac and cheese I've ever had!

name: Joanna Nicholas
text: We decided to try this place again a few nights ago. I got the bourbon Sriracha popcorn chicken. It was amazing and there was more than enough for leftovers. I ate it again the next day and it was even better. We ate there again today & it was wonderful again. Service was nice and quick. I'm so glad this place worked out it's growing pains & had turned into a decent place to have lunch or dinner.

name: K Mixon
text: It was just okay.  I got the smoked chicken and it had no flavor.  The grits were extremely runny and the collard greens were not good.  The macaroni and cheese had an unique taste that my daughter did not like.  I would have given this place one star but the severs were so nice and extremely helpful.

name: Anthony Riley
text: The food was great, it deserves five stars. The service was ok, it did take a little while for our order but it wasn't too long. The only drawback for me were the prices which I thought were a little high. I will have to try here again in the near future, the food was worth the trip.

name: Mary Libb
text: Just had the best fried chicken, fried green tomatoes and homemade pimento cheese at Yardbirds. The atmosphere, servers and music were also great. Will definitely be back soon!!

name: Lauren Washington
text: First time here, service started out a little slow, but our server Alexis made up for that, she was very friendly and provided great service. I really would like to give this place 3.5 starts just because it's not quite 4. Chicken was fried well, and breast was juicy and not dry, the crust had great flavor but the meat itself didn't have much flavor, chicken should be marinated or brined to give the meat some flavor. Whole fried okra was very good. Macaroni cheese was soupy with hardly any cheese flavor, they should revamp that recipe, collard greens were like they had been sitting all day they were over cooked. My family liked the waffles. I would give it another try to try some of the other sides. I think with a few changes this place would be a go to place.

name: Halen Talley
text: Very good. I think this would be a good place to come on a Football Saturday.

name: Neal Morrow
text: Chicken was cold and tasteless. Mac and cheese was not good but did enjoy the fried green tomatoes. Also, they forgot the cornbread/buscuit.

name: Landon K
text: I had mac & cheese, fruit bowl, and 8 pc wings. It was all really good and the wings are really big.

name: Tonja Johnson
text: It was 15.00 for a small cup of Mac & Cheese, 4 small potatoe wedges and popcorn chicken. The popcorn chicken was mostly crumbs, all of the food was overcooked, and cold. Will not return

name: katie woodall
text: Great food and service!!!! We will be back for.  Chicken and waffles

name: Corey Morris
text: Came in the afternoon and no one here and still has taken them 20 + mins to bring my wings. They were no servers in sight when we entered it took at least 5 mins before they came out from the back

name: cporourke
text: Great food! Better service!

name: Neoami S
text: I did not like this place.  Chicken was done and tasted ok.  Sides (macaroni and potato salad) were the worst I've ever eaten. Cornbread was hard and horrible.  Will not be back.

name: Terrell Glass
text: Great chicken. It's a little expensive but it's worth it!

name: Jacob McElyea
text: Twisted Tenders is a Delivery only Restaurant housed within Logan’s Roadhouse. You can only order through DoorDash. They offer chicken tenders, wings, sides and desserts. I recently tried the Nashville Hot tenders and they were very hot, but amazing. I was able to cool down my palette with the Sticky Brownie Balls. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone wanting to try something different than the usual local offerings.

name: Franchesca Barber
text: sent burnt chicken, soggy mac n cheese and managed to forget all of the sauces (??) which is arguably the most important part of the meal. had a lovely first experience with them which has just sadly gone further and further downhill with every order ://

name: Jason Brandom
text: I thought the tenders themselves had a very good flavor. I ordered 4 sauces and got 3. The sauces were not good what I got. The only sauce I know I got for sure was the bbq sauce. Not sure what the other 2 sauces were.

name: Michael Leming
text: Legit got food poisoning. Food was delivered by subpar service. Tenders were weirdly small and sauces were too watery for a chicken tender. Food wasn’t sealed , I should of known better but I ate a couple anyways and now I’m sick. Avoid this place at all costs.

name: Brian Brauer
text: Sent burnt chicken, sauces were wrong and no waffle fries. Get it together.

name: Amanda Reese
text: My new favorite restaurant in Enterprise! Healthiest breakfast options around and sooo delicious! Friendly service, great food, & fair prices, what more could you want!? So far, I've had the "ABC"(it's a wrap) & a chicken protein bowl(breakfast) and both were wonderful! Can't wait to go again!!

name: Maggie Haas
text: I have not eaten there yet .... but love the atmosphere, owners, and unique menu! The milkshakes and dessert display are irresistible! Thank you for joining the Enterprise Chamber of Commerce!

name: sarah babski
text:
Small Town, but fun to see.
Excellent mix of thrift stores and Antique stores. Never know what you will find. Fun, fun.
Go to gas station has excellent southern food. Serves breakfast and lunch. Opens at six am and hopefully doesn't run out of food until around two o'clock.
Lots of small towns around Enterprise to see also.
Have fun and enjoy yourself ☺

name: Shannon McNabb
text: Been here twice and plan to go many more times. The food and service has been impeccable each time. There was space for a group of us to enjoy lunch. I would recommend giving gift certificates for Mimi K's. I know I would be  excited to receive this treat!

name: T Kidd
text: Amazing southern cooking!

name: JBH_MarineBoy XDD
text: It was the very BEST!!!!!

name: George Webster
text: Awesome atmosphere and even better food! The portions are large so you definitely won’t walk away hungry.

name: Dee Marie
text: Fast reliable service. A real cool lady who knows her business and clients. I'm a fan!

name: B J HAYS
text: Best Speciality Menu and food in the area!! Order early or you've missed out!

name: Susan Farr
text: Love the food and service.

name: Alexis Bell
text: Gave us the wrong size pizzas and then made us pay for another one even though that wasnt what we ordered. Pizza Pro has been good but now its gone to not even a whole star. Pay attention to customers and do better

name: Bajay Dase
text: The pizza is okay its not anything to get excited about. The place could be cleaner. The attitudes from the owner and staff could use some major improvements.

name: E&C Cattle Ranch
text: Great experience from start to finish, we called in our order, the person we reached was courteous and professional. Our pizza was cooked perfectly, and the cheese sticks were delicious. The facility was extremely clean and well maintained. Thank you to the Owners and Management, job well done.

name: Kenneth B
text: Was good pizza but they are closed!!!!!

name: wolvey951
text: I love the pizza here. 😁

name: DJ DJ
text: Bad experience from this place, 2 pizzas and 2 drinks. 40$ really? Plus the pizza was put together poorly and it was cold after the 20minites deliver turned into 45 minutes. I'm glad Domino's is here in Brewton now. Mich better prices there and the staff at Domino's cares about how they make a pizza.

name: Peter Panning
text: Best pievin Brewton.

name: *Shakin’ It Up With Shana H
text: I had been ordering food for delivery for quite some time. The one time I had a complaint because my pizza was delivered cold, I had the most horrible experience. I called and asked for the manager. I was very polite and told him my problem. He had the nerve to argue with me and say my food wasn’t cold. I remained calm and asked if they would redo my order that I would be more than happy to bring the cold food back. Only one slice had been bitten because it was not hot. He said no, they would not redo my order. I tried to talk to him reasonably but he simply said we can come get it and just not charge you. At this point, I had gotten mad. Just getting off work and being hungry doesn’t mix. Thankfully for him, I held my composure and merely hung up. They never have to worry about me nor any family members giving them any of our business again. Besides, the pizza isn’t good enough for their prices!!

name: Barney Moore
text: Amazing food, the place could be cleaner though. Overall pretty damn good, highly recommend the Stromboli!

name: JB Backwoods
text: The only thing better than pizza is pizza that's delivered to you for movie night in with the fam!!! The drivers are nice. (Only carries change for $20's)

name: Mildred Windham
text: Only reason I’m giving one star is because you can’t give 0. Our apartment complex has 6 apartments, but apparently they don’t keep them separated in their system. Tried to order pizza for pickup and got told they wouldn’t serve me because we owed over $100 for bounced checks. We don’t even own checks and have never paid for them. Spoke to the owner who proceeded to yell and say the DA’s office had the checks and he wanted his money. The name he gave for the bounced checks belongs to no one in our household, and dates back before we even moved in. Showed two forms of ID and he still wouldn’t serve us. Whatever. That establishment deserves none of your hard earned money. I’d honestly rather go to Pizza Hut and deal with the inevitable food poisoning.

name: A. “Stitch Boss” Morris
text: Good pizza. Buffet during lunch weekdays. Mostly a carryout or delivery business but eat in available.

name: Carl Bartholomew
text: Pizza pro is the place to be for the best pizza in Brewton. The pizza is out of this world. The stromboli is just as good. If you want a good sub, thay have the best. All around good restaurant.

name: JusMsMia JusMsMia
text: The owner is Very Rude! I ordered over the phone for delivery. The person that took the order said 20-25 minutes, the kids and I realized after about 45minutes the delivery still wasn't here so I called he told me that the person did not say 20-25 minutes and that I was lien. He also said It had not been a hour. That the driver was on the way. Then said that he'll tell the driver to bring the order back and cancel my credit card. I was calling to see how much longer it was going to be. Very Rude!

name: oliver pugh
text: The only reason they stay in business is because they are the only pizza place in brewton that delivers

name: Jessica Mims
text: Quick delivery and delicious pizza!!

name: Amanda Blackwell
text: Small and a quick in and out

name: Mary Jay
text: Hated it. Its dirty the staff is slow and play on their phones the whole time. Kinda stinks. Then the worse part is the menu..the pizza we got...after we received the wrong order, tasted like spoiled sardines on top of cardboard. Breadsticks were ok but looked homemade. And the cinnamon sticks were burnt!

name: Luther Peebles
text:
You was walk in and sit down, after awhile you go to the counter in the back of the place and find out your supposed to order there.
We ordered a thin crust with 2x pepperoni and ham.  It was hard to find a pepperoni!
That said, we did get a sausage hand tossed that was ok.

name: Jason Sharitt
text:
Used the app to place an order at 6:44 Saturday evening from a house party. Socialized with friends for a while and saw two missed calls a few minutes later at 6:53. No voicemails but I figured it had to be Domino’s so I called back. Waited for 10 minutes and no one picked up. App said pizza was being delivered. Called back at 7:26 to see where food was. Finally got someone on the phone. The gentleman said he tried calling twice to tell me there were no delivery drivers available. But he could’ve left a voicemail for that! Why did I have to try and call him back for that information? At this point we’re all hungry and now the guests are upset.

So a few things here:
1. The app shouldn’t show my food is being delivered when it hasn’t even been made.
2. I shouldn’t have been able to order delivery if the location doesn’t offer it.
3. The employee should have left a voicemail with the information and not wasted my time trying to call back for it.

So be careful using this location. The communication is very poor. Call ahead of time to see if they can deliver. Don’t use the app.

EDIT: Bumping up a star since the manager called me to explain the situation and obviously wants to make things right. I may give this location another try since it seems I caught them in a perfect storm of "things going wrong", and being a former restaurant worker myself, I can sympathize.

My order was flagged for review since it was associated to an address that has been linked to multiple phone numbers. This is a national Domino's corporate policy to keep tabs on potential sketchy orders.

Domino's corporate always expects their franchisees to have delivery drivers, and never anticipates a scenario where a given store has no delivery drivers show up for work. So don't expect the app design to improve, and I can't fault this location for that.

Domino's typically doesn't leave voicemails as they prefer to talk about potential order problems in person, and in my case, try to present an offer for me to pick up the pizza myself. Even so, we'll agree to disagree as the voicemail could have said "We have no delivery drivers for tonight. Please call us back by X time if you still want the order and can arrange to have it picked up."

resp.text: Our team appreciates your review and feedback. We apologize for not earning a 5-star review from you and want you to know we will be working hard to earn your 5-star review from you. Thank you and have a great day, Jason!

That much was understandable since I know people are having a hard time finding workers. After I called to check on my pizza, she said I needed to place my order again online since she couldn’t apply my coupon over the phone. She told me they now had a driver, and it would be delivered. I order my pizza again and the tracker says it has been delivered. 30 minutes later- still no pizza. I was left on hold for 20 minutes or so and called back several times with no answer. I love dominos, but I hate to say I won’t be ordering from this store anymore. Save your money!!

Edit: Updating from 1 to 3 stars because the very kind manager, Samantha, called and apologized for the mix up and refunded me for my order!

text: Horrible customer service.

name: ILLUMINATED 911
text: Order often out of convenience.. food is rarely ever delivered in less than hour.. oftentimes takes upwards of two hours.. other delivery services will communicate or even apologize for the wait but dapper doesn’t seem to care. There’s  one driver in particular that never delivers on time I think he doubles as an Uber driver at the same time

name: Rebecca Seymour
text: We asked our driver to dance for us to help brighten our rough day. When she arrived she got her baby out and proceeded to dance with her baby! Her name was Samantha. She was phenomenal.

name: Ashley callender
text: Our delivery guy Joe had EXCELLENT customer service skills! Our food was on time and hot and everything was correct! We will be using this delivery service again and hope Joe is our guy again!

name: Joe Neal
text:
Only service in town that will go back to the restaurant to fix something instead of just refunding you for incorrect items, and making you place an entire new order.

They truthfully care about their customers and even though  wait times can reach an hour+ on busy nights, this company offers something the national brands won’t.

name: Kayla D
text: If the delivery drivers even bother to find your door and bring the food to you, beware half of it will be missing and they will add their own tips.

name: Roneika Smiley
text: I started using them and they were ok at first but now they are horrible and on top of it I believe some of the drivers tampering with food it’s plenty of time I have  question my food because it doesn’t be packaged well with them and on top of it you literally wait a hour plus on the simplest things this why I try my best to use door dash

name: TheChowington
text:
I’ve used Dapper for the past year, mostly at work- and a few times at home. They’ve impressed me *maybe* 4 to 5 times. I use the word ‘impressed’ very loosely , meaning they showed up on time , or close to it, and actually got my order right.
They’ve forgotten food, drinks, handed me a bag with spilled food inside of it...
Their website is not an accurate representation of the actual food menus, or hours, from restaurants.
I’ve ordered lunch for staff and clients. When the food never arrived I called dapper. They told me that restaurant was closed for the day and they meant to call to tell me but forgot. This has happened more than twice.
If they are having trouble locating your address they do not call you for accurate directions , they instead drive around aimlessly until you realize your food is over an hour late and you have to google their phone number and call yourself.
There is no “making it right” when they mess up. You are basically just told “sorry”.
I’ve waisted too much money on this delivery service and will NEVER use it again.
Like I said, out of over 50 orders I’ve placed- *maybe* 5 of them were as they should be.
Use Uber eats or get the food yourself from the restaurant.
👎🏼👎🏼
Two thumbs WAY down.

name: Jean Elder
text: I used Dapper Deliveries today and they are AWESOME.  I called from Birmingham, AL needing food picked from Publix and delivered to a home address for a Funeral in Mobile.  Our delivery driver texted me while in Publix and made sure everything was what we needed. He went above and beyond the call to make sure everything was purchased and delivered on time.  I would  highly recommend using Dapper Deliveries.  They are doing a great job.  Thank you for helping me.

name: Evan Deerman
text:
Website looks great, easy to navigate and the food arrived on time.
Will be using their services again.

name: Sierra Killeen
text: I ordered through dapper deliveries tonight and my deliverer was Ruth. She is so sweet and kind!!  The food was great and arrived within a reasonable time! Will definitely order through dapper deliveries again in the future!

name: Cap'n Hands
text: Usually use these guys when I have to work a longer shift at work and forgot to bring food. I typically order something from the mellow mushroom across town. Gets here pretty fast and great for the price.

name: Waite Law
text: I always try and use these local guys when I can and we've always had a great experience.  Drivers are very friendly and they keep us informed about any delays, etc (although rarely have any).   Very much recommend

name: Ricky Dearmon
text: I have used Dapper Delivery about 15 times. I have been pleased with about 10/15 times however I have chalked it up to being because I live out further than most but in delivery area so I never complained. Today was different. The driver called looking for my home. Wrong order, but meant that she had my order as well or she had to drive back to restaurant. Food was cold. There service is quite costly. So I called to try and understand especially after driver had called me over a half hour before my food was delivered looking for my home. They feel they provided the service correctly because it got here within an hour- or did it? They really didn’t care. Which shows me that the 1/3 of the time I had issues they wouldn’t have cared. So to prevent any further issues I will no longer use the service. Use at your own Risk

name: Rose Rogers
text: Had an “oops” with my order. I was contacted personally by management and everything was straightened out. I appreciate customer service and obviously so does Dapper Delivery!

name: Hannah Lewis
text:
If your about to place an order... just don’t... I have used them for well over a year. Half of the time the show up close to your estimated time... the other half of the time they show up 30min to an hour late.

Unprofessional and unreliable😳 just get the food yourself and save the fees.

name: Mix DaSoul
text: This was a great delivery service until, I believe his name was Alex, sold/left the company. Now a man child named Nick owns the company. He has no regard for his customers and employees. My food was 30 late and when I called I was told "It'll get there when it does, We are busy" Where I come from, Where EVERYONE comes from, This is not how you run  business. I have watched them lose restaurant after restaurant over the last few months due to the lack of quality leadership and management within the company. It's a wonder that they are still up and running. I don't wish for anyone to fail in this world, but perhaps the owner will realize that his attitude and management abilities need to be remedied. It truly is a shame that a quality business 2 years ago gets flushed down the toilet by a frat boy who has no business owning a business. If changes don't happen I give this one year before Nick destroys it.

name: ryan brown
text: The last 3 times I orderd through dapper delivery my order was wrong and there solution is to refund my money and not correct the mistake so now I have to wait days to get my money back on my card and have to use a different delivery service after waiting an hour for my food without so much as a sorry.. just found out I was lied to by the owner/customer service about why my order was wrong after talking to firehouse this so called business is run by a liar who doesn't care about his customers only money

name: Elliott Jones
text: Maybe different for everyone. But I’ve ordered at least 5 meals from then. And every single one has been later than their initial predicted time. Now most of the time I would let this slide. But when it’s consistently between 30-60 min later than predicted by the app I get suspicious. In other words don’t rely on their algorithm to bring you your food on time.

name: Will
text: The manager from this app was incredibly rude and is not helpful whatsoever even if your card was charged by someone else without your consent. I highly recommend Waitr or simply using the restaurant delivery service instead.

name: Amanda McIlwain
text: What a great service to use. Fast and friendly delivery drivers.

name: Carlotta Arradondo
text: Wonderful service!! Thanks for all you do!

name: Charles Boles
text: Deonte delivered our food tonight and we couldn’t have been happier. We ordered calzones from a place about 15 minutes away, and the food arrived FRESH & HOT. Deonte was very friendly which is always a relief! Thank you!

name: Shaun Davis
text: Do NOT order from them. Use Doordash or go to the restaurant yourself unless you like waiting 2 hours for cold food.

name: Aaron Williams
text: This is my favorite delivery service on the coast, I have watched this company grow over the years and they serviced the coast way before their competitors. The owner is a great guy and this is my go-to service on the AL Gulf Coast.

name: Antoine Kennedy
text: I didn't tip and I didn't intend to but a tip was charged to my card a full day AFTER the delivery.  This company took money from me without my permission and that's stealing and I will be reporting this to the better business bureau

name: Trent Moore
text: I initially went to Waitr who took an hour to accept it and gave me no way to contact them to ask what was up with my order, so I cancelled it and went to Dapper Deliveries. The restaurant in question refused to fulfill the order since they made it and Waitr never came to pick it up, they and made sure to take care of everything at a different location. This will be my new go-to for food delivery services after the issues I had with the other ones.

name: Brooks DoughtyWalton
text: We order every Monday from Ollies, and Every time something goes wrong. Either a container of soup is crushed or they totally leave out an item. For a family of 3, our order at least $59 including delivery fee and tip. I’m not sure if it’s more Dapper Deliveries fault or Ollies. The delivery drivers should check the order before they leave the restaurant. Both Ollies and Dapper Deliveries are about to lose a loyal customer!

name: Gerolf
text: stay away, spent 33 (not including delivery charge) dollars on what is essentially a 12" pizza because i got none of the other things i ordered, i mean i understand that its also the restaurant i ordered from (Trattoria Pizza) but you would have thought someone would have at least checked the ticket......

text: I have used this service several times now and have been very pleased. Pricing is quite fair and deliveries have been on time and as promised. Delivery people have been very pleasant. I will continue to use them!

Instead of him giving me my change 1st he asks me how much do u expect back drivers get paid by tips...I felt that was very rude!! All he had to do was give me my change n I would've given him what I wanted him to have👌🏾So I'm not sure if I'll be using the services anymore..

name: Erin Drain
text: I placed an order for my food and received a confirmation email at 2:06pm with an estimated delivery time between 2:46 - 3:01pm. My driver, Stephen, didn't even arrive at the restaurant until 3:18 (well after the estimated time). My food was delivered at 3:36pm and was cold, as expected. No explanation from the driver and no apology, in fact he said nothing. Lesson learned and won't use Dapper Deliveries anymore.

name: Ashton Harvison
text: Ordered from this delivery service it had been quite some time and no update as to when my food would be delivered. I called the restaurant they stated the food has been ready for 20, I called the delivery company they said the restaurant hadn't notified them it was ready. Needless to say when my food arrived it was freezing cold. This went back and forth I called Monday to speak with someone left a voicemail and never got a call back, I called back on Tuesday and spoke with Dustin who advised me the boss would be in at 3. I called back again spoke with the so called boss who only wanted to offer a credit, he advised if i had a problem I could call my bank and say it was a fraudulent charge. I asked what he was going to do and he said he would call the bank I asked if he would call me back he said if I didn't hear back to call on Thursday. I did so spoke with someone named Justin who advised he would once again call the Boss and get him to return my call. Needless to say again never heard back. Will not use this delivery service or recommend them to anyone.

name: JULIA Federle
text: This is a great company!  They are professional, friendly and the service is quick.  There is so much to choose from and the food is just right when it's delivered.

name: Celeste Hayes

I have used several food delivery companies and find that Dapper Delivery seems to get it just right every time.
The drivers are here ahead of schedule, service is great and I LOVE the fact that I have such a variety of restaurants to choose from. Keep up the good work and you'll always have a loyal customer in me!

DESERVE EVEN LESS THAN A STAR NO CUSTOMER SATISFACTION

text: driver took my order to the wrong house stating they were so sure it was the right one after i waited for forever for my food. didn’t even call to check. i was going to have my order remade but jersey mikes closed not long after. supposedly got a refund, but definitely am not trusting again even after being given a 25% off my order. ill stick to door dash or waitr next time.
