name: Adrienne Eady
text: Good service! Also love that I can pay with cash.

name: Cheryl Nicholls
text:
UPDATE; 9/14/19:
As of today I still have not received a phone call from the owner.  I called and left messages TWICE! I have never in all my life seen such unprofessional service.  Mugshots just informed me that they are no longer using Dapper Deliveries and I don't blame them!

For those of you who follow me you know I have NEVER posted a rant about anything on my page but I am so frustrated with #Dapperdeliveries here in Mobile I could scream!  Here's the backstory:

Two weeks ago this coming Friday I ordered food through Dapper Deliveries at 6:32pm.  I received a confirmation that I could expect to receive my food within an hour. Well, at 7:45 I hadn't even received an email telling me that the driver had arrived at the restaurant.  I called the restaurant and was told my order had been sitting there for 20 minutes and they couldn't even get the driver to answer the phone.  The employee said she would keep trying.  She offered to remake my meal.  I thanked her and hung up.

At this point I called Dapper Deliveries myself.  I couldn't believe it when I received a message stating the call couldn't be completed!  I must have called that number 8 times!  At 8:10 the restaurant calls me back to tell me the driver had finally showed up and wanted to argue with her like it was the restaurants' fault.  The stupid driver arrives at my house at nearly 8:30!!!  TWO HOURS after I placed my order.  You know I was livid when I answered the door.  The fool stands there trying to argue with me too! I snatched the bag and slammed the door.  Anybody how knows me well, knows that is so completely out of character for me.

Part III
I open the food boxes and of course the food is stone cold! By now I'm ready to just go berserk!  I call the restaurant back to ask why my food is cold if they remade it.  The manager tells me that they had a very large party and to remake my food would have taken another hour.  I told her that wasn't an acceptable answer.  She offered to make it right and said the next time I was in the area they would provide a complimentary meal. Done. Great customer service!  Well done Mugshots!

Part 4
I call Dapper Deliveries the next day and ask to speak with the manager. I explained what happened and he says, "I heard and I've issued a credit for $10."  At first I was like, "Huh?" No! I want every dime of my money back including tax, tip and delivery fee.  He agreed to issue a credit.  I checked my bank account 4-5 days later and didn't see the credit so I call again.  This time I'm told they don't give you your money back per se. They give you a store credit.  At this point I asked to speak with the owner because this has just escalated to asinine!  The manager said he would ask the owner to call me.  That was last Wednesday or Thursday.  Guess what?  Nope. Still no call from the owner as of this writing and thus this post.  I tried my best not to call em out publicly but Dapper Deliveries, you brought this public shaming on yourself.  I will NEVER patronize your business again.

Signed,
One unhappy ex-customer

name: nick sofge
text: I use all the time good food right to my door. Thanks

name: Roblox girl
text: My food was cold and I had to put it in my microwave 😭

name: Stephanie Morgan
text: I ordered dinner for my family Friday night and it took them 2 hours to deliver it.  When we finally got our food it was cold and incorrect.  I will give them the benefit of the doubt, the  weather was nasty but they should at least call and let you know!

name: Amanda Good
text: Excellent, timely service!

name: Sandy Jones
text: Common sense is necessary to read and base your opinion of a company on reviews alone. Not only do I see total extremes for reviews on google for dapper 5 or 1. Few in betweens. This shud tell folks that there are 2 kinds of people, lifters, and leaners, Or positive and negative. I have worked with Dapper 10 months. After working for waitr (which I'm in a lawsuit against for unfair treatment) & port city, which owes me over  $400. And 5 months into my employment I secured a job paying over 150k per yr. My employer insisted I quit my job at dapper, as it is not necessary. However I refused, and continue to work here today because of their honorability, non judgemental, or racist attitude and wages for all, from a young group, who would hold the door for and older crowd. We aren't talking about a pizza joint that guarentees ur pizza in 30mins within a 5 mile radius folks. And we wouldn't have a job if we we're bad people. If ur rural, noone else even delivers there most likely. But they don't leave those folks out either. Everyone has bad days, but it does not supersede the honorability and integrity of the best and truly original delivery service of dapper delivery. So I wish I could give them 10 stars, not just 5. God bless us all. Just sayin

text: Dapper is a great place to work if you're looking to make some extra money and have a car

text:
Y’all might want to consider y’alls employee “Laura” in the Daphne Location...

text: Only 2 stars. Food was good but gave us no utensils or plates or anything and was ridiculously high in price

name: Jeff Risher
text: Probably the first and last time I use this overpriced, poorly run service. Driver failed to deliver the complete order. The business called back and said too bad it's getting late (945 on Friday). They'll refund me for the missing items in about a week (I'll hold my breath), but still being charged for the failed delivery and the tip that they extort from you before the service is performed.

name: Zina Jones
text: I am very dissatisfied with them my order was cancelled on Jan 5 it's been almost a week I hav got lie to about my refund so to today they going send me & email talking bout to transaction has been decline & that the card was reported loss r stolen and that the send the money bac to my bank that's a lie also so I will c them in court it's not about the money it's principle so if u use your debt card please b careful with DAPPER DILVER

resp.text: Sorry that you are experiencing a problem. I see that you are not in agreement with how our credit card processing provider has reported your transaction. I contacted them to see if their report of your transaction is accurate. This type of issue is extremely rare. We have to use a banking institution to process credit cards which sometimes puts us in the middle but we always try our best to resolve issues quickly. I will monitor your situation to see that any communication from the bank is forwarded to you promptly.

name: C. Elynn
text:
Update 3/21/18: I no longer use dapper deliveries. consistently, drivers are late & there are issues with orders. On top of that, their fees are completely out of hand! Not only do they pad the prices on menu items (which all of the other services do as well, so that not the big issue), they also pad the tax amount due (when your meal cost $15 and you $3 in taxes), and a processing fee, in addition to the delivery fee.... by the time you get to checkout, a $15 cost you almost $30, not including tip! For the poor service & high cost, it's just not worth it at all. I now exclusively use waitr/port city.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I've been using Dapper Deliveries for almost 2 months now. When I first started using them, I absolutely loved it! The ability to order delivery from local places I love and places I'd never heard of was amazing. The delivery fee is very reasonable at $2.99 vs. waitr's $5.00. Another thing I really love is that they don't restrict you based on "delivery area" like the waitr app, this is a major PLUS!

With all of those great qualities, it saddens me to say that I've noticed a decline in service. I can order something not far from my house, and it'll take an hour to get here. A few times, my food came spilled all over the bag. Once I ordered from an non-franchised restaurant  (meaning there was only 1 of its kind) and the driver ended up a completely different place and didn't even know it until i called over an hour later... During that instance, the manager & owners were very courteous and understanding.

In addition, I also feel like there is room for improvement on their app. For example, I know at the office, they can see where the drivers are through gps, I think it would be great if the customer could too, like at some pizza places. Also I think a rating system would be great to give feedback on drivers. 8 out 10 drivers I've had, we're amazing, but those other 2...

Will I use Dapper Deliveries again? Yes, in the future. It's a relatively new company so there's expected to be some growing pains. I will, however, be taking step back for awhile, and hopefully they will get it back to the well oiled machine I love.

name: Chris C
text:
Worst service ever.  Called to complain and they hung up on me.
No way to send them emails, no way to report issues.  Never again!

Could you please email me at support@dapperdeliveries.com  with your order information so I can take a look at your order to see how we can make this right for you ~Thanks Kevin

name: victor huenchullan
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent availability

(Original)
Excelente disponibilidad

name: Casey Pridgen
text: Bubba's catered my wedding this weekend and I cannot say enough good things. Not only was the food amazing, the service was top notch. I truly felt like royalty. The servers came outside when we were taking pictures and asked everyone if they would like something to drink and came back with armloads of refreshments. Truly caring and professional people and far exceeded my expectations. My guests were all talking the next day about now amazing the caterer was! I would definitely recommend them to everyone.

name: Demetreus Taft
text: Bubba's catered our wedding 10/10/2020 and it was more than we expected! The food was beyond amazing..all of our guests were blown away. They even made sure that the groom and I had food to go. No complaints and I would definitely reccomend them to anyone!

name: Zach and Sam Tyler
text: Our wedding happened in the middle of the COVID-19 pandemic, which ultimately meant going from a 200-person wedding to a 20-person wedding. The team was so accommodating and helped us reimagine a menu that ended up so delicious. I can’t tell you enough about how wonderful our barbecue, mac n’ cheese, potatoes and fruit tasted. On top of that, Stephanie took extra precautions to make sure everyone stayed safe and well fed. I highly recommend.

name: Alison Chatham
text: Prep for the wedding and everything was great. Ray was a great coordinator and really helped us out a ton when understanding what we need for our wedding. I unfortunately have to lower the rating because two specific members of the staff were incredibly rude to us, especially my husband on our wedding day. They forgot to bring out our champagne for all 150 of our guests for the toast. They didn't have any of the cake ready for the guests, we had to awkwardly stand there with no cake for the guests. After both of those occurrences, one of the rude staff members pulled my husband aside and yelled at him for having a terribly scheduled wedding, even though we gave the staff the schedule for weeks early, which we followed. The bartender was very kind, but there were several times where the bar was left unattended and I was having to wait there with a ton of guests to get a drink.  There even came a point where the drinks were left for guests to grab themselves, and some of our guests were taking whole wine bottles... which didnt seem compliant with ABC rules. They did clean up very nicely though, which was very kind since we had to clean up the venue ourselves afterwards.

name: Janet Moore
text: 5-Star all the way!  Bubba's catered our daughter's wedding reception and everything went off without a hitch!  Professionals in every sense of the word; from our first meeting all the way through clean-up.  The food was wonderful and perfect.  We could not be more pleased with Bubba and his team.  A million thanks for absolutely everything you all did!

name: Kyle Hamilton
text: These guys work for you. I've used them for 2 events personally and was extended every curteousy an owner would enjoy. Their venue could use a little updating, but their personnel make up for it. I would recommend these guys to anyone looking to have almost any event catered.

name: Bob Stell
text: Large wedding - everything went perfectly.  Food excellent. Setup and cleanup no problems.  Good job!

name: Melinda Maxwell
text: Bubba recently did our daughter’s wedding.  As always, the food was wonderful and the service great.  Bubba and Josh go the extra mile to please their customers.  I have never seen a more hardworking, customer service oriented caterer.  The food display was also beautiful.  I would highly recommend them for any catering event.

name: David Phillips
text: If I could give negative stars to this caterer I would. I attended a wedding that Silver Spoon worked and the food was suitable only for a prison population and maybe farm animals. The roast beef was pathetic. It resembled cheap deli meat with canned brown gravy poured over the top. The chicken tasted rubbery and was dripping water. The salad was ok (if you like zero nutrition iceberg lettuce) but I'm almost certain they used Kraft store bought dressing. Hello!!! This is someone's wedding reception. Do you have no respect for your work? The food was completely unacceptable. I pray that the parents of the bride got a full refund.

name: Jamie Dodson
text: Great food, wonderful service and competitive pricing. Easy to work with, attentive to our details, and very friendly. Bubba's food was nothing short phenomenal!  Never had better Mac and Cheese or Chicken. The Pork was to die for as were the Brownies. We'll use him again for our next wedding.

name: Ninaplease
text: BEST SERVICE AND FOOD EVER! they catered my wedding and everyone was amazed how good the food is!

name: kay sanders
text: We  had them cater our daughters wedding. We started a year in advance so we could save and get a good idea of cost. They told no need for this just come a couple of days before. Not very comfortable waiting so close I called and confirmed a month prier still trying to get a price. Two weeks before set up meeting to talk. They seemed put off by this but did it. Talked to Ray gave him our totals. He told us his likes such as guess would appreciate tubs of bottle water iced down sitting around sounded good we bought bottle water. He said bottle beer was better less waste so we went that way. He is the professional.  Still no price was set.  Going to e mail it ?  Then he said bring your stuff down two days before anything you dont want to mess with. They really dont mean that. we showed up it was like they had never done it before. We should have set up night before staff was lost.  They were suppose to chill wine and beer all was hot. They had no ice for tea cokes drinks ??? Food was good not sure why they stopped serving before all was feed. We found bags of food in kitchen left. Then the food staff was gone. The bar staff was great trying to deal  food staff was slow but did ok. Left oven on  found that. oh did I mention There was no Ray or Bubba ?? And NO ICE BROUGHT! This is what 3000 got us.

name: Harvey Trussell
text: Great food .And great people.

name: Susan Towry
text: Great chef

name: Tristan Waldrop
text: I found it odd how everyone on the clock, when I ordered, must have been new hirees. Otherwise, I couldn’t explain how I had to return to the counter twice to remind them of my order. They turned what should have been a five-minute process into a 30+ min waste of my time.

resp.text: Tristan, thank you so much for bringing this to our attention. We seek to provide a positive and prompt guest experience at our store, and we apologize for missing the mark on your visit. We will address this with our team in order to find a way to improve for your next visit. If you want to share more details, please email us here: guestfeedback@smoothieking.com

resp.text: Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We're so thrilled that we were able to blend your perfect smoothie. Come see us again soon!

text: Very rude customer service! I called them to order my food and i got it ordered and then i asked what time it would be done by and they were very rude and so i just said ok thanks and then hung up. I called again to see how much it is and they answered and then once i said my name about my order they hung up on me. then when they delivered it they charged me $40 for it when really it was $24.00

name: Ashley Crim- Smith
text: Best place in downtown Prattville!!! They've got AMAZING pre-cooked dinners/casseroles that are so easy for quick dinners. And the BEST chicken salad ever!!! ... The boutique and antique shop inside have cute and unique items, highly recommend this place to anyone!!

name: Shelley Kim
text:
I don’t get a chance to get to Prattville that often, but when I do, I make sure to stop by here to purchase some casseroles and soups.

Connie, the owner, is a real sweetheart and very much involved in her business, always there to greet with you with a smile and help you out.  I think it’s so important to support your local mom and pop stores, while benefiting from food that is lovingly home made.  You can’t go wrong!

name: Hannah Barnes
text: I bought a squash casserole, a container of chicken salad and a container of pimento cheese. I went home and made lunch out of the pimento cheese and the chicken salad and it was wonderful, wow it was so delicious. I will be having the squash casserole for dinner tonight. 😀

name: Marissa Wiles
text: Very disappointed in this store. Went in with my husband today to look around. Was trying to just find some cute jewelry. Unfortunately, we were subjected to a soap opera from the "manager" behind the counter and her friend in the store. We got to hear all about how the gentleman in her life was still talking to his ex and she would beat his a**. This is not professional for a work environment. The conversation was loud enough to be heard across the entire store. We left without purchasing anything due to the atmosphere there. I'll be highly surprised if I visit again.

resp.text:
Hi Marissa,

My name is Connie - I am the owner and manager of Fanci Free. Thank you for taking time to leave a review and bringing this incident to my attention.  I was not in the store on the day of your visit, but as soon as I heard what happened I made several unsuccessful attempts to contact you. I discovered this written review about your experience only last week.

I wish to extend my sincere apologies to you and your husband. I want you to know I have personally addressed the situation.

At Fanci Free, we value each and every one of our customers. We have a long-standing reputation of making our boutique and café a place where everyone feels happy and leaves happy. I am so glad that you enjoyed the quality and appeal of Fanci Free (as reflected in your ratings) - but on the day of your visit, we fell short of our overall mission.

As a token of our appreciation for your patronage, and to make amends, I invite you to return and enjoy a free meal with us. Then I will be happy to help you find that cute jewelry you were looking for - we have plenty to choose from!

Please call and ask for me (Connie Dismukes).

I look forward to meeting you and your husband. Thank you again for your comments and helping us to continue providing the best service and customer experience in the downtown Prattville area.

Connie Dismukes, Owner & Manager - Fanci Free Café & Boutique

text: The best black eyed peas I have ever had. Hamburger Steak was also good.  The owner was very friendly and they have a discount for folks such as state workers and military.   Not a great part of town but if that doesn't bother you then this works.

text: Another great place to get a bite. Very fresh ingredients on the sandwich. That peach tea that people come to get JUST FOR THE TEA I must admit is outstanding.Mobile is blessed with many great restaurants.

name: Robert Smith
text: At first I was happy to find out that this company delivered to my job, order food got it early even left the driver a good tip, next day had a good amount of people from corporate that wanted lunch delivered to the job just to find out they don't deliver in this area!! Very disappointed. You guys are the only delivery service that goes to the restaurant my company likes. No one from the company have not responded to my calls on the reason why you guy's stop after one delivery. Major opportunity just went out the window.

name: Jessi Stubstad
text: They were great, however since the change over, they are rarely open.  I haven't been able to order from here in over a month.  Recommend Waityr.  They seem to cover the same places.

name: Shelby Anderson
text: Drivers are always friendly! Owner called once to tell me they would be late and personally apologized and offered a discount on my next order. Port city is reasonably priced compared to the other delivery services. We are very impressed with Port City Deliveries!

name: Stephanie “Momma Sasade” Sasade
text:
While visiting family I discovered this wonderful
Local company that is the only delivery service for my favorite, Pizzeria Delphina! Prices are fair and they pay their drivers the whole tip plus the delivery fee. Manager on phone was very quick to fix my order before he sent it and food came before the estimated time. I will gladly use this company again and my family has vowed to keep using them as well.

name: Michael Keahey
text: The deliverer called three times concerning the address. The first time I was told that there was no *****North, so I corrected them: *****West. The second time they called they told me that there was no *****South, so again I corrected them. The third time they called (and by this time they were already 30 minutes late) they had me walk outside so that they could more easily find the house, and that would have been fine had they been sure that they were in the right neighborhood. Eventually though, they found me and they gave me a $10 credit for the trouble. I will still only give 2 stars because of my cold order.

name: Leslie Hakanson
text: Friendly and helpful office.  Friendly drivers. Good option when need food but can't get out/away.

name: Will Hannon
text: They put an emphasis on delivering for local restaurants.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: Absolute worst service EVER!  Have been ordering for over a year.  Sometimes 2 -3 times a week. Had trouble with their website this morning.  Austin answered the phone.  Told, by Austin, sorry your are having trouble with the website but I have four other phone calls.  Go handle those phone calls Austin.  Cuz, I certainly will NEVER be calling y'all again.  If I could give you NEGATIVE stars I would.

name: Music4Meka
text: I've used for over a year now and they're great

name: Jenny Nall
text: After I placed an order I was notified that it would take over 3 hours!  No one would return my calls or email.  Very unprofessional, terrible business! If I could give Port City Deliveries no stars I would.

name: Brennan Baker
text: These guys delivered in less than 30 minutes! I just moved to Mobile from Tuscaloosa and have been looking for somewhere that delivers food from everywhere thank goodness for these guys!! Awesome service give it a go!

name: jennifer brown
text: We ordered from work. It took over 30 minutes to place the order, then they called back and said that they had to cancel the order because the restaurant closed.  But they still charged my credit card.  I tried to call them back today but I only got a voicemail. My friend who ordered also, had charges come out of her account 6 times.  Beware!! They will steal your money!!!

name: Lance Mayfield
text: Pretty faIr and fast service

name: Nicole McCall
text: Driver was very kind. And the food came quicker than I thought it would.

name: Marina Buie
text: Great experience! We ordered from a different delivery company the night before and it was awful. So very happy to find a company that believes in customer service!

name: mill W
text: Port City Deliveries is a life saver. So many days I work longer than expected and can't get away for a meal. So I hop on the app and find a local place to order from. If the delivery person is running late they call and give a heads up with an apology. I also get texts to let me know when they are close by. They are always pleasant & polite. Tonight I ordered from a Chinese restaurant & my food was all wrong. Wasn't sure if I should contact the restaurant or PCD (since they brought me the food & I couldn't leave work to return it myself). I decided to call pcd. Maaan, I'm so glad I did! *AJ* did not hesitate to solve the issue.  He stepped right up & got the problem solved. Went far and beyond to make it right. Now THAT'S how you handle business! Dwnld the app, it's a game changer for sure.

name: Craig Tucker
text: First delivery experience. Fast and friendly. Good food, too.

name: Tracee Wallace
text:
I placed a lunch order today fried shrimp poboy with waffle fries what I got was blacken shrimp with tater tots. I called Port city they blamed Montego restaurant  I call monetego they blamed port city but nobody offered to refund  port city offered to credit my account fo the next time I use the I fee like l am being forced to use them #disappoint
July 17,2018. Today I was surprised to receive a call from AJ  to follow up. He apologized and  let me know I would be receiving a refund and a credit. I value good customer service and the willingness to go the extra mile to improve upon short falls. I will definitely give Port City Delivers another opportunity to provide great service!!

text: Like others have posted- ingredients were very fresh. Nice that they offer a few Thai dishes. I ordered the Chow Mai Fun. It was very good. Slightly different from versions that I have had in the past at different places. Egg rolls were very good. It seems like they are made with spring roll wraps instead of wonton wraps. Can’t wait to try the other items on the menu.

text:
Great experience!
You have to try the shrimp egg rolls! Hard to find a place with fresh food like this! The dinner plates are well priced and come with more than enough!

name: jennifer marie
text: Delicious food, I love their general tso's chicken! Best around! Very nice people, great service! If you're wanting good Asian food and good service, give them a chance!

name: Gamer red X Daugherty
text: Ordered takeout today . My food was fresh, hot and delicious.  The cost was very reasonable.  Family of 4 fed for $20. We had the Thai pineapple fried rice and I'd definitely order it again . The general tso chicken was also very good. Will for sure order again .

name: tammy beard
text:
Paid the "up charge" to get pork lo mein instead of steamed rice with 2 entrees . What they gave us was plain noodles. No pork. No veggies. Just noodles. I've ordered this in the past and actually GOT the PORK lo mein, so I was surprised and disappointed.
I don't mind paying for what I get, but I expect to GET what I paid for.
If you're gonna charge extra for something, be more specific. I wouldn't have paid the extra charge for PLAIN noodles.

name: Bettina Watson-Dixon
text: My favorite chinese food whether I order delivery or in the store my order is always right and the food tastes great!

name: Donna Williams
text: Me and my husband order take out from here every Friday,and try different foods,him and my daughter have learned to eat with the chop sticks which they also have

name: Raymond W. Cardona
text: Food's good, need I say more?

text:
We get carryout from here quite often. The food is consistently good, much better than the other carryout Chinese places in the area. The food is cooked fresh so it doesn't taste old like some of the other places.
The customer service is good. The ladies there recommend dishes to my husband that we would each like, remembering our preferences.

text: East Coast is seriously my favorite Chinese restaurant. I've eaten here countless times over the years. The shrimp are buttery and fresh, the veggies in the lo mein are always fresh, the prices are incredibly affordable, the service is always nice in store and delivery, i love that its family owned, i could go on and on. 10/10. No where compares, in my opinion!

We do not eat here often.  when we do we do take-out.  about half the time we find they have made an error in our order.

the food is good I just wish they would do a better job of getting us what we order.

text: TERRIBLE!! We spent over $40 and NOTHING WAS EDIBLE. The seafood was rotten and the chicken was burnt and stringy. I literally spent our last chunk of money until payday on food poisoning. This "establishement" should be shut down by the Health Department! If i could give them a negative i would! The audacity of whoever threw this into a bag for my children to wat is incredible. Do not waste your money here.

name: Alex B
text:
1 star is not even correct. It should be 0 stars. I place an order online, got my confirmation email. Said it would be ready for pick up in 30 minutes. At 6:30pm, we went to pick it up and they said they didn't receive an order. What's the point in having a website that you can order directly from, and you not freaking check it? Hmm? I want an answer. Horrible place. Don't order from them. They take entirely too long to cook the food, and it should only take about 10-15 minutes to cook the simple things.
Do not order from this place.

Take your time, money, and gas to China Chef by Rouses in Saraland. Best chinese in the area and they are quick to make your food.

name: S Rogers
text: They deliver, food is good, they don't give enough soy sauce though so make sure to ask for more when you pick up your order.

text: The food is awesome, very nice people too.I go there at least twice a week,sometimes more...

name: Roy Gould
text: To say they are good would be an insult as to how truly awesome the food and service are at this restaurant. Although I live closer to a couple of other Chinese restaurants, I will bypass those to visit East Coast.

name: Arcade Family Fun
text: Received the Grand Opening menu in the mail that says they deliver within 5 miles. Called in an order well over the $10 minimum, they asked for and I gave them my address and phone number and was told it would be here within 45mins. That was 4hrs ago and im still foodless. Never got a call back or anything. Guess they couldn't find me 3 miles down hwy 43. My rating of 1 star is for poor service and is not against the food because I still don't know what it tastes like. If you are hungry take my advice and don't order delivery.

name: Lisa Fancher
text: Great experience, food is wonderful, i eat here all the time, not only do I love the crabragoons, Im now the driver for the company, so call in today an make an order an an I asure you that I'll be there with the greatest taste you could ever eat from a eas food restaurant.

name: Krystal Jones
text: I love this place! The food is always tasty!

name: Leonard Angeline
text: The food is so delicious

name: MR GALLAGHER
text: Always great haven't had a bad experience dined there at least a dozen times since they opened 👍

name: Brian Wenzinger
text: Good authentic food! Especially the pineapple shrimp!

name: Jay Black
text: Excellent food an service 😋

name: Aaron Bell
text: The food taste amazing and the staff is very friendly will continue to eat there despite any negative reviews..... ☺☺☺

name: Intre Hires
text: Food was good. I ordered extra shimp but i couldn't tell it.

name: Leah Rutledge
text: AWEFUL SERVICE. I CALLED AT 6:55pm on May 26 for delivery and was told 45 minutes my food took 2 hours and 35 minutes to be delivered!!! Don’t order from here unless you want cold Nasty food. DISGUSTING I WILL NEVER EAT HERE AGAIN

name: getanointed11
text: Fast delivery and great food

name: Theresa Nguyen
text: I have ordered online several times!!! Great food and fast delivery!!!

name: Kandrell Wright
text: Good

name: christopher marshall
text: Great food

name: Denise McMichael
text: The food is ALWAYS good, but the crunchy noodles that go with the soup are ALWAYS stale!!

name: Lakisha Abrams
text: Food was great

name: Santorria Harris
text: Good Place Good Prices

name: Mike Rands
text: Always great!

name: BrotherTy Page
text: Pad Thai isn't good at all

name: Felicia Perry
text: Great food

name: Julie Overton
text: I made a large order and expected better food. One pizza was so dry it tasted like stale crackers. Two of my pizzas barely had sauce on them, and one pizza had NONE! The garlic parmesan wings were fine as plain wings because sauce was just barely drizzled on them. When I tried to speak to the shift manager about the issue, she was rude and treated me as though I was making it all up to receive free food. I did not ask for a refund. I just asked that it be made right. I drove 20 miles to order and pick up food from this location and I will not be going back. This is the worst experience I've ever had with a Domino's.

name: Rebeckah Faye
text: So last night we ordered, and things got a little mixed up and our order was a late. They were super busy, it was a Friday night,  phone steady ringing. Well the manager on duty ((i didn't catch his name)) lovely gentleman, went above and beyond to fix the mistake that was made. I was so mad when I went in and bless his heart he caught an earful, but when I say he handled it with ease and grace. Baby he did WONDERFUL. Kudos to you sir. I know this store has much growing to do but they are lucky to have a boss man like you!!

name: Brad Seal
text: The food is awesome!  Pizza is good but the wings are great, even better!  They're a real life save because it's literally the only place in town that delivers and like many others I'm working from home and can't find time to get much shopping done.  Thanks to Dominoes for coming and saving our town :D

name: Alisa Gill
text: I would give them zero stars if possible. 1st I tried placing an order that should have been $18.99 + tax. It came to $24.50 + tax. Finally got that corrected and when it said my order was ready they told me 5 more mins. Then after that I was told a delivery driver took my pizza. After agreeing to make another one I get a phone call stating that I have to take the one that the driver took. Nope!!

name: Desirea Jenkins
text: Love this place!!! As a food industry worker myself, I commend these folks on doing such a great job. Theyve blessed us at huddle house with free food. Anyone who does that is a winner in my eyes 😍

name: Big Country
text: This is the second time I've ordered delivery from here and my wife agrees that the service was excellent, the pizzas were exactly what we order and cooked perfectly, delivery drive was quick and followed the contact less delivery instructions to the tee. So keep up the good work guys, and don't let these other reviews get to you.

name: Luke Hostwaters
text: I was placing my order over the phone, as the girl goes to repeat my order back to me and tells me my total, she giggled. I got very frustrated because of the situation. I asked was something wrong and she said no im trying to find you a coupon so you don’t have to pay 50 dollars. This made me laugh after my long day of work, the little things people do or say make a difference, and most workers do not realize that. thanks kyla. i did not really catch the name so i tried my best. amazing food, my lava cakes were the best. i definitely plan on being back!

name: Courtney Brown
text: Easy ordering online and carside drop off makes it simple and easy.

name: Jason Evans
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. My order was wrong on this visit and the one before.  They did offer to fix it but driving 30 mins back to the store wasn't worth it.  Little Ceasar's is better never had an issue with them. Won't be back to Hamilton Alabama Dominos.

name: Benji Rider
text: Dude... Asked for the buffalo chicken bites and they sent plain chicken w a cup of buffalo sauce. They even called to confirm my order and was still incorrect. Then tried to charge me a second delivery charge to fix it, and told me to tip the driver again. When I got the correct chicken there was about a drop of buffalo sauce on each. Worst Dominos ever.

name: Lisa Walker
text: Well if I could have went lower i would have. It would have been nice to get a warm pizza, that wasn't hard a a brick

name: andrea loden
text: Seriously disappointed, myself the pizza is subpar to say the least and what they call csr Incompetent. Who does not understand what “ my order is wrong “ , means.? And then, their representative starts giggling while on the phone with you saying but I don’t understand “ what do mean it wasn’t right ? Please for the Love of god don’t release them if they’re not trained.... in phone etiquette and basic communication skills. It’s frustrating for people who are trusting you with their food.

name: Amber Luker
text: The food is great but the delivery person  was very rude

name: Donna Harris
text:
My 2 pizzas were overcooked and had hardly any cheese
I will think twice before ordering sgain

name: Ophie May
text: Dominos in Hamilton is a joke. I've been on the phone for half an hour just trying to get my pasta fixed, but ya know.. they don't answer.. I ordered a chicken alfredo and recieved this very dry pasta, the alfredo sauce is nonexistent.

name: Sabrina Brents
text: My order was 45 minutes late. I went thru the drive-thru and was told to make another lap since my pizza was in the oven.  I said how about I just pull over and park and someone brings it out.  The man at the window said ok. Keep in mind the car that was in front of us in the drive thru sat at the window for 15 minutes before we pulled up and we were told to make another lap. I waited another 20 minutes and finally just went in and got it. Also the car that was behind us was still at the window when i went in to get the pizza.. The food was ice cold.

name: Joe Shmitty
text: The food is good. The first few days were a little rocky with limited staff and high amounts of orders but after the first week I see an improvement in service.

name: Elijah Mayhorn
text: The food is great and service has drastically improved

name: Ken Murray
text: What a joke this Domino's is. Can't even get an order right and quality of service is slim to none.

name: sherry credille
text: I only gave it one star just so I can say this I was on the phone for over an hour to place an order no one answered the phone. My son tried for 45 minutes. What's up with this dominos

name: Laith Dawoud
text: I work here!! We love the city of Hamilton, and it’s a pleasure to be here!! DOMINOS PIZZA!!

name: Teela Holley
text: I work here and I love it great people

name: Kaden Blaine Whitaker
text: ye not the best but itll do

name: Emma
text: none of the food is ours and we paid 100 for it.

name: Thomas Robertson
text: Great food and service

name: Donny Harden
text: Good food and good service

name: Robert Shelton
text: 14 dollar minimum order

name: Jeff Holloway
text: putrid.

name: Jamie Chambers
text: Waited 1.5 hours with no update on the tracking. Other experiences were fine during the day

resp.text: Jamie, we take pride in getting our customer orders within the hour and our order tracking ability for our customers. That said, we could not find your account on our system and we are trying to make things right for you.  Please email us at FetcherOps@fetchmedelivery.com so we can research and make things right for you.

name: ken evola
text: Favorite delivery service in Auburn!

name: Dominic Binkley
text: I ordered carryout from a local Italian restaurant through FetchMe and was told to pick up my meal at 4:15 p.m. But when I showed up, the restaurant told me they don’t open until 5:00, so I had to wait for them to make my food - totally defeating the point of ordering online. I would not recommend ordering through FetchMe.

resp.text:
Hey Dominic, we apologize for the inconvenience due to this. After looking into this matter further it appears that our restaurant partner had altered their ordering hours and did not make us aware. We have since fixed their changed hours so this should not happen in the future. As a locally owned business we value your feedback. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you ordering again from us.

Regards,

Harrison
Owner
FetchMe

name: Jonathan Williams
text: Great to have some local delivery guys in Auburn. My food was delivered quickly and safely. Couldn't recommend these guys enough!

resp.text: We live to serve our customers! Thanks you for the wonderful comments.

name: Kellyanne Brown
text: Came to visit Auburn and was told to try this App. Not only did they mess up several of my orders from some of the restaurants in the area (Burgerfi, five guys, and a few other places I had never tried before), I was also accused by their customer service of lying about my food not showing up! How about you take some responsibility? HOOORRRRIBLE business who doesn't care about their customers, I bet all of these positive reviews on here are from friends and not actual satisfied customers. Do not waste your time using this app, unless you are fine with your money disappearing and being accused of stealing.

resp.text: Hi Kellyanne, we looked at our customer files and we looked at our customer ratings and feedback.  We can not find the information on the above.  Please send us an email at support@fetchmedelivery.com with your information so we look at your orders and make it right.

name: Tori Brown
text: Cheaper and quicker than any other food delivery service in the area. Excellent customer service!!

name: Patti S.
text: FetchMe really helped in a pinch and we will always use FetchMe, from now on. Great quick, friendly and most importantly ... professional.

resp.text:
Thanks so much Patti! We love hearing such positive feedback. Yall are the reason we do the things we do. Please see us again soon!

-Harrison from FetchMe

name: Autumn Garrett
text: Do not work here

name: Tyler Wilson
text: Best delivery service in all of Auburn/Opelika. They are up to date with their COVID-19 practices, and I will be continuing to order from them from here on out.

name: FetcherOps HQ
text: FetchMe Delivery is a great LOCAL company that keeps their customers wants and desires at the heart! They always call to confirm if something happens at the restaurant and even provide me with extra things that I didn't even know I needed (sauces, wet wipes for my wings, etc) Truly a great company and should be the only delivery company you order from!!!  P.S. They also delivery groceries and can complete on-demand orders.

name: A Foster
text: Always quick, accurate, & courteous!

resp.text:
Thanks A for the feedback. Glad you enjoyed using us. Please see us again soon!

-Harrison

name: Megan Huff
text:
FetchMe Delivery....delivers ;).
I love this service and I can't express how simple it is AND how wide their territory is!! I live pretty far away from everything and I see FetchMe Delivery drivers all the time in my area, it's nice knowing that if I don't want to cook FetchMe Delivery has it covered!!

resp.text:
Thanks for your support Megan! We love reading reviews like this, you made our day! Let us know if you need anything.

Regards,

Harrison and the FetchMe Team

name: Nick Patrizio
text: I've been using food service delivery apps for awhile now (i.e. Uber eats, Grubhub) and then I visited Auburn U and came upon FetchME. I dont understand how this small time delivery business provided me much quicker and more enjoyable service than the larger players back home but it made my first experience at Auburn much more enjoyable. Quick, easy service. The next time I visit for a tailgate, I know who I'm reaching out to. And you probably should too.

name: Lacey Harbula
text: Food was excellent.  The service was wonderful. Server was chipper and very polite even though she'd been there all day. Definitely would like to go back.

resp.text: Thanks Lacey! We are a locally owned and operated company.   We love it when we make our customers day.

name: Patrick Kennedy
text: FetchMe Delivery is the go to delivery service when you want to get it done right.  I use them every time I am in town.   Thanks for the great service.

resp.text: Thank you Patrick--We love serving you and appreciate your feedback!

name: Matthew McMullen
text: Couldn't ask for a better delivery service to work with or for! Both as a patron and an employee, FetchMe has been nothing but top notch. Fast deliveries and a great side gig!

resp.text: Thanks Matt! We love that you are part of the team that strives to have excellent customer support by going above and beyond that was expected and by ensuring customers issue are quickly resolved.

name: Alice Evola
text: Used this service several times while in town. They were on time, meal was fresh, and the driver was courteous!

name: Alex Harris
text: Honestly what's not to love about FetchMe? Super fast delivery times, super great employees, my only regret is having to leave such a wonderful service behind when I moved out of Auburn. They truly make you feel like it's FetchME, not FetchEVERYBODYELSE.

resp.text: Thanks Alex!  FetchMe is striving to be the best online retailer that you have ever dealt. Our goal is to quickly follow up on your purchase and ensure you satisfied with your experience!

name: Jamila Mills
text: Great service, friendly delivery, but the charging process is a bit wonky. Accidentally tipped twice and felt bad correcting the tip. The final bill is usually different than what you think you spend upfront. So if they fix that, 5 stars.

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Jamila, hope you are doing well!

name: Patrick Lovell
text: FetchMe rocks! Quick delivery, very friendly drivers and staff, and they’re always helpful and easy to work with if there any any issues. Not to mention the wide range of food and grocery options they provide.

resp.text: Thanks Patrick. We strive to ensure everything is outstanding, from the website selection to the fetchers to the delivery experience.

name: Valerie Hawkins
text: They are quick and have reasonable delivery charges.

resp.text:
Thanks so much valerie, we love the feedback and are glad to hear we were able to take care of you! If you need anything please let us know!

-Harrison

name: Harrison
text: Excellent service and restaurant selection. Greeted by a friendly face and received our Groceries and dinner in no time at all!

name: Lane Minor
text: GREAT SERVICE!

name: Miracle Joy
text: Great  service  and fast

resp.text:
Thanks Miracle! Glad you enjoyed your experience. Love hearing this. If you need anything please give us a call!

-Harrison and the FetchMe Team

name: Christopher Talley
text: Best delivery service in Auburn hands down. Most restaurants and best service.

resp.text: Thanks Christopher.  We are fighting everything to ensure you have thousands of items to choose from and delivery is FAST.

name: Esther Lande
text: Always late. Dont order taco bell is always messing up the orders

resp.text: We would love to help you but we do not see an account for you.  Please connect with us.

name: Michael
text: Great service, app works smoothly, so many options and love that you can even order your groceries through this app. There may be delays sometimes but only on gameday weekends when they definitely are receiving tons of orders all at once and having to deal with loads of traffic. Would recommend for anybody in the auburn area to use.

name: AJ
text: I was shocked they delivered so far out to my home. I'm quite impressed! Plus the delivery fee was quite reasonable!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! Its comments like yours that keep us going--Have a great night!!

name: Lakeisha Lark
text: Over charged my card

resp.text: Hi Lakeisha, we were able to find your order and wanted to ensure that you were aware that there was an authorization on your card for an amount greater than the price of the order. This is temporary and a pending transaction in case we have to make a substitution on your order. We are seeing only one charge and if you have any questions please feel free to contact us at 334-209-7730.

name: Damien Boren
text: Great company

resp.text:
Thanks for your business Damien. Please see us again soon and thanks for supporting local!

Harrison and The FetchMe Team

name: Scott McGlon
text: AUsome service, easy to use, and a lifesaver when my wife doesn't want to cook and I don't want to leave my chair!  We have ordered food delivery with FetchMeDelivery multiple times and they all went extremely well with each arriving earlier than expected.  We even asked them to make a delivery with a restaurant that was not set up in their system and they did it without a hitch.  Great service!

resp.text: Thank you Scott! We are working hard at delivering an AUsome experience for the community.   Appreciate your feedback!

name: harry harp
text: This service is terrible use tiger town to go they’re much less likely to completely butcher your order which they’ve messed up slightly or entirely every time I’ve ordered from them. Also when I called to tell them they butchered my order to the point I didn’t want to eat and they said they’d refund which they did but they refunded $8 for a $12 meal not including the $7 delivery charge and tax and the tip I gave the terrible delivery driver. Either go get your food yourself or order from any other delivery service because this is not worth it.

resp.text: Good morning Harry! Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.  We acknowledge that sometimes mistakes do happen and am sorry you did not have a great experience.  Your experience is the most important thing to every employee at FetchMe.  We reached out to the restaurant who controls the food quality and have addressed quality control challenges with them given they prepare your food.  We have also reached out to you in order to ensure things have been made right with you.  Please engage our delivery center so we can resolve this to your satisfaction.

name: pink pink
text: Good service lots of choices in restaurants. Delivery fees are reasonable and they are quick 😊

resp.text: Thank you for your review!  We are working hard at creating a great experience for you. Have a great day!

name: C Kinder
text: Always on time and the drivers are super friendly! This is the only delivery service I use in the Auburn area.

name: frances coleman
text: They go above and beyond.

resp.text: Thanks Frances, after a long hard week of making deliveries, this really made our day! Thank you so much!

name: Joy Evans
text: I work for a school and ordered lunch from Moe's. I wrote in the instructions and comments to place Queso on the side. I got my order and no Queso on the side nor inside my nacho's. I called FetchMe and was greeted by a very friendly voice who assured me that my Queso would be delivered. My Queso was indeed delivered and the driver was very friendly and not at all bothered by bringing only Queso in. Both apologized and made this hungry, trapped at work, Queso loving girl VERY happy!!!!

resp.text:
Thanks Joy, We appreciate the support and feedback. Glad we could fix your Queso emergency :)
-Harrison and The FetchMe Team

name: K-way Cotton
text: Very nice people and fast service

resp.text: Thanks K-way, as a locally owned company we appreciate your support and love the feedback. Give us a call if you need anything!

name: Tank Wilkerson
text: When your down & sick plus tired of pizza these guys can get you what you need!!!! Nice & timely

resp.text: Thanks Tank! The FetchMe team is  actively working to expand the options for our customers.  Appreciate your feedback! Thanks again.

name: Amr Abdul-Gaffar
text: Its a good service, I dont know why theres only 1 review with no explanation. It saves alot of time. And i don’t have to get out of my house when its 100 degrees outside

resp.text:
Thanks Amri, your satisfaction means a lot to us! We love the feedback and your support.

-Harrison

name: Houston Harrod
text: Extremely nice and professional

resp.text: Thanks Houston!

name: Jae Morgan Reid
text: They close earlier than their website says

name: Melisa Williford
text: Had no sign on the building

resp.text: Hi Melisa! Thanks for your review. Was this meant for us or when you applied perhaps? We are a delivery company that conducts business virtually on our website so we dont have a store front, meaning there is no sign needed and no building.

name: Hannah McPhillips
text: I had the BEST experience using Tiger Town To Go!  It was user friendly, they were professional, and they were fast.  I will definitely be using them again and again and recommending them to everyone.  It's so convenient and 100% worth it.  Highly recommend for all your food delivery needs.

name: STACIA TWAROG
text: Frequent customer, I love how easy their app is to use, and my orders always arrive so much faster than they  estimated delivery time. I ordered Pho Lee tonight and it arrived quickly, hot, and delicious! The driver was very polite, and used proper safety measures. It’s also great to be able to support a local small business.

name: Afra Williams
text: I learned of TTTG when I moved back to Auburn. I like to go places normally for food... Or anything else for that matter; but its been pretty much a life saver since I have a small child. And I would much rather support local businesses. Which I believe TTTG is. My orders are always timely and still hot. This is a great company.

name: John Martin
text: Tigertowntogo is the original and in my opinion, best, food delivery service in this area. Their website is user friendly and offers plenty of options from local restaurants. On the rare occasion that an order is incorrect, they always try to make it right with a professional attitude.

name: Lauree Riggin
text: Delivered soup to our sick daughter and son-in-law. Perfect

name: Brandt LaPish
text: Best delivery hands down! The drivers are always so kind and prompt! I literally couldn't ask for better service. Thank you TigerTown!!

name: Allison Palmer
text: I have been conducting regular (frequently, daily) business with TTTG for approximately 2 years, especially since the pandemic set in. While major errors with my orders have been infrequent, I've let go of minor errors which occur fairly often.  Today, however, I've made the choice to NO longer conduct business with them. I ordered from an establishment which serves smoothies, as well as food items. Not only DIDN'T my smoothie arrive, but NO ONE -- not from Tropical Smoothie Cafe, to the driver of TTTG, to those working in the TTTG office -- contact me. They all just took my $ (to inc extra tip for driver) without the courtesy of informing me to make another choice. I'm sure my bill will be adjusted (or that will be a fraudulent charge), but I'm NEVER engaging in business with TTTG again. Thankfully, as a consumer, I have other choices.

name: Madeline Gall
text: Tigertowntogo is great! Ordered a nice dinner and got it in a very timely manner, even faster than the website originally said!

name: Blake Graham
text: Never been here 0/10

name: Chelsea McCard
text: I always get my order pretty timely. Sometimes some things get messed up or cutlery is missing but this IS NOT the drivers fault. It is the RESTAURANTS. And honestly, these things happen. I have never has a rude driver or an issue with anyone that actually works for the delivery service

name: K B
text: No plasticware was included in my order.  The delivery address (Marriott) should be the give away that I dont have a fork here.  This was way overpriced for a screw up.

name: Michael “YoBubo” Reilly
text:
Deliciously Fresh, Affordable, Fast and Tasty food served by Friendly People.

I would love to have an option like this in down town Montgomery!

name: Jay Roman
text: A small mom and pop shop is such a delight to visit. the food was good and the staff was so warm and helpful.

name: Dustin Meyers
text: My wife and I love this place. So far I've enjoyed everything I've gotten. My wife works at the hospital and loves to order a few meals a week, so she can have them on her night shifts. The food is healthy and has lots of flavor. The owners and the employees have been very nice to everyone that comes through the doors. The Buffalo Chicken Wrap and the Bang Bang Chicken are a few of the must tries they have to offer.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review and continuous support! We're so have that we can help you both maintain a healthy diet while living busy lives! We strive to provide nothing but the best!

name: Morgan Stettler
text:
I love every single healthy item on the menu. My favorites are the wraps and chicken salads.
Their healthy Mediterranean twist on potato salad is a must try!
The friendliest customer service! Works around food allergies and are extremely considerate. I felt very welcomed when I walked in the door.

name: Amanda Alexander
text: My husband went to get me a chicken salad sandwich and I kept calling and no one would pick up so he just went. The owner told him he has only doing catering because he was not hurting for money. Seriously. Extremely rude. He couldn't even give him a simple sandwich with pasta salad he already had made and they are very rude people I wish I could give them a 0 for terrible customer service

resp.text: Good Afternoon, unfortunately we had to close due to the threat of dangerous road conditions. This was explained to your husband. We already had a catering booked that had to get out that could not have been done in the morning. He continued to insist that we make the sandwich and pasta, that by the way we did not have the product already made. We make our Chicken Salad by scratch and do not have cans of chicken lying around. So no we are not hurting for money as to where we needed to stress ourselves and staff out to make your 1 Chicken Salad Sandwich (that we don’t even have the croissants for either) and Pasta Salad that the Pasta would’ve needed to have been cooked. We were closed, that does not reflect on the amazing customer service that we provide. Unfortunately we do not have the menu items for the restaurant prepared for today’s service since we were closed due to the threat of dangerous weather conditions. Also If we were open then we would’ve answered the phone. We always post on our Facebook page, as most businesses do, to communicate with our customers and we had already done that. Have a blessed day! Thanks!

name: Sheila Wallace
text: This place is amazing!!  Best wrap I've had ever. Customer service was top notch, food was fresh and delicious and restraunt was very clean. Their health score is 💯. I will be going back regularly. Great job!!

name: Katrina Snowden
text: I love this place. Good, healthy choices at good prices. I just wish they were open all the time.

name: Dianne Jewell
text:
Ah, healthy food. These folks are keeping it simple, with Fresh local produce and healthy choices.
Welcoming atmosphere and staff.

name: Angela Gosnell
text: Fresh food and staff is great.

name: Debbie Allan
text: Food was really good and the staff was very friendly.

name: S Andress
text: I was impressed with the variety of good food. The poppyseed chicken was delicious!

name: Sandra Hudson
text: Excellent top of the line food and healthy! Also excellent customer service!

name: Solange Reyner
text: Out friend Dustin brought us here. We loved the food, and the protein bites were delish!!

name: Kevin Smith
text: The owner was great nice personally

name: Ed Jackson
text: Good food and service.

name: Ralph Grayson
text: Did not like the food.

resp.text: We’re sorry that you did not enjoy your meal. We’re more than happy to give you a refund. Just swing by this week. We always strive to provide nothing but the best and our customers agree to that!

name: Alyssa Parris
text: The food is great and it's conveniently placed

name: Wesley Ransom
text: Absolutely the best steaks you can buy. Little pricey but you will realize it's worth every penny after you take it off the grill. Be sure to get the finishing butter also.

name: Julia Peart
text: We really enjoyed our lunch. The meatloaf sandwich and Turkey club were so fresh and good...service is awesome, oh and we bought a huge loaf of bread to take home!

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit! Please stop by again soon!

name: Gary Rush
text: Great food and great service. Environment is fun and staff make sure your satisfied with your order. First time visit, but will definitely return.

name: Kim Ouellette
text: The Italian sandwich is so good ( I heat it up)   big enough for two meals.   I love the crown filets...they cook up nicely and melt in your mouth.  Service with a smile.

name: Danny Neaves
text: Okay, I've heard a little bit about this place from word of mouth. Didn't realize they prepared food for you to eat on site. I thought they were only a butcher shop type of grocery store. They are a restaurant, and that is why I came by to try them out. I had a burger, and wow it was really good. It is a big burger, fresh, thick, and juicy. There are other sandwich style meals they offer with a variety of different meats and veggies. I will be back to get some cuts of meat to try out and to try some of the other sandwiches too. I have only had it the one time, but I would recommend it based on what I have had so far. Looking forward to trying some other stuff too!!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in to check us out! We’re so glad you enjoyed your burger and hope you’ll stop back in again soon!

name: Tim Lowe
text: I drove through today to get lunch.  This cheeseburger is solid.  The people here are so nice, too.  I'm gonna make it a point to drive through here more often.

name: jettt111
text: We just had the Italian hoagies ( with their fresh made bread ) and heated up. It was the best sandwich I’ve ever had. Way more quality Meat and flavors than subway , I’ll get the hamburger next time. It’s unlike any other around

name: pJ Smitherman
text: The price for two usda prime filets was very high, considering I was unable to taste a difference from that of a grocery store chain usda prime steak. I overpaid expecting a better steak and was let down. Cant say I would make the trip to smiley brothers again. Staff was friendly but for $60 a lb I’ll try somewhere else next time.

name: Cre Hill
text: Best Burger I’ve had in a long time!! Fresh, seasoned and of great quality!

name: Julian king
text: Food is amazing. Service is impeccable. Not many places you go to that the owner is working the drive thru and greeting everyone. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Julian! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Cindy McRee
text: What a unique find! Dryed, aged beef! Unique cheeses you cannot hardly get anywhere else. Too many unique homemade items to mention such as pickles, sauerkraut, breads, etc. As must for an early evening of a glass of wine, a few cheeses, sliced meats and quality conversation with a friend or significant other.

resp.text: Thanks so much Cindy! We hope you’ll visit again soon :)

name: Life Is Brewtiful
text: I absolutely loved this place! The owner and sous chef we're incredibly helpful, attentive, and polite. They were very knowledgeable of their products, provided samples of anything requested and seemed to have a genuine passion for their profession. I loved being able to see the high end and made in house products be made either through the window into the kitchen or in their air drying system for their meats. The sandwiches we're absolutely delicious and made with an obviously higher caliber of product quality than you will find anywhere else in the area. And for the (on average) $10 you get chips and a drink as well. You can even call in and pick up your order at a later time! Now some people will say that the prices are too high, and to a point I agree. However, I also appreciate that this is a premium product with supurb quality which demands and justifes a higher price. Seems fair to me. In my opinion this place is too good for Pelham.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We're glad you decided to stop in and we hope you've enjoyed everything!

name: Robyn Arrieche
text: Let’s face it, they know what they are doing here. I had the Wagyu Pastrami sandwich toasted that was VERY good. However, my only critique was that there was an overpowering taste of saltiness coming from the mustard or the sauerkraut which was disappointing because the meat was soooo good.

name: Rick McCoy
text: Best in town. Bar none.

name: Doug Cole
text:
Went for the first time last night and wasn't disappointed.  Criss was extremely knowledgeable about the various cuts of meat and the dry aging process.  I felt like I was attending a culinary class.  The meal was excellent!
I'll definitely be back for seconds!

name: Taylor Hart
text: It was SO good. That Jon Green guy is a dream.  That meatloaf sandwich though.... it's a winner.

name: Danita Ryan
text: I stopped in from work at about 4:00 p.m. to grab a chicken salad sandwich. I rate it a 10, it was delicious and fresh. Smiley Brothers is a different place but when you walk in the door you know that you are about to receive great service and wonderful food. I recommend it to everyone. I love their customer service because if you don't know they have time to talk you through it and you can have it your way.

resp.text: Thank you for such a kind review! We’re so glad you enjoyed everything and hope you’ll stop by and see us again soon!

name: Dennis Tymkiw
text: Prime grade dry-aged steaks cut to order. Loaded baked potatoes ready to warm up and devour. They pickle their corned beef and make their own pastrami. Select cheese and wine. A jewel of a store with a knowledgeable staff. Foodies-don't miss this place.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Dennis!

name: Dennis Tymkiw
text: Prime grade dry-aged steaks cut to order. Loaded baked potatoes ready to warm up and devour. They pickle their corned beef and make their own pastrami. Select cheese and wine. A jewel of a store with a knowledgeable staff. Foodies-don't miss this place.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Dennis!

name: David Vaughn
text: Outstanding Italian beef sandwich today. Highly recommend

name: Christina Klockow Runnels
text: We have eaten there a few times and everything we have gotten has been delicious! Everything is fresh and seasoned perfectly and their cookies are out of this world! My favorite is the pimento cheese and my husband always gets the club sandwich. Looking forward to trying the chicken salad next! We are so lucky to have this gem in our town!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We’re so glad you liked what you tried and can’t wait to hear what you think of our house made chicken salad!

name: rene generoso
text: Great meat great cheese and great high prices haha

name: Marnie Reineke
text: Highly recommend if you are in the Birmingham area!  They prepared an amazing meal to go for our daughter’s soccer team and everyone enjoyed it. Terrific selection of delicious meats, cheeses  and other specialty foods  that works for one or a large group. Can’t say enough good things about both  the shop and the people who work there.

resp.text: Marnie, you're too kind! Thank you for such a thoughtful review, we're so glad you enjoyed your Smiley Brothers experience!

name: Darlene Talton
text:
Smiley Brothers has great deli sandwiches. They make most all of their ingredients on site. Everything is fresh made. They put plenty on your sandwich. They have a large selection of cheeses.
They do catering and cooler packages. Friendly and helpful employees.

resp.text: Thank you Darlene for your kind words!

name: Vintowsi Farms
text:
Traveling from Sacramento, California to Florida in an RV and stopped for a sandwich. Little did we know this would be the best sandwich of our trip!    So delish!
Criss knows quality, and he delivers that.
Wow, soooooo good and fresh!
Will stop again on our way back to Sacramento.

resp.text: We’re so glad you stopped by and that you loved your sandwich! THANK YOU!

name: QuantumPolagnus
text: My wife and I came here with no idea what they even sold.  We found out they sell lunch, so my wife got their Special Burger and I got a bowl of their Tomato Soup.  They showed us around and told us more about what they do as the food was being prepared.  Apparently the burger was a house recipe combination of different steaks ground together with butter, parsley, etc.  Suffice it to say that the burger was one of the best we have ever had.  The soup was also really good and creamy with shredded gouda and croutons on it.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review and for stopping by to give us a try! We so glad you enjoyed what you tried and hope you’ll come back and see us again soon!

name: Scott Lamoreaux
text: We have had almost every sandwich on the menu and each one has top quality Meats, cheese and bread. All of the take-home meats and items are as good as you will find in this area. Of course it's not cheap because it's the best. Also the only place I know of locally that has true dry aged beef.

resp.text: Hi Scott, thanks for the kind words! We're glad you've enjoyed the sandwiches and hope you'll come back and see us again soon!

name: Candace Herron
text: Great roast beef sandwich!  Also picked up some house made sausages and cheese.  I plan to come back for some dry aged steaks soon.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review Candace!

name: Garrett Bowling
text: I finally branched out and tried something other than the beloved Meatloaf Sandwich....OMG am I glad I did because the Wagyu pastrami sandwich was AMAZING! The tangy house made pickles, cut through the rich fatty goodness of the Wagyu. The whole grain mustard and swiss cheese round out the flavors and it is served on wonderfully toasted Rye. Now the only problem I have is what to try next!

name: Chris Ashley
text: Bland sandwiches. Roast beef especially bad possibly expired or old.  Had club, roast beef, and chik salad.

name: Em
text: Wonderful place with friendly staff!

resp.text: Thanks Emily!

name: David Price
text: The staff was super friendly and helpful.  I had their cheese burger with a lettuce wrap instead of bun.  In my opinion, it is the best cheese burger in Shelby County.

resp.text: Thank you David for such a nice review! We’re so glad you enjoyed your burger!

name: Jonathan Eidson
text: The meat here is a premium product, so expect to pay a premium price. You’ll end up with a better steak from your own grill than you’d get at any place outside of a $100+ per plate fine dining restaurant for much less. The staff is friendly and willing to spend time discussing their products with you. Definitely will go to again for a fine steak dinner at home with the wife or other special meals.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! Please come back and see us soon!

name: Tommy Barberini
text: Had an amazing sandwich but you better bring your appetite! Dry/wet aged meat available as well. Will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thanks Tommy! Hope you and your appetite are able to stop by again soon :)

name: Bill Burn
text: Had the Smiley Burger over the weekend and this is absolutely the best burger in bham! This thing is stacked tall and they apparently have butter in their beef mix! The cheddar is melted over the meat dripping down the toppings. They have lots of great sandwiches, but this is my new favorite! I would pit it against any burger in bham!! If you haven’t been in here yet, check it out. Great wine, cheese, and sandwiches. Chef Josh and the guys are always polite and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you Bill for such a kind review! We’re so glad you enjoyed your Smiley Brothers Burger!

name: garrett bowling
text: Never been here before today but I had the Meatloaf sandwich and it was INCREDIBLE! Will definitely be ordering it again!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in and giving us a try! We’re so glad you loved your sandwich and look forward to seeing you again!

name: mhtate
text: Stopped in to pick up some sandwiches.   The wagyu pastrami was quite tasty but the cons Reuben was a bit too salty for our tastes.   I look forward to going back to try the good selection of cheeses, charcuterie, prepared foods and butcher cuts.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! The Reuben can definitely be a strong flavor! Hopefully you'll be able to stop back in soon and try out our other options!

name: Monique Smith
text: Very knowledgeable staff and owner. Wonderful quality, clean meat options. And when you're there check out the home made pimento cheese and french onion dip!!

resp.text: The French Onion Dip is a favorite all around, we're so glad you enjoyed it!

name: Eddie Stroud
text: Beyond friendly! The kind of old school freibdly helping hand that seems to be to few and far between nowadays. Mr. Smiley knows his meats. I will definitely be back again and highly suggest you visit if you haven't yet already! Great honemade oversized lunch specials. Nowhere anywhere close that can compare to this place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Eddie! Hope you can come visit us again soon!

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Had the BLT salad... excellent! Good service and nice space.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Owen! We’re so glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Alabama Sedan
text: I really enjoyed my first visit to Smiley Brothers. Had no idea it was an excellent Deli as well as a butcher shop! I will definitely go back often to enjoy the ambience as well as the food.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review and we hope you can stop by again soon!

name: rene generoso
text: Great meat great cheese and great high prices haha

name: Lee Courington
text:
Amazing Experience! Staff took time to explain all menu items and the sandwich I had was delicious!

Highly recommend the pickles as well.

resp.text: Mmmmm, the pickles are definitely a fan favorite! Thank you for stopping in and we're so glad you enjoyed everything!

name: Ashley Winslett
text: Im new to the whole steak buying thing and honestly don't know what I'm doing. The people were so helpful. They answered my questions and never once made feel intimidated by the experience. The steaks were amazing! Looking forward to trying the deli. Keep up the great work.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley! We hope you stop in again soon!

name: kevin woody
text: the pimento burger is literally the best burger ive ever had.

name: Patrick Connor
text: Best burger in Shelby and maybe all of Bama

name: Austin Shadix
text: Friendly staff, quality products, lots of housemade goodies and ready to cook packages.

resp.text: Thanks Austin for such a kind review!

name: Eboni Greene
text: I love the smoked Gouda can't wait to make grilled cheese sandwiches. The staff was really nice and I will most definitely be returning.

resp.text: Thank you got your kind words Eboni! We hope the grilled cheese sandwiches were delish!

name: Sharon Kellum
text: Awesome new place if you are looking for a top quality butcher shop! Very knowledgeable owner and staff...

resp.text: Thank you! We hope you’re able to stop in again soon Sharon!

name: •GalaxyFloofy•
text: Amazing burgers and plenty of options!

name: Alan Thompson
text: Very nice selection of delicious cheeses and meats.

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed everything!

name: Michael Sims
text: Very friendly and informative. Did not make a purchase today, but will be back very soon.

name: John Kubas
text: very over priced......i bought a ribeye bone in from them....not good for the money i paid......much better ribeye on sale at piggly wiggly..

name: Lorraine Reeves
text:
From the moment you walk in, you are greeted by a friendly and helpful staff.  Fresh vegetables and any type of infused olive oils you can imagine.  The cheese display is incredible, and the staff is more than happy to give you a sample of any you would like to try.  Let's not forget the meat!  You can see the dry aging of beef in process.  It takes about thirty days to age the beef.  I bought a ready to cook meal that includes chunks of prime beef, carrots, onions, celery, potatoes, a half bulb of garlic, tomato paste and a red wine jus.  Cooked it in my dutch oven, and it was perfect.  I didn't have to cut up the vegetables or meat, so it was a great time-saver.  Did I mention the filets?  Bought two dry-aged and they grill to fork tender.  The flavor is certainly better than regular filets from the grocery store.  All meat is butchered in-house, by well-trained chefs and the house-made sausage is unique, yes classic.  I also bought pork chops that must have been over an inch thick.
I highly recommend you buy from this specialty food store!

resp.text: Lorraine, thank you SO MUCH for your incredibly kind words. We strive everyday to make sure each guest loves their Smiley Brother experience both in shop and once they take their purchases home. We hope you come back to see us soon!

name: preston naish
text: Stop what your doing and come eat here! Amazing food!!!!!

name: Marty Eagle Meaglesales@gmail.com
text: Food was awesome, just need a little more seating for guests

resp.text: Hi Marty! Thank you for your kind words and feedback! I hope you've stopped back in lately to see that we have added more seating for folks to enjoy in store!

name: Denese Luck
text: Although everyone was extremely nice and the food is delicious I need napkins when I eat. Can never get any from Domino's. Paper napkins is the same as a paper box when it comes to germs(covid). Ridiculous!

name: Mellissa Harris
text: The system was down online so I had to call the store. No one answered and I called four times. When I arrived at the store their were at least 6 employees there.  I informed thetge worker and she didn't seem to care. This dominos location on gateway has really gone down and the only reason I went was for my uncle. Service is poor and they usually get my order wrong that's why I've stopped eating at this location. They really need a better manager. And an employee also drop a customers sauces while delivering curbside and didn't pick them up. Just very unprofessional location and very lazy.

name: Michael Rizzuto
text: Got a phone call minutes after placing my order to inform me that their hours had changed and they no longer delivered to the address for the hotel I was staying at. They need to updated their website to reflect this. I understand they are low staffed but she said until the end of summer the hours had changed. Need to fix that so other travelers aren’t wasting their time.

name: Drew Hill
text: Overall good. I would suggest sticking with the hand tossed pizzas. Tried the pan and got the extravaganza, basically the supreme with everything and it turned out really doughy like it needed a few more minutes in the oven. This is typical when there's that many toppings, but was still a bit disappointed. Ended up finishing it myself in the oven at home.

name: cowanization
text: Quick, hot, and fresh!! Thank you for delivering to a trucker 😎🚛
