text: The pizza is good but it's a little pricey when you can go get it somewhere else cheaper but a if you want better Pizza you pay the money

text: Phone rang for over 10 minutes, got there and they said they dont answer the phone. Papa Johns's had no problem taking my order. They should just close it down.

name: Chris Ferguson
text: Placed order and they took my money. Then tell me we can’t put in ur order and it’ll be 3 to 5 days before u get ur money back.  Bs I bet I want use them again!!!

name: Triniti Evans
text: I did not get garlic butter on my bread knots!

name: Jessica Driggers
text:
First off, the female who answered the phone hung up on me when i asked her to hold on.  I understand not being able to hold,  but all she had to do was say that and not hang up on me.....because when i called back she then had me hold.

Then when i got to the store they couldn't break a $100 bill...when my bill was $40, so they claimed they didn't have $60 worth if change in the drawer..... frightfully inconvenient....and the female at the counter told me to 'just go to the gas station and get change'.....so much for customer service....

We WILL NOT be going back to this location.... there are much nicer, friendlier, more customer-centric locations with the same area.

AND, don't order cheese bread and expect any sauce, THE MANAGER said that 'every franchise does it differently'....I guess I misunderstood the concept of a franchise.

text: Order online. Order was cancelled because no driver and they said they called 3x but I only go 1 call...and couldn’t confirm refund...bad service

name: Judy King
text: I asked what they had for special i was told larg specialty for 14.99 told the guy that i wanted that then said i wanted a med pepperoni. When it was delivered i got hust the med pepperoni. When i called back the guy who i placed my order with when i told him that i was to have 2 pizzas one was a larg specialty an med pepperoni he said i didnt specify what specialty i wanted i thought a specialty was with everthing one it futher more he didnt even bother to even ask me what specialty i wanted. I guess nectime inorder i guess ill go to all the way to auburn to pizza hut cause when you ask for specialty they give you all the way on it unless younask for meat lovers or a supreme pizza. I guess thats what i get for not realy asking down to the details what their specialty means. Your people who answers phone needs to learn how to place an ask your guest what they want on pizzas cause they just cost you money. Cause i dont like to go all the way to auburn to get pizza when i can have it delivered but not any more for a person who dont like the auburn trafic guess i will have to fight it next time for a pizza. Thank you for your hospitality an for not trying to make things right with you customer.

text: My daughter came and picked up a pepperoni pizza and cinnionmon twist.. I am very displeased with both.. They were burnt and very tough to eat.. I don't think I will be coming back...

text: If I could give zero stars I would. This place is run poorly. They are always understaffed. I placed an order for delivery and they called me 15 minutes later (when the delivery quote was 22 minutes) to inform me that they could not deliver my pizza but I could come pick it up for the SAME PRICE even though the delivery fee is 3.99 and I tipped the driver 20%. The manager was useless. I don’t even blame the staff there, seems like it stems from corporate. Absolutely awful.

text: My pizza was burnt and it was a hot mess. I wont never spend a dime with them

text: Dude, this dominos was operating with one manager and one delivery guy on a Thursday night! Constant phone calls, rushing back and forth, the delivery guy helping make pizzas and taking four to five deliveries out while we were there, I mean these two guy were killing it! Absolute badasses and deserve some praise!

name: Tammy Stafford-Bellflower
text: Ordered, through the app, a large Brooklyn MeatZZa pizza a few minutes past 5: pm, and the alert came up a few minutes later saying it was ready. I live 40 minutes away, and I get home, open up the box, and no meat; just plain cheese pizza. I called and was told they would do another one...and plus one, for free, and that it would be ready by the time I arrive. I go in to pick up and both orders are wrong, again. I had to wait 15 minutes for them to redo the orders. It ended up being 2 1/2 hours before me and my family finally got to eat.

text: Been on hold for a hour every time I call😡😡😡

text: I ordered my items online... I did not get them until way too late..it was not hot. They knew the service was terrible because they immediately gave me a 20% coupon off of my next order.( I didn’t even speak to anyone about my order nor did I leave a review).. so they knew it was terrible service...so fast forward to today I ordered my items online and when I got them they were not hot... I was trying to track my order.. and couldn’t so I called the store and was told the GPS system was down. I don’t know what is going on but being that I live only 2 minutes away I would think my food would be much better than I have been getting considering I include a “suggested”  tip every time .. my first order was under $20 but the next day my order was over $50 and it still was the same thing... Luke warm pizza and desserts!!!!! Very disappointed!!!!

name: Kristine Rogers
text: They made our pizzas exactly the way we asked them to.

name: duke likins
text: employees are awesome

name: Savannah Ellsworth
text:
UPDATE: I changed my review because after getting in touch with HQ the manager called to formally apologize and take care of it, which I really appreciated. Hoping for better experiences from here on.
I never order from Domino's and always get papa johns. I decided I wanted a drink and they have sprite so I ordered from there today. The driver brought the wrong drink and was gone before I notice so I called the store. Whoever answered the phone said do you want us to have the driver bring you another one. I said yes because that's what I ordered and she said I don't even know how long it'll be and then hung up without even asking where I live or anything. Took a chance and will not be ordering here again. Talk to the staff about some manners. I work in the food service too. (Still waiting on soda to be here. Who know if it'll come)

text: So why don't you deliver to the Golden Cherry hotel? They waited till after my pizza out of oven before calling me. I don't have a car so I can't pick it up. Seriously?!

name: zjp1995
text: I normally never have issues with this particular location but I placed an order online. I got to the place checked my pizza out and it was burnt around the crust and it also had very little cheese on it with bubbles. I asked the young lady that rung me up to remake the pizza and she was very nice about it and was about to remake the pizza with no problem! Although then the manager came around the corner and was making smart remarks. He said and I quote "order your pizza right the first time online". Now mind you I ordered the pizza correctly it was made poorly. He was very unprofessional and rude. Kuddos to the young lady though, she should take his position because he clearly doesn't know customer service. 3 stars  because management needs work.

name: Jennifer Clark
text:
The pizza was hot and ready when I arrived. However, it wasn't up to the quality I have come to expect from Domino's. The toppings became sparse before ending at the signature garlic crust edge. Our pizza was full of bubbles and actually had burnt portions. Our cutter may have been new because it was highly inconsistent. We had slices equal to 1 1/2-2 slices then baby slivers.

I was just passing through so I can't speak on if this was the typical quality or if we caught them on a bad night. My typical experience at other locations 500 miles from here are much better so hopefully this location was just training a newbie.

name: Justin Edwards
text: They never have enough drivers the food is always cold I wouldn’t recommend anybody to them 5 thumbs down

name: D Brown
text: I don't like to do negative reviews, but 2.00 frozen pizzas would have been better than what we paid over 30.00 for tonight!  it took an hour just to get the food out the door!!!  Apparently this store is poorly managed.  Worst pizzas I've ever had... one pizza had burnt bacon, very thin crust, overcooked, stale, and was very drrrrryyyy.  The other one was very dry, stale tasting, and the inside of the pizza was undercooked.  We ended up giving nearly all of it to the dog but she didnt even eat much of it, and she usually eats anything until she over stuffs herself and throws up and eats that too. She also enjoys trashcan food and cat poo.  She walked away from the pizza.  Only 8 minutes away, and it took almost an hour and a half to get 2 pizzas and 1 cheese bread.  And as if this wasn't  enough, we ordered marinara sauce, which was non existent with our meal.  The delivery person was very professional, kind, and punctual with the order.

name: Molly Nutt
text: Always delicious. Delivery is always prompt.! Never had a wrong order.

name: Eric Gooden
text: Ordered pizza and bread sticks and a pasta. No marinara with my cheese bread. Purchased for the 3rd time

name: TRAP 431
text: went to pick up pizza after getting a email stating it was ready . To no suprise i was told the pizza was not only not ready it was never made but if i could wait 20-30 minutes they would make it. Not the first time this happened

name: matt hammock
text: Cold burnt pizza unprofessional staff very disappointed for the money spent

name: James Bradberry
text: Friendly staff and way better than little caesars!

name: Brittany Stroud
text: I ordered online Sunday 11/11 right at 5pm. I ordered 5 pizzas and an order of cinnamon twists.  Unfortunately every last pizza was deformed.  Like a mix between thin crust and hand tossed.  (Supposed to be hand tossed)  and mass majority of the pizzas were black on the bottom.  Typically pizza is GREAT.. it's been a bit but Domino's fell short last night.  Cinnamon twist and customer service was just fine.  Was in and out no wait.

name: Oscar Fernandez
text: Everything was good.

name: 종현이
text: I really disappointed all bread and ingredients burned out!!!! I think they don’t know how to bake pizza..  It’s all burned totally burned too much over baked

name: Tanya Singh
text:
I know it's not that to give it just two stars since for the kind of quality food that they  provide and of course who doesn't love their pizzas. But one of my very first delivery experiences that I just had today.
It's not about the 50 cents or so that I paid for that Marinara Sauce but all that matters a lot is when you have it on waiting and no wonder they forget it. If I forgot to ask for it when getting my breadsticks and the pizza delivered, I think it's still majorly on their part wrong for not to provide it.
Sometimes even the slightest of the wrongs piss a lot. I tried to call them right back immediately and was told that they going up sending it right back but none showed up.
Must be wondering who comes back for just this much, right? I knew it too somewhere in my mind but didn't really know that they be lacking behind this low on customer satisfaction. I, myself deliver stuff at my other side job to my  Customers and I make sure everything is so pitch-perfect knowing that eeling of the customer excitedly waiting and having all their eyes on the person delivering it, because, "FOOD is love, FOOD is Happiness".

name: Pat Barnett
text: Love this place

name: Britt Thomas
text: I love building my own pizza,  & I can see what my pizza looks like when I had toppings to it.

name: Lura New
text: We order frequently from this store and so much so that we have earned a free pizza.  However, the pizza we got this evening was.  It was cold, and half of the crust was burned so that we couldn't eat it, and the other half was almost burned.  What a huge disappointment for $24.00!  We switched from Papa John's to Domino's months ago, but we never experienced this disaster!

name: Abigail Rose
text: After waiting an hour and a half for my pizza to be delivered I decided to call the store just to make sure the order actually got placed. The manager told me they only had one driver on that i would get mine soon (I got it about 30 minutes after this call). I understand the lack of staff BUT CALL ME AND LET ME KNOW WHATS GONIG ON. Also DON'T DELIVER MY PIZZA LUKE WARM AND DRIED UP FROM WAITING TO BE DELIVERED!!! Honestly even a apology from the manager or driver would have been nice.

name: Rodney Smith
text: Amazing pizza at an amazing price. Quick too! Best pizza deal in the area.

name: Lura New
text: We order frequently from this store and so much so that we have earned a free pizza.  However, the pizza we got this evening was.  It was cold, and half of the crust was burned so that we couldn't eat it, and the other half was almost burned.  What a huge disappointment for $24.00!  We switched from Papa John's to Domino's months ago, but we never experienced this disaster!

name: Rodney Smith
text: Amazing pizza at an amazing price. Quick too! Best pizza deal in the area.

name: L BW
text: Very good service. My first time here.

name: Jedonne Morton
text: Pizza took 45 minutes to go from store to our motel. So it was cold.  The brownie cookie dessert was burnt. Called to talk to manager and was hung up on. I was polite to the girl answering the phone, so there was no reason to do so. So I suggest finding somewhere else to get pizza.

name: Vanessa Holliday
text: good if you go pick up..... takes them 2hrs to deliver one pizza on a Sunday night

name: Bryan Gilmore
text: This is the third time that my pizza spent over 30 minutes at the restaurant done before it actually left the building.  Took months before I ordered again but they did it yet again.

name: Vicki Kilpatrick
text: Always prompt delivery. Pizza is great. Can't say enough good about this location Dominio's Pizza place!!!

name: Mark Lovelace
text: Very bad management.  I ordered a carryout special online, only to find out it wasn't ready when I got there after plenty of time.  Also, once it was ready I was informed there was a softball size hole in the middle and they would have to remake it.  Waited another 20 minutes on the re-bake only to be given the bread twist that were cold after sitting for 25 minutes.  I asked them why they didn't re-bake the twist as well only to receive bad attitude from the manager.  I will not order again from this store.

name: Ryan Johnson
text: Sweet bbq chicken burnt order a meats pizza with cheddar cheese and they put feta cheese nasty

name: Lily Hill
text: We ordered 2 LG pizzas, one Philly cheese steak and a half pepperoni n half cheese. When I called to see why it cost so much for 2 the lady said because I didn't ask about the specials ( which I didn't know you had to ask, I thought they would tell you) we learned n not sure we'll go back.

name: Teddy Dinkins
text: The pizza was not made the way I instructed and if it wasn't for the fact I had a house of 12 year olds I would've waited to have them remade. Not good Opelika domino's!!!!

name: Lily Hill
text: We ordered 2 LG pizzas, one Philly cheese steak and a half pepperoni n half cheese. When I called to see why it cost so much for 2 the lady said because I didn't ask about the specials ( which I didn't know you had to ask, I thought they would tell you) we learned n not sure we'll go back.

name: Brent Butts
text: Usually I never have a problem. Tonight The order says complete and I’ve been waiting for 30 min and no one will answer the phone. Terrible service.

name: donna swann
text: Great

name: Brittany Nicole
text: Placed my order at 10:30 got it at 1:00 the. My order was wrong. Called back and the manager hung up on me!!! Rudest manager ever!!!!

name: Sharon Henderson
text: The food is always good. They drivers are always nice.but they always forget my Bluecheese. They forgot again today.😒

name: Gigi Williams
text: This is the best pizza place in town. I have always had great food, great service and timely deliveries. I love pizza and have had so many problems with delivery places, but this store is top notch!

name: Crystal Chadwick
text: Good food but you got to pay for your sauce for your cheesey bread😢

resp.text: It sounds like you're frustrated, Crystal.  We always appreciate feedback and we'd like to hear more from you.  Please share this with our Customer Support Team at bit.ly/dpz_cares & please include reference #3595861.  *Benjamin

name: Shadow334
text: The pizza and the wings were hot and arrived ahead of time. There is not to complain about. My family enjoyed it.

name: Katrina Powell
text: Heather called about my order and made sure changes were correct.  Order hot and correct.  Pleasant delivery person.  Delicious.

name: Ya-Done Goofed-88
text: I mostly use them for delivery but as you would expect. They normaly come on time as well as having the best pizza that's crazy good its worth it. The coupons they offer are also on point which I use everytime I order from them.

name: Stacy Green
text: We have had an issue every time we have ordered and it's impossible to get anyone to answer the phone there.

name: Cathy Dodwell
text: Ordered pizza and wings over an hour ago and still no pizza already got money from my account

name: Andrew Defee
text:
Have used this location consistently (weekly/biweekly) for last few months - food nearly always hot, orders have all been accurate so far.

Only complaint is drivers are hit and miss. Sometimes they get here quickly, sometimes has taken them 35 mins for a 10 minute drive.

Out of all the chain pizza places in the area, this Dominos is easily the best and most consistent.

name: David Moynihan
text: It's standard fare Domino's. Friendly staff. Great value.  Consistent with other Domino's.

name: D F
text:
The Opelika, Alabama store is terrible!
4 straight orders in the past year that never showed up or came 90 min late cold.

name: Salisa Love
text: Dang near cold

name: Brent Harris
text: A pizza was delivered with big blow out bubbles from the crust. This pizza should have never been boxed much less delivered.

name: Mike Hamilton
text: We have just ordered a pizza we earned through your rewards program. Stop the program. If you are going to put half the ingredients on the free pizzas, then your rewards program sucks...

name: Tabitha Prestridge

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Tabitha! *Brandon

text: OMG SERIOUSLY though... pizza had no cheese the crust was burnt that was so nasty .toppings to. I can't believe this .dog won't even eat it.ugghhhh . Ended up having to cook anyways. ......

resp.text: It looks like we dropped the ball with your order, Bobbi. Please share this with our Customer Support Team at bit.ly/dpz_cares & please include reference# 3521769. We'd like to make this up to you. *Brandon

name: Lisa Martin
text: Quickly arrived but forgot marinara sauce☹️

name: Seth Walker
text: I love Domino's Pizza, I really do. They always have great service. But the problem I have is the ones here in Auburn/Opelika, will not deliver to any address that is further than 5 miles. I find that completely ignorant. I live 7 miles away and you won't deliver to my address. I've never heard of a pizza place not delivering past 5 miles, like seriously? I know of places that would deliver 30 minutes away. Step up your game Opelika Domino's.

name: Bri
text: Called with a customer complaint, requested a supervisor and he hung up in my face. VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

name: Jackie Lawler
text: Great pizza's at a great price

name: Bianca Matthews
text: Everything about Dominos is A1. I used to never order Dominos but then as I started to work late nights, it was also open and convenient. I really appreciate the pizza tracker and of course the bomb pizza! All I suggest is that Dominos starts carrying Dr. Pepper!

name: greg milanes
text: They're understaffed. When I called to check on my delivery order when it was already 40 min late the person on the phone told me it would be another 30m+ because they only had 1 driver on staff. 1 DRIVER ON STAFF. DONT ORDER DELIVERY FROM HERE

text:
pizza tracker did not work ?
driver was very nice

text: They are fast and very friendly!!! Great customer service

text: Philly Oven bakes subs are delicious

name: Marty Nelson
text: I have never had so many pizzas delivered with air bubbles in the crust as I get from this store.

name: Amanda Santiago
text: I was very happy with the Dominos in Opelika because they made me feel important when the Dominos in Auburn made me feel very unimportant. But after tonight and a so called manager I will give Pizza Hut or Papa Johns another chance. Oh the place I used to go by Kroger doesn't deliver here but atleast  they wont make me feel like the customer no one wants.

name: Gullatte Acres
text: They forgot my garlic butter. Excellent pizza.

name: CHRIS Teague
text: Hands down the best Dominos in the world and I have used a lot of Dominos locations all across the map. Service is outstanding, never have had my order made incorrectly or lost or whatever. Most of the people that work there know my name, say most because this is a college town so there's always new faces when I go there. Order is almost always ready when I get there or just coming out of the oven, almost never have to wait around long which makes it super convent. Food is always hot when I pick up my order, unless I am late so can't fault them for that lol. If your going to get Dominos in Auburn/Opelika go to this store you won't be sorry even if your south or west of campus the extra drive is worth it. Also if you use a smartphone use there app or go online makes ordering a breeze but you can call in too they handle that easily as well (just try to know what you want, they will thank you for that and people in the store will thank you for that. Having to recite the entire menu isn't fun when you can get the info online). Hats off to my favorite Dominos crew, thank you for the great food and great service!

text:
tracker not working
would not pull up my order by my phone number

And one time our pizza wasn't cook all the way and we called, not to complain, but to let them know and they told us they would put a free pepsi on our profile to let them know the next time we ordered. When we ordered again, there was no free pepsi. We have always used dominos for our Sunday pizza nights but lately it has really been disappointing.

name: Denise Jenkins
text: The community is lucky to have such a friendly, affordable place to get quality pizza and desserts.  Sign in online to order and start receiving points toward earning free food!  A couple weeks ago, I picked up a pizza and cinnamon knots and they forgot to give me the glaze.  I spoke to Patricia the manager and she treated me so kindly!  Came back the following week and she had made a comment on my account to provide me a replacement dessert for the missing glaze. Devan added an extra glaze which I put in the fridge as a back up!  Excellent staff that always provide a smile!  Dominos purchased the old Burger King and remodeled it.  They have a indoor seating area, which I hope will be open for guests to eat inside someday.  I could see many wonderful birthday parties and celebrations there!

name: kam shannon
text: Happy people, quick friendly and and always delicious. Bacon jalapeño stuffed cheese bread is bomb no matter when

name: Andrew Johnson
text: Not the best pizza. Poor customer service. Small topping amounts, large price.

name: Jeanette Porter
text: It's great for social distancing, but the thin crust is perfect; so good, with the right choices of toppings you can make a masterpiece. Wonderful stopping point on way to the beach. Bon Appetit 🍽️

name: Tony Mikels
text: This is the first time I've had my food look exactly like the picture. Friendly staff and great food.

name: Jennifer White
text: I've had so many issues with this place! Was so excited when I saw Eufaula was getting a Domino's because I don't eat pizza with red sauce and Domino's has garlic parmesan and Alfredo options. But I'll be honest I'm fed up with getting the wrong food forgotten, hair in my food and staff ignoring my request. There is only so many times you can offer to make it right if you mess it up every time what's the point! I will dive twice the distance to Troy!

name: Kim Davenport
text: Awesome pizza as usual!! Exceptionally friendly service!!

name: Eric Hill
text: Excellent service and quality pizza is hard to find at chains, sometimes, but this store has both. This local Domino's is new and delivering pizza quickly is what they do. Great carryout service as well, a large dine-in area and a free-to-use (by reservation) Community Room makes this a great spot for groups as well as celebrations. The drive thru pickup window is just a bonus, especially if you're in need of pizza and cheesy bread and the lobby is closed. Definitely worth trying.

name: Clotilde Reeves
text: Assistant manager Kimberly Johonson and her team did awesome job with the food tonight. Everything was on point. The serve was excellent and fast....

name: Donna Lynn Greene
text: Always good

name: Erica Butler
text: On 7/2/2020 I called to place an order around noon, the woman on the phone was very rude and sarcastic, answered all my questions with a undertone even though I was being polite. At the end of my order I said thank you and she just hung up. Upon arrival to pick up the same woman ( I'm assuming she was the only one working the counter ) came to the window, no greating, just very rude saying  NAME? Then informed me it was going to be twice as long . I cancelled my order

name: Streaks So
text: They took an hour to give me my pizza and I ordered online and there were like 8 people standing at the cashier acting like they didn’t care and they need some more training. And it took an hour to just give me my pizza and the employees were just standing there acting like they didn’t care and they have poor service and I asked for garlic sauce two times and they didn’t give to me and I also asked for Mariana sauce and they didn’t give me that either. They need to improve on their service and need more older people who are willing to work and giving proper  service because those teenagers act like they don’t care about their job and they are not willing to do anything

name: Beverly Harris
text: Very nice fast and accurate

name: Joy Gilsey-Marino
text: Nice people,  clean environment, waited less than 15 minutes for order

name: Egghead Rocks
text:
The owner and management under pay and over work the employees.
They create schedules that have a stated beginning time and leave the end time open with a question mark and give the employees no food or rest periods. I will also be yelping these issues as well, as 7.25 an hour is bad enough, they should at least have better working conditions.

name: Carl Murphy
text: Ok

name: Travis Blue
text: Awesome

name: Eric “EL Duderino” Mitchell

name: JDTheRedAnimator2008
text: Their pizza is way better than Little ceaser and pizza hut., I give it  star.

name: Samantha Mathis
text: We have ordered several times for Delivery and have also ordered for Pickup, always on time!! I have had 2 issues, once the chicken was wrong and once the wings were burnt, both problems were fixed asap. SOOOO much better than Little Ceasers!!

name: Angelita Greene
text: I live 3 miles up clayton highway (10 minutes away from domino's) but they dont deliver but claims to deliver within city limits...i dont get it.  I love dominos but they need to define their delivery service....10 minutes is not far and w/i city!

name: Kathy Backman
text: Very disappointed  didnt have my crust. Didnt have my sauce. They need to close an restock. Pizza was cold and tough.

name: Lauren Croy
text: Our delivery man Garrett was the bomb and deserves a raise.

name: sheila williams
text: It was alright i would order again.

name: June Wiggins
text:
We ordered a thin crust meat lovers with black olives, onions, and bell pepper.  The pizza was over $27 delivered.  The crust was burned black
We felt they had to see this but delivered anyway.  Our first time to try Dominos since they opened in Eufaula.  Needless to say, we were very disappointed.

name: Joe Price
text: Its ok

name: Jamison Moss
text: So far so good

name: William Sanders
text: The pizza was overcooked, I ordered online the tracker said it was ready I got there it was incorrect and it still took them 20 minutes to get my order together.

name: Ashley Spotts
text: Fast service

name: T Hill
text: I've used GTG several times and have had good luck.... until recently. The past three orders have been wrong, and I realize the restaurants put the orders together. But when you order and the driver has a copy of what was ordered, and you pay extra for options that you don't receive, it's frustrating and almost impossible to get a refund for what you didn't receive. I think they should at least check. I've used Door Dash a couple of times and have had great luck and faster service. May be swapping.

name: Gary Beard
text: Gafsden to go was excellent .food could have been better old chicken very tough to eat like the chicken had been under  heat lamps for several hours

name: Fire Salsa
text: Had a slight technical glitch which was remedied by staff immediately, great delivery time, excellent customer service, a very patient and very kind delivery driver delivered hot fresh food.

name: Parker Alexander
text: These guys are extremely helpful and deserve 5+ stars. I always get my food hot, service only costs a few bucks, and these guys are extremely easy to work with. These are good people and I trust them to get my order to me right every time.

name: Kirsten Phillips
text: Anytime I have ever used them, the delivery was always on time or even arrived BEFORE the scheduled time of arrival! I love the options available, and I love that I can order from two different places and they both arrive hot and fresh at the same time!! Two thumbs up! My drivers are also always very friendly, and have great customer service.

name: Sara
text: Quick delivery time. Been using them for a while and very satisfied overall.

name: Stacey Morton
text: My orders are always accurate and food is hot or warm when delivered.   Delivery times vary but never unreasonably long. Happy to have a service that lets me order from a lot of different places.

name: Mallory Nicole
text: I always get such good service! My food is always hot, and my delivery driver is always so nice. I can place an order from any restaurant in the Gadsden area and it will be to will be at my front door within an hour. Nothing but good things to say!

name: Hector Kitchens
text: This company is a great idea for our area. They are always so kind and polite. Never had a mistake and the customer service is exceptional. Way better than non local corporations like Doordash.

name: Marisa Walker
text: Amazing service! I always get my food quickly and hot. We get food delivered through them 2-3 times a week and we never have any complaints.

name: Daniel Freeland
text: Me and my wife can't get out the house like we used to. We order The Choice almost everyday. Every driver that we've had had been respectful and  courteous. If there is ever a problem they will take care of it immediately.

name: Stephen Martin
text:
Fast delivery and very friendly service!
I’ve used several other delivery services, but Gadsden To Go has always been the quickest. Plus they are a LOCAL business!!

name: Pamela R Tanner
text: I've ordered 3 times from different places and I've not once received my order. I always get confirmation of my order and a delivery time but no delivery so congratulations to those who actually receive their order

name: Yelonda Nance
text:
I love most of the drivers always here right at or before time we have had a hiccup or two but not at Gadsden to go fault what we as human beings need to remember is that everyone is human and prone to error so restaurants make mistakes and blame it on Gadsden to go  remember they do not cook our food nor do they bag our food they only order and deliver (cause I’m lazy lol) the owners have been great at getting these errors fixed and for that alone I’m grateful  thank you from a exhausted wife and mom
And the service you provide !❤️

name: Jordan Patty (Transcend Death)
text: Forgot food, driver told us to call gadsden to go, called and could never get through after staying on hold for over 30 mins trying to call with 3 different phones. Use deal dash

name: Ashley Alexander
text: Everyone at Gadsden To Go has the best attitude and exceptional customer service!  Every employee and customer I have encountered have had nothing but positive experiences to share.  I will always support Gadsden To Go.

name: William Brewer
text: Always friendly, fast and fresh. Enjoy the service and will use it again for sure. Thank you much.

name: Steven Otten
text: Great service! Orders are always correct and on time! Love it!

name: Drew griffin
text: drivers are always fast when delivering food and I have had no issues so far! We have never had a bad experience and will continue to use this delivery service!!

name: Bayley Tillison
text: Food is always hot and fresh. Great local business unlike bigger companies such as DoorDash.

name: Brandi Thomas
text: Love Gadsden to Go!! Food is always delivered before the time given & still hot! Highly recommend!

name: Parker Sanders
text: I called and ordered from Kati Thai yesterday through Gadsden To Go, and it was an awesome experience!  My food arrived sooner than I would have thought.

name: Ziad Ghanem
text:
Whenever I order, I get a receipt and updates thru my e-mail. The food is always fresh and pretty warm, the fastest delivery company I ever dealt with.
#SupportLocal

name: Rebecca Riddlespur
text: Love gadsden 2 go they always got my food good and rite when I get it..

name: roy jones
text: Ordered food tonight. My wife’s meal was missing but I was charged for it. The driver said she was going to go to rock n roll sushi and get the rest of my food. Haven’t heard from her and she won’t respond to me. I’ll never use this rip off service again.

name: Caleb Byers
text: I ordered from wings and seafood and for one it almost took 2 hours to get here. Then my wings was wrong I ordered barbecue wings I got Hot sauce mixed with a dash of barbecue....disgusting. When I  go there myself I always get barbecue wings but when they go it always be wrong.I’ll never order from here again .

name: Hope Waldron
text: Would give 0 stars if i could.  Waited hour and a half for our food to be delivered and it to be wrong.  Nothing in the order was correct!.  Called restaurant and they were going to make new plates and to contact gadsden to go to pick it up.  Another hour and a half has gone by and have yet to see them. Have used previously and orders were incorrect but blamed it on being overly busy due to COVID but for orders to be incorrect EVERY time is unacceptable.  Too much money to be such sorry service.

name: Linda Parker
text: We ordered Blackstone through through GadsdenToGo and received our food within an hour. You can't even get your food in an hour if you're inside of Blacktone haha. Great service!

name: Carla Har
text: I had an issue with the delivery, but it was resolved expeditiously and to my satisfaction

name: Sam Thomas
text: Fast friendly polite i would recommend them to anyone

name: Lydia Hunnicutt
text: Surprisingly quick. Great service!

name: Sam Summerhill
text: Great selection and speedy delivery!! 10 outta 10 would recommend!!!

name: Brandon Gables
text: Was right and fast and still hot

name: Brandon Parris
text: I am very displeased and unsatisfied with this service!!! I ordered McDonald's and want lunch and some breakfast items but McDonald's doesn't have all day breakfast anymore, so they called to tell me this and asked if I wanted to remove breakfast  things I said yes they gave my money back for item's  and my food was supposed to be at my house between 12 and 12:30  so here I am very hungry waiting for my food cant walk or drive because I have a broken pelvis and is now after 1 and when I called they told me they just canceled my whole order instead of just my breakfast item and then I cant even reorder my food because they have  removed McDonald's from their site to change it to where it doesn't show all day breakfast so now I'm just hungry without being able to get my McDonald's and that's the only thing that I wanted.

name: Frances Johnson
text: Great fast service and delivery...

name: Emily Ozment
text: This is not the first time my order has been incorrect. I understand there are different difficulties due to Covid 19, however this does not excuse the issues with today’s order. I placed my order at 8:40 am to be delivered at 11:45. I received a call at 12:10 from Gadsden to Go telling me the food would be a “little later”. No problem. The food was delivered around 12:35 the driver handed me the food and left. When I checked the food it was not my order. When I called to tell Gadsden to Go of the issue the person I spoke with honestly I think could care less. In the past when there was an issue it was taken care of/ dealt with quickly. I order from Gadsden to go a lot for our office, but after today I will no longer use this service if the level of indifference to the customers is standard.

name: Daphne Ragland
text: I ordered food and it took over 2 hours to receive. This made me miss my lunch break. The female driver stated she got lost. The driver was filthy and smelled really bed...like pets and smoke. I could not even image what the inside of the vehicle was like. Will NOT use Gadsden to Go again!! PLEASE hire drivers that are presentable if you would like this business to prosper.. because the last thing someone wants is for a nasty and smelly person delivering the food they eat. Thanks!!

name: amber cockrel
text: Love them they are very nice and fast with the food

name: amber cockrel
text: Love them they are very nice and fast with the food

name: Holli Jones
text: I'm giving it 1 star for the variety of restaurants to choose from & 1 star for the accuracy on delivery timing. Other than that, I'm not impressed. I ordered my fav pizza from Blackstone! What I got was cold & hard. It's not that far from my job so I'm not sure why it was so cold. The price of the pizza is fine.... however my $9 pizza ended up being $18.5!!!! Taxe of course but was charged $0.50 for processing, $4 for delivery & then $2.89 tip, which wasn't even 15%. Sorry but take the rest out of the $4. No I'll never use this service again.

name: Laura Sweatt
text: The service was a little bit slow

name: Chris
text:
WORST DELIVERY SERVICE EVER

They charge 5 dollars to deliver anything I understand that you have to pay drivers but it’s not worth it when I could get it myself cheaper I wish Gadsden to go would go disappear

name: Thomas Jackson
text: Great service and friendly staff

name: Hal Scoggins
text: Ordered from Gadsden to go Tuesday April 14th  while at comfort inn suites Gadsden and the food never came this service should not be allowed to operate we will never use them again

name: stacy lewis
text: My food was delivered in less than 30 mins after submitting order!

name: Angela Sparks
text: 1 star only because I can't leave less of one. Placed my order at 8:22pm and was told my order would be delivered between 9:37 & 10:07pm. Here I am at 10:24pm and NO ORDER, NO PHONE CALL, but they gladly took my money. I am seriously disappointed and will not use them again.  No one even answers on the main love. Been calling since 9:45. I'm livid.

name: Kelly Williams
text: Well today was my first time using Gadsden to go and sadly to say I won’t use them again‼️‼️‼️....I placed my order at 4:39 and my food got here 5:45 fries were cold and soggy and so were my wings

name: Micah Starnes
text: Just a bad experience all around. I waited for 3 hours (the website doesn’t tell wait times til after you pay) and nothing; then when I called them after my order should have arrived, it had been canceled, unbeknownst to me, no call no text.

name: Sara Black
text: Great idea to begin with

name: jennifer Gaylor
text:
Great service, punctual, affordable.
Hot food delivery. Success!

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: I used to love them even though prices changed without warning because i don't have a lot of extra money and it was such a treat whenever i could order😛. HOWEVER, i will NEVER use them again since one of the drivers falsified tips!!! I asked the guy in charge about weird extra charges on my bank statement and he said they would probably fall off but second receipt shows the amounts categorized as tips i didn't authorize. And that's just...dishonest and theft😡.

name: D T (Raven)
text: Driver was nice even called to say he was late because he was still waiting on my order and nothing was left out

name: Stephanie Green
text: Only bc I couldn’t give it a zero. Will never use them again! We’ve used them a few times since we’ve moved here and wow today they literally messed up for last time. It’s our anniversary today so we decided we’d stay home and relax so we order from here and OMG where do I begin..Let’s just say three hours later six phone calls, late for work bc still waiting on our food so had to actually jump In the car to run down the road to the nearest fast food to eat a bite before I have to go to work. I’ll never use this business again. Hope y’all have better experiences if u choose to use them.

name: Lacey Harris
text: I have had minor problems here and there with this service and today's issue wasn't that bad, but it's everything rolled into one that just doesn't make it worth it anymore. There are always discrepancies with the menus on the Gadsden to Go site and apps and what the restaurant actually serves. The prices on the site and app compared to just going to get the food are ridiculous. But the food is delivered in a timely manner and USUALLY the communication is pretty good. Today was not the case on that though and I was very disappointed. I think I'll just get off my lazy behind and go get my food from now on. It'll be cheaper, quicker, and more accurate.

name: Eddy Cunningham
text: I ordered at 3:50 pm today. Received  confirmation of my order at 3:57. Delivery at 5:00 pm.  No delivery.  They don''t understand why I have confirmation and no record of my order. They promise to not charge my card.Never again.

name: Lashaye 210
text: Very rude older lady and added there own $3.20 tip to my order that has never happend through them before while i oredred and first said she didnt have change then pulled money out of her pocket very bad seevice experience.

name: George Walker
text: Their service has been excellent

name: Beth Pugatch
text: Gadsden to go is great except i had a girl driver that had no change for a 20. It was very disappointing.

name: Dillon Compton
text: gave me a credit and refund when it was very needed . Won’t go into detail but they do care about their customers .

name: Zachary Burns
text: Great service. Efficient and kind

name: Claudia Nazzaro
text: Love them! Great service overall 👍

name: sheri cain
text: Brought wrong order twice and would not replace it, bad customer service! I will never use them again!

name: Xuan-nhi Nguyen
text: They gave me the wrong order

name: who is that right there
text: Horrible horrible service

name: Angela King
text: They got my order wrong 3 times in a row  so will not us again called to tell them they said it was because of the menu not has not  changed

name: crystal graham
text: Orders have been wrong lately

name: Michael Burnell
text: Great service!

name: Tristan Knox
text: My orders are almost always wrong and/or very late.

name: DANGEROUS DYLAN
text: Fast and friendly!!!!!

name: christopher tucker
text: Tried to order a delivery to 801 w Beach Blvd in gulf shores Alabama. The store is located less than 1 mile from our location. They could not figure out where we where. Hung up on us twice. I will never use them or any papa Jon's again!!!

resp.text: Unfortunately the Gulf Shores location flooded during Hurricane Sally! Our franchise is planning to reopen the store sometime in 2021! Thank you so much for your patience! We look forward to servicing our customers again soon!

name: Isaac Barnoskie
text: This Papa John’s has burned a long-lasting humorous memory in my daughter’s mind...and a long-lasting memory of molten pizza on my leg.  The pizza is so good.  You know when it smells so good and the box Is warm on your lap.  You have to sample.  Against bodily well-being you still have to sample.  Even though you know that first bite has the potential to pull all the liquid topping off and scald your tongue, lips, and chin in the process.  I was aware of the swing to the chin.  I dodged it with catlike reflexes...only to have molten pizza toppings fall onto my inner thigh.  I don’t think I’ve ever screamed that loud.  Of course my daughter is laughing hysterically in the backseat.  “Daddy screamed like a girl.”  She still laughs about it every time there is Papa John’s.  All of that to say it’s fresh and hot.  We were back again for another big order.  Ordered online and order was ready as scheduled when we arrived.  Our cashier even helped carry our order to the car.  Thanks again.

name: Ethan Henley
text: Been eating here since I was a kid and hands down its made with love and the pizza tastes amazing..not to mention it’s a good deal. I look forward to saying hello to the owner and eating a pie with my pops whenever I am in town. Thanks for years of Great Eats🍕😋

name: Amanda Klein
text: Pizza is the same as next day fridge cold pizza. Good luck ever receiving it. Estimated time of 35-40 minutes per their app at time of order. Now over 80 min later still no food. According to the app it has been out for delivery for the last 30 min but the tracker is disabled. This is the second time this has occurred with this location. Last time an hour after the pizza was made it was still not delivered and we were able to drive to the restaurant to pick it up before it even left the building despite them saying it had been enroute....UPDATE: food ordered at 640pm. Estimated time per their site 35-40 min. 750pm I call and I'm told that it is out for delivery but there are 4 other orders going out with it. 815pm I speak with the GM, Brad, who also reports my food is out for delivery, apologizes and comps the order after I explain the kids are already in bed after we had to feed them something else....915pm STILL NO FOOD. As I'm on hold and now personally headed to the location, I intercept the delivery driver in the hallway. He hands me the warm but not hot food for free per his boss and i tip him after he admits that he was only given the food less than 15 min prior to his arrival at my house. Foods completion time per the sticker was 708pm. Why would they CONTINUE TO LIE to me?! I could have gone to pick it up like I had to last time. DON'T EVER ORDER DELIVERY FROM HERE. 2 for 2 and I've had the same experience.

name: Geoff HockeyDad
text:
Great food & staff !!!!!!
Just remember, when you don't want to drive, thier drivers are out in bumper to bumper traffic. Delivery times varies due to traffic conditions, but you always get fresh, hot food!

name: Lee Stacey
text: Ordered half sausage, spinach, mushrooms. Full order of pepperoni.  Delivery was fast. Only had pepperoni and sausage. Did not get get what we ordered.

name: Tomi Davis
text: Best pizza I've had in a while! Super Hawaiian hand tossed was great! Really like the pepper and garlic sauce as an added treat! Great fast service if you order carryout. Convenient location to Gulf Shores public beach!

name: gena reine
text: This place was a zoo on a Sunday night.  1 hour after ordering pizza still wasn't ready. We had to pick it up because we were told delivery would be 2 hours. Guess we should have just waited for the delivery guy. He and I would have returned with the pizza at the same time!!

name: Eddie V
text: Great! Only pizza we could get within an hour down here.

name: Craig Baumgartner
text: Pizza is really good. I love their tomato sauce they use and they out on a good amount of cheese. Unfortunately the service was slow. They were slammed with customers (they were quoting an hour + wait time) and it took over 10 minutes to hand me my pizzas after they were put in the warming area.  I tried to get their attention but couldn't. They should take a lesson from Waffle House with their efficient assembly line setup. We will still come back because we love their pizza.

name: Jessie Zucnick
text: 3 hour wait for delivery..I called after 2 hours (internet wait time) and they said it would be another hour for delivery but my food was done.   I had to pay ahead for delivery and tip because they do contactless delivery..I asked them if I could just pick up my order since it was done.   I picked up my order and they refused to refund my tip for the driver and the delivery fee.

name: Cecily Berry
text: Pizza was great as always... employees were very dry, not feeling customer service friendly or just having a bad day. However, the pizza was good.

name: A U
text:
3-9-20 Pizza half cooked and the driver (white SUV) short changed me and ran off immediately.  He got a good tip too.
What's going on Papa John's? Real shady...🤷

name: Karista Sumner
text: How can you have a bad experience with Dippin Dots? It was perfect!

name: Marc Castro
text: I placed an online order at this joint for carryout. After placing the order, their online system said it would take 70+ minutes for my order to be ready...it was one large pizza!? I immediately called to cancel the order and I swear the employee was acting like I was speaking to him in Spanish. I got tired of repeating myself and finally told him to forget it, that I'd just dispute the charge with my credit card company. I would definitely never order from them again. The employee acted like I couldn't speak English...so annoying!

name: Chasity Baggett
text: Horrible customer service I would not recommend this place!!! All I can say is if you want to eat dinner dont order here!

name: Chris Voyles
text: Absolutely the worst service from any papa papas in the U.S. save your self the trouble and order from another chain or local place.

name: Brandon Furry
text: Poor service and quality of food.

name: Brandon Furry
text: Poor service and quality of food.

name: Dale Buening
text: Ordering from this papa Johns was one of the worst experiences I’ve ever had. They told me it would be an hour and a half wait at the longest, which is fine. However, whenever I called in after an hour to see the progress they told me that it was on it way and should be the first stop on the drivers list. After another 40 minutes, I called in again asking them to just cancel my order because the wait was ridiculously long and I was told a lie about when my pizza would be delivered. Terrible service. Which is sad, because I actually like Papa Johns pizza. #badservice #PapaJohnsdisappointed

name: cloe davenport
text: Great deals. Fast delivery , very helpful knowledgeable staff, managers are great and really help the team and encouragement throughout the whole store. Great location.

name: donna s
text: Quick, fast, and easy to find, walking distance from the beach, and the staff were extremely friendly even close to closing time. I would go there again! The pizza tasted fabulous as well.

name: Leslie Lapouble
text: Was told it would be 35 mins and it was an hour. We had to heat it up because it was lukewarm.

name: Nixx Pixie
text: I love the customer service here. The cashiers and pizza makers are knowledgeable and friendly, and the drivers are quick, efficient, and very people-oriented. Great food quality for the price, and plenty of deals to choose from. A++ and a gold star, guys.

name: B W
text: I love Papa John's!  My delivery driver Haley was amazing!  Super friendly and great customer service skills.  I will definitely order from this store again...

name: G Willi
text: Great pizza and service here!

name: Dennis Krill
text: Probably the best Papa John's I've ever had. Delivery was fast and friendly, pizza was excellent

name: maya teasley
text: The worst pizza that I ever gotten from papa John and I eat all over the south east US took me 145 minutes to get my pizza when they said 45 minutes it was cold and not eatable

name: Vance Fincher
text: Great food for the money.

name: Kay Handley
text: It took over an hour to get to my place after they said 45 mins.  It was cold and nasty by the time it arrived.  I only live 3 miles from the store.

name: Samantha Obryant
text: The service was great ! Order was delicious & quick . I definitely recommend !

name: Rob Z
text: Don't let the bad reviews deter you. I ordered and got my nice and hot pie in under 45-minutes. Same great quality you expect from Papa John's. Will gladly order from again.

name: Bob Scidmore
text: They lost our order and had to sit in the parking lot for 10 minutes as they made a new pizza. Seemed poorly managed. Next time: this time we picked up when they said and the pizza was hardly even "warm".

name: Angelina Warwick
text: Terrible customer service and I never get extra cheese even though they charge for it. It's really a shame they could not break a $100 too...

name: Courtney & Jimmy
text: Great delivery time!

name: Courtney Cole
text: Great delivery driver! With quick and speedy, deliciously hot food

name: Chris Williams
text: Phone rang busy for an hour then someone finally picked up and immediately hung the phone up again.

name: Greg McKee
text: Pizza was good, I did find a hair in the pizza, it was a long hair, at first I thought it to be a tough piece of cheese, but nope it was along hair. I would rate the place a 5, but the hair was a big turn off for me.

name: Azhara Tagaibekova
text: Very rude delivery guy. I thought people order delivery cause they are currently not able to go out. In my case I couldn't walk because of my back pain but this guy was rude from the gate pass to my building. And made me to come downstairs to get the order. The Worst first and last experience with Papa John's pizza.

name: Eric Saffle
text: Great service! Pizza was right on spot. Perfect amount of toppings. Extremely helpful and kind service!

name: Robert Fike
text:
I don't know what some of the negative reviews are all about, as we have had great service.
Order pizza for delivery, comes quick and hot.
Exactly as ordered.

name: Polly Buck
text: Great pizza. Friendly staff. Excellent service. What more could you ask for?

name: Anne Stewart
text: Have to be paying attention to find it but the pizza was great as usual.

name: Greystone Travel
text: Good quality & Friendly service. Great Perm Garlic Wings

name: Joe Ferniany
text: I greatly enjoyed drinking my Dr Wham under the watchful eye of Father Johnathan

name: Caleb Holland
text: One of the best places around for pizza! Great prices and awesome delivery times!!!

name: amber Jones
text: Love the food and people !!!!  Granted delivery has crazytimes sometimes because of how busy they are but I love am they're the bomb

name: Tania Wilcox
text: Order was wrong and Online coupons were not eligible at this location.

name: Michael Converse
text: Used App to order and it was done just right.

name: Bradford Monk
text: The staff is always friendly and the pizza is always right, fast and delicious.

name: Joshua Mildren
text: I have ordered from this terrible Papa Johns by mistake many times. I thought that by giving them another chance I might get better server, especially since they are delivering to a LOCALS address and not a tourist spot. They have delivered cold pizza, and told me that they will take another hour and a half to deliver sauce cups when I just wanted my money back. Once they told me that they would create an account for me, for another thing they DIDN'T deliver and once I called them on it, they said that it never happened and the account cannot be created. The "manager" treated me like a jerk and is really a piece of s%#$ who needs to get his act together. I mean seriously how difficult is it to have your delivery drivers, take a container for extra sauce, when they go out on their delivery runs? Then you tell me it's going to take an hour and a half to get what I paid for? I know it's only a couple bucks, but you're better off to just tell me to "f off, I'm keeping the money" than to tell me it's going to be an hour and half

name: J P
text:
!!!!! WARNING!!!!!!!
Pizza and wings get under cooked alot and when u pay extra for the pepper on the side they forget to put the pepper in the box or when you order thin they give you regular. (ALSO im a Local thay prefer papa john over all other pizza places) I tip good I dont understand why they expect you to pay $$$full price$$$for a ((((((HALF @$# JOB!!!!)))))) I work in the restaurants down here also so I know the volume high pace but also you have to do the job also. SO COME ON PAPA JOHN STEP UP ACTUALLY HIRE SOME PEOPLE THAT CAN DO THE JOB

name: Chelsea Cholley
text: Have good service in food and they delivered quick.

name: Abbie Foster
text: Ordered online, but they cancelled the order, without notification. I called, someone answered then hung up. I called back and finally go through. They were “out of cheese”

name: Jennifer Gafford Gafford
text: Great service..great food in a timely manner

name: Siddhi TF
text: The employes were Quick and kind

name: Chris Bearden
text: good food and friendly staff

name: Patti Fretwell
text: Waited over an hour and a half for delivery. Refused pizza that was cold and not even an offer to reduce price or future order.

name: Daniel Finney

Ordered an hour ago.  Was told 25 minutes.
Arrived in 20 and was told it's on the rack 7-8 minutes.
20 minutes later, told it's in oven.
25 minutes later, still waiting.

text:
!!!WARNING!!!

Sent the WRONG PIZZA. Wouldn't issue a refund. Manager didn't care at all. Very disappointing.
