name: ian smith
text: Worst customer service in America was put on hold for 15 minutes to place a call in order for one pizza got there 30 min later to pick it up and waited another 15 minutes in front of the cash register while 5 employees just stood there and my pizza was already done then when someone finally came to the cash register they started giving pizzas to people that walked in after mr

name: Steven Davidson
text: Best Pizza on the planet!

name: Anthony Aram Gill
text: Quality ingredients and good pizza!

name: ROBBIE HARRIS
text: Sucked

name: Lisa Boyett
text: Good pizza

name: Josh Hamby
text: Fresh and hot pizza

name: Blake Houchens
text: Fast, easy, and friendly.

name: Robert Walker
text: Fast and friendly

name: Andy Wallingsford
text: It's okay, kids were craving a pizza so we stopped in to pick one up. It was average for Papa John's.

name: Stephen Crews
text: Horrible service. After talking to the manager, who really didn't give a crap, we decided to cancel our order and go to Foley.

name: wood den
text: When an employee of this location stole our cell phone, the manager refused to talk to us and was uncooperative.  We had to call the police to eventually get our phone back.  Very unprofessional

name: Ok Xack
text:
I ordered delivery, they got my first order wrong they said they would make another correctly and deliver it again. I waited an hour and a half to call back for them to basically tell me they forgot to remake my order and had to wait another 45 minutes to an hour for them to bring the correct order.
The food isnt bad but the service is next to nothing.

name: Giselle Carney
text: Sooo good I love this food !! 🤩

name: Jesse Randall
text: Food is always great, portions are generous. Price is reasonable and delivery is on point sometimes as quickly as 20 minutes the food will arrive at our house with a 😃 smile!

name: Donna C.
text: The sweet and sour chicken is delicious, the chicken fried rice has a ton of yummy chicken in it, and the eggrolls are crispy and tasty. Delivery is fast and polite (you can order through their website). They take covid safety seriously so I appreciate that!

name: Chris Delorenzo
text:
Ordered and waiting 75 minutes to get delivered. Its sunday night, so typically a slow night. As I started to eat, I encountered several bites that had BONES.

Buyer beware

name: Tiffany McClellan
text:
5 star experience for my first time ordering their delivery! Lots of food in their lunch specials. I got sesame chicken and chicken chow mein and it was enough for 2 adults and 2 kids, with some leftover.

I was impressed with the delivery driver also. He was kind and got here without needing extra directions!

name: Jus Redd
text: This was my first  and last time visiting this restaurant. The food was horrible!! Do not waste your time and hard earned money on this place..

name: Cliff Edwards
text: I normally don't do reviews but this is necessary. I've had Chinese food from many different places all over the country and this is the worst food ever. I ordered nearly $50.00 worth of food and it was all horrible. The beef was burned, the egg rolls were over cooked, the chicken wings were burned and cooked in old overused oil. Even the wonton soup was terrible. Absolutely unbelievable 👎

name: Dean Pullin
text: This is our go-to Chinese food delivery restaurant.  The food is consistently excellent and delivery is quick.  I’m not sure why they don’t have better reviews.  We have been eating here for almost 4 years.  I guess more people who are dissatisfied are more apt to leave poor reviews.  Too bad, because the egg drop soup, house fried rice, and spicy chicken dish are among our favorites.

name: Debbie Ireland
text: Great food and fast delivery.  We order here from work quite a bit and the food never takes long to get there and is always hot and delicious.  Love their Mongolian Shrimp.  Hot and Sour soup is awesome too.  Highly recommend!

name: Sharon Payne
text:
Ordered lunch today..Chicken and broccoli and Three delicacies. Asked for my food to be made spicy.  when I opened Chicken and broccoli the chicken was as white as Styrofoam and it wasnt spicy at all. I have never had it to look like this and I order from here alot. When I called to ask about it I was told I have to ask for brown sauce. Never been told that before.
Bad customer service..

name: Lindsey Motes
text: Just moved here and me and my husband decided to try this place. We ordered the general tso and orange chicken and let me tell you it was so unbearably spicy we could not eat it. We ended up throwing it out. If you are sensitive to spice I suggest trying something else. We will not be ordering those two things again!🥵

name: David White
text: The general tso's is 🔥 in every way! Definitely not the same recipe as everywhere else, but delicious! Be sure to get the homemade spicy mustard for your eggrolls too. Did I mention these guys deliver super fast...

name: Chris Delorenzo
text:
Ordered and waiting 75 minutes to get delivered. Its sunday night, so typically a slow night. As I started to eat, I encountered several bites that had BONES.

Buyer beware

name: Jeruscha Gaubert
text: Steamed rice made to perfection. Delivery lady had a great attitude. Overall great price for what you get. Thank you

name: Amber Burgett
text:
Seriously some of the best Chinese food I’ve ever eaten😋! And I love that they deliver! And they are always super polite 🙂

Definitely a must try if you love Chinese!

Edited to add: I had ordered delivery and when I called they were obviously super busy. When I got my order I was short the rice. I called them back and after apologizing profusely, they brought me my missing rice, getting to my apartment with it very quickly. Very impressed with the level of customer service!

name: Alabama Jenny
text:
Never a bad meal. Always fresh and hot. We love the chicken fried rice, Sesame Chicken and egg rolls. Owners and operators so courteous. We have been customers since they were Hunan Express, Yo express and now Beijing.

*My reviews are authentic.

name: Kahlil Baker
text: This may have been the best chicken lo mein ever!

name: Share Events
text: My wife and I travel through Hoover frequently.  And every time we stay over night we order from Beijing Express!  They have very good sweet & sour pork.  But the thing that is awesome is the General Tso's chicken!!  As mentioned by others, their delivery is always fast.  And on occasion the delivery comes by way of an Asian Lady, who's establishment I believe the restaurant is.  You can't go wrong with this Chinese Delivery!

name: joe musulman
text: GREAT FOOD GREAT SERVICE GREAT STAFF. CHECK IT OUT

name: Jesse Randall
text: We have picked up and had food delivered several times.  We have never had any issues either way.  The food is good and hot. Portion sizes are generous. The guy that works the counter will give you a time estimate that's spot  on. Some of these reviews make me think they are talking about a different restaurant or have unrealistic expectations.

name: Katha Stanley
text: Put order in by 4:30 and didn't receive until after 6. Food was just warm. My son and I got same entree but one spicy and other med. Spicy. Got 2 different size containers and didn't specify in English what was what.  Crab Rangoon was very tasty.

name: Brianna Yob
text: I have ordered from this place several times and have received good food and good service. I ordered today and it will be the last time. I ordered chicken chow mein and when I opened the container it was a box full of mushy noodles and huge chunks of mushrooms and onions. I started picking through the mush and found a black hair in it. I knew that this was not my hair since it is long and brown. My boyfriend went to take it back and they told him that they will not take it back or offer a refund. He came back with the nasty food and a ($1) cup of complementary noodles that were cold. I do not recommend eating here or giving these people your money because you will not always receive what you order.

name: Chelsey Jones
text: While I am not a huge fan of chinese food, My husband has been enjoying your food since we moved here almost 3 years ago. Fast delivery, and delivery orders taken 40 mins to close are met with appreciation for business, not attitude. I have picked food up several times, and everyone is so nice, and they always make sure to repeat the order back. I appreciate feeling appreciated.

name: Brittany M.
text: I placed a huge order over the phone and they were very efficient. Everything was perfect and the food was outstanding!! The people are friendly, delivery was fast, and you can't beat the price for the lunch specials.

name: Ma'rie h
text: Ordered online - when I returned home, I was shorted 1 soup & instead of sechzuan beef, I got chicken.  Not only was it not spicy, it had no determinable seasoning that I could taste. The Mongolian beef & eggrolls were good, & the hot & sour soup was better than average.  I will stick to soup here.

name: Jennifer Jackson
text: The worst Chinese Food I've ever had.. Ordered sesame chicken with fried rice and egg roll. Smh.. What the hell I just ordered from Beijing Express. I can say it was a waste of money. I do know this they will not ever get my money ever AGAIN!!

name: Ashley VanScyoc
text: We love the convenience of the delivery! Easy online ordering and good food. It's definitely our go-to!

name: alyjah Royalty
text: The food here is amazing! the white American guy at the counter can be a little smart-ass and ornery but to me the food is the most important thing. That's the first place I think of anytime I want Chinese. They also deliver and if you're lucky you'll open the door to a little hot body redhead named Amber. You like to see her coming cuz she's got your food and you're hungry. BUT you'll REALLY LOVE watching her go!!

name: Rider 0401
text: We recently found out that they deliver so we gave them a try (with kids it's hard for us to go out to dinner during the week).  We have ordered several times now and the food is always fresh, delicious and hot!  They are always on time and the staff is fantastic!  No more pizza for us!

name: AccosiasEase
text: It's an ok place for Chinese food. The older lady who delivers is the best. She's always happy and smiling.

name: Erica Cotter-Holloway
text: Best Chinese on this side of town

name: Irem Ozay
text: Visiting from a long cross-country road trip, called this place for a quick dinner. The delivery man brought it up to our hotel room, was very friendly, and the food was one of the best Chinese dishes we've had! We got the sweet and sour chicken, lo mein, fried rice, and beef and broccoli. Really good :)

name: Nina Thompson
text: Sesame chicken is on point. ..no fake red sauce on this!  I love it and the Mongolian beef is pretty good as well. .my first time here. .but will definitely will be back! !

name: LeeAnne
text: I don’t give five star ratings unless it’s earned! Haven’t eaten here in years, not sure what you changed but omg the food is so good! I ordered after 2pm on a week day and was scared it would be cold and greasy... NO.... so hot that I burned my tounge eating soup not testing temp....it’s ok worth it... I bought dinner portion and it’s more than enough for 2...garlic chicken so perfect... u taste the fresh garlic not powder!!!! Crab rangu with actual crab u see and taste .... not just a dab of cream cheese that fries out ..... so delicious!!!! Beef low mein ....perfect perfect perfect and donuts for dessert!!!!! We just found our next favorite Chinese Restaurant... like I said I moved out of town for years and came back... really wanted Chinese after being sick 😷 for days!!! Give them a try. The delivery lady I think probably cooked everything herself!!!! So perfect 👌🏻! Only complaint is it’s easier just to call and order than order online! Don’t waist your time... just call them! So pleased! Keep up the great cooking!

name: Zachary Tatom
text: Beijing Express has good Chinese food that really is quick, whether you stop in to pick up an order or get delivery.  The prices are good and the online ordering is really convenient.

name: Raeann Donnenwirth
text:
It has been over an hour since I've ordered and my food has not shown up. They are less than a mile from my apartment. I tried to call and check on my order, but the woman who answered the phone simply told me "it's on the way" without even asking my name or anything to confirm the order. She was very rude, following that statement with "okay bye."

Edit: Changed to two stars; the woman who brought the food (after almost an hour and a half) was very friendly and apologetic. The food was good.

name: jeff lentz
text: I thought I ordered beef... apparently I ordered the Mongolian onion. The few pieces of beef I got were pretty good, if you could find them through the onion.

name: Ted Dower
text: Liked them just fine and was a faithful weekly customer until they shamed me for ordering thirty minutes before close. Will not give them any more business. Have taken my business to New China, which have larger portions at a similar if not better quality.

name: Alex White
text: Food was pretty good. "I've had better". The delivery driver was a total douche. He called me and asked how far I was from the restaurant, right after I ordered. I told him I didn't know because I was from out of town, and when he brought me my food he complained about having to drive 10 miles to get to me. He had my zip code, coulda said he wasn't doing it and I would have gotten food somewhere else. We all have a job we have to do buddy. I still tipped well because I believe in karma.

name: Tha_Afro_ Gemini
text: I love ...love...love this place ....the guy thats there on the weekdays remember me and that to me ...means alot ...the food is great and the staff is even better

name: Shaquita Smith
text: The food was good but my drink was left out the bag and the reason for two stars is because the delivery guy made a little comment about tips. I had a tip for him but decided to keep it after that little remark and now I'm glad I did. The lady also said they would bring my drink but I still haven't received it. I'm not being to petty for a drink the comment about the tip is what really blew me because of the fact I didn't receive everything I ordered and he wants a tip. Never again.

name: Juaneva Heath
text: Very good & fresh food.

name: J C
text: If I could give them no star rating I would! This has been the worst experience ever, who ever the guy is taking the orders on the phone needs training with his customer service and people skills. He was the worst from the whole experience. Not only were the orders wrong but his smart aleck mouth and rude attitude top it off, I don't know how this restaurant is going to make it with an employee like that. I nor my company team will ever order from here again.

name: Carolina Sandoval
text: They messed up our order. On top of the man behind the counter was rude. Charged us extra for the sweet and sour sauce that we didn't get. To top it off the food was just bland.

name: Pete Pritchard
text:
When we heard Yoe Express was closed, we had trepidations.  The food was good just like it used to be, but attention to customer service is not what it once was.  They neglected to bring my rice with my Sesame Chicken.  When I called back they said a driver would bring it ASAP.  Never came.  Tried to call and they didn't answer.  Too bad, a hoover institution for good delivery appears to be lacking.

The food delivered was delicious, just check and make sure you got what you ordered before the driver leaves.

name: Hannah Lacy
text: Food was okay... Not great considering the price and portion size. Prob won't go again.

name: Z Smith
text: I placed an order for delivery and when the guy arrived, part of the order was missing. I called the restaurant and told them was missing and the lady on the phone was very argumentative, but agreed to get it sent back out. It never arrived. I ordered egg drop soup and got no noodles, paid extra for fried rice and got white rice. Also, I ordered moo goo gai pan and specifically said NO water chestnuts but my dish was loaded with them. Thankfully my allergic reaction wasn’t serious!! I’ll never order from them again. I DO NOT recommend this place.

name: Amelia King
text: Called in to place my regular order. They delivered an item that I didn't order and didn't send what I actually ordered. Called to get the mistake fixed and initially the lady that answered the phone said they could bring me my food. I then received a call back from the guy that took my order in the first place. He was incredibly irate and rude. Told me what I ordered according to him. I told him I didn't even know what was sent to us so how could I have ordered it. He just kept repeating himself. He said he repeated the order back to me and that I confirmed that it was correct. That is a blatant lie. He has never repeated my order back to me. After much sighing and huffing on his part he finally said he could get what I actually ordered to me in about an hour. I hung up the phone. To be treated like a fool because of your idiocy is ridiculous. You could have easily avoided/rectified this mistake but instead you chose to behave like an insolent brat. Good on you. Lesson learned. Will be ordering from Panda Express in the future

name: Robert Sanders
text: The food is excellent but a little pricey

name: Coalie Maples
text: Amazing food and they give you a very large amount.

name: Darryl Massey
text:
Great food..Guy that runs the place is a good juggler handling 2 phones an always reads your order back to you..2 internet companies a fax machine an people walking in to place orders on top of some cooking an directing delivery routes for drivers...geez I couldn't do it..deliveries are quick but on Fridays and rainy nights sometimes an hour for delivery..been ordering for years always good..nobodys perfect sometimes things get left out of my order but they make it up....i always tip the drivers that is how they make their living an they put wear an tear on their car ...fairly nice crew of people but like everybody they have their bad days too..if I had to deal with 100 customers  a day Especially some drunk ones or rude ones or some not prepared to order I ould be a cranky person to....
Overall I give them 5 stars

name: Rachel E. Smith
text: Literally our most favorite Chinese take out ever!

name: Azziza S
text: Tasty Chinese food, reasonable prices and delivery! What's not to love? 💘

name: T Denton
text: I enjoyed the fried rice for lunch.

name: S ramsay
text: Ordered here called and complained was told you live and learn, man was very curt and inconsiderate also checked my statement where i was charged extra....never eating here again! This guy wouldn't know customer service if it slapped him in the face

name: Chrisse Plummer
text: The food is full of flavor, customer service is excellent and the price is worth it very large plate of food and I’m hooked.

name: Mike Slicer
text: Put it this way. The 2nd most disgusting thing I've ever put in my mouth was this establishment's Hot n Sour Soup and the most disgusting thing I have ever eaten was their Hunan Chicken. I'm talking simply unedible. I don't see how a chef serves it. Its also overpriced and management is rude, frugal.

name: Jeremy Thomas
text: Good food place that deliver

name: Vanessa skripko
text: Yummy food fast service but their buns are made very wrong

name: Natesha Speight
text: Absolutely love this place! We have always ordered from here since we moved to this side of town.

name: Bailey Stephens
text: The only Chinese I will eat in Birmingham. AMAZING!

name: Amy Bennett
text: Delivery driver was awesome but food was over cooked and they acted like we were crazy for telling them. Very rude.

name: Zipora Bloodsaw
text: Quick service but food is not tasty

name: Billy Stevenson
text:
Nasty the sweet and sour chicken tasted like it was just microwaved

It took 1 hour to get here even though I don't live but a mile away from them

The food is so bad I wouldn't even feed it to my dog if I could give this a 0 rating I would

name: Simply Sherlyn
text: I ate my house fried rice from the top and as soon as I get to the bottom I find a dead small cockroach was inside my food!

name: Yoshiko Legg
text: Food OK.  Very bad customer service. Will not return.

name: Aiden Laughlin
text: Pretty good but service isn't great

name: Tracy Thomas-Prickett
text: Fabulous as always. Got my food in less than 30 minutes 🍜

name: Michael Parsons
text: Usually pretty good. Over priced, but good (usually).

name: Stephanie McRae
text: Made sure to even put into notes we need silverware since we r in  hotel, tipped and everything and they didn't put even 1 napkin in the bag, food was so so...

name: Louise “Weezie” Weldy
text: Gone diwnhill a bit.

name: Jon j
text: Fast delivery. Good food.

name: Logan A
text: By far, the best chinese in the area, and they deliver.  Can't beat that.

name: Krissy W.
text: It's okay most the time

name: Ronnie Mas1
text: Consistently Good

name: Savannah Slaughter
text:
They are REALLY good!!!!
I would KILL to eat there again!!!!

name: Brenda White
text: Perfect house rice noodle..generous servings....fast delivery. ....

name: Nina Williams
text: Love every bite at this place 😍

name: Shaneka Davis
text: Love the food and that they deliver.

name: Donna Collins
text: Food is good..just fried shrimp rice for 8$ had 6 shrimp in it and house soup for 2 is broth with a piece or 2 of meat and about 4 veggies...A total rip off.

name: Becky Woodman
text: Great food and they deliver!!

name: Ghost_kllr-7
text: Not bad

name: Nina Williams
text: Love this place! ! Top Notch!

name: Yashica Watson
text: Excellent!!

name: yan zhimin
text: Good food and delivery on time!

name: Just Jacksons
text: Great food but horrible service they overcharged my card not once but twice for $15.00 each time and i didnt even do delivery I Will never ever eat from here again

name: Mac Mac
text:
(Translated by Google) The place is fine

(Original)
Se bien el lugar

name: Marcial Mejia
text:
(Translated by Google) Guido

(Original)
Guido

name: S G
text:
Waited an hour and a half when promised an hour. Pizza was made correctly but was cold. Called to check on status; while on hold, the pizza arrived, and I put it in the oven to heat and stayed on the phone to complain that it was late and cold. After 15 minutes on hold, I hung up.
We hadn’t ordered from Domino’s for a couple of years or more due to multiple problems with late, cold, incorrect orders. We preferred to order from Papa Murphy’s, but found out today that they closed. What a sad day for Leeds! Not only was the pizza far superior, but it was much less expensive. From now on, I’ll make my own pizza. There are no good options for pizza in Leeds. That is pitiful.

name: Wolf J. Flywheel
text: I order from here like 3 to 5 times a week. I've even placed 2 orders in the same day. This Domino's is solid. 5 out of 5 stars, because 6 out of 5 isn't possible. 👌💪🤘🍕🍗 🥦🔥☁😑

name: Lynn Cleghorn
text: If I could give a negative star I would. These are the absolute rudest people with the social skills of a snake. I ordered online contact less curbside pick up at 6 pm. The tracker said it would be done between 621 and 631. At 640 they still hadn't brought it out.  I went in. They hadn't even started it. I asked for a refund, especially after I looked over at a pizza a lady was returning that was burnt to a crisp. They said 3 to 5 days for the refund. And were rude about it. They could care less of they lose business.  But let me tell you I have a big mouth and will make  sure that I tell everyone I know to go elsewhere.  I've never hoped a business would go under. Buy this place would be better served to clean house and start over from scratch with people who want to work.

name: Nia Green
text: This place is literally horrible. I’ve been waiting for my food patiently for 2 hours. This isn’t the first time i got food from here, & I don’t know why i decided to even give them another chance. The customer service is horrible, they all have attitudes, especially the driver. Like how are y’all going to all have attitudes? No one told them to get this job. No one forced them to work.  i’m honestly so upset but i don’t want my ghetto side to come out. So, anyway.... if you thinking about ordering here, DON’T.

name: adam ledbetter
text: Was on hold for over 30 minutes before I gave up.

name: Ky Jones
text: Food was perfect! Would have given 5 stars if the people working there weren’t in a competition at being the rudest person on the planet... Weird.

name: Heather Conn
text: It seems there is always some problem. Couple of weeks ago I waited on my deliver for 3 1/2 hours. Finally I went up to the store, door locked. I asked guy that works the add he was taken trash out. About my order. He said all orders were cancelled and refunded. Mind you its now 12@ night. I was not notified, he answered  he didn't send any info on it bout it. So many people were lined up around whatabuger BC of this. Someone needs to get help in there or clean house fresh employees to do the job. Have lived here for 1yr and I still havent had a good experience. Always a problem ..never solving issue

name: Stephanie McElmurray
text: As much money as we spend with this Dominos, and we call to complain about there not being the extra cheese we ordered, the guy on Friday May 21st at 8:22pm put me on hold for a long time only to come back to say he'd be glad to retake my order for me to pay for. Really? I told him I'd bring the pizza back, to which he just sat there. You have lost a valuable customer Sir, and I'll make sure to call the owners at how rude you were. What ever happened to customer service?

name: Savannah Stamps
text: We placed an order for delivery at 7:57 and checked the status of our order at 9:00 pm. It said our order was being prepped, so I called the store, waited on hold for 10 minutes and when the lady picked up, I asked about our order. She immediately said, “we just don’t have the staff to do all these orders so I’ll cancel it.” I told her we would still like to order and she said “well we haven’t started making it yet.” I expressed my frustration and asked her how we would’ve been notified if we didn’t call and she said that she’s already gave us a refund. When I asked how we would get our rewards back that we redeemed on our order she hung up. So I called back, placed on hold for 4 minutes this time and asked her how we would get our rewards back and she said “I dont know how you would do that, I dont know how to work the website.” We’ve always chosen dominoes over any other chain pizza but I think we will head on over to Papa John’s next time and see if they are competent enough to make a pizza and have it delivered in under an hour, or at least communicate properly.

name: Michael Donnelly
text: Always on time. Never had any problems.

name: Terry Brown
text: Dominoes was good but they did burn my first pizza and tried to serve it to me. Luckily I checked before getting too far away. But they replaced it for me and fixed the issue. The food was tasty .

name: Freebie Babe
text:
Wow. I ordered my food at 9 pm on 4/24. It is now 12:35am the next day and I never received my food. Their phone lines are busy and the tracking is no longer available. Never again will I order from them.

Update: I called the next day and asked to speak to the Manager. The Manager says to me, "Yeah what's up? I mean my bad.How can I help help?"

What kind of ghetto establishment is this? I consistantly ordered from there and always tipped. They lost a valued customer. No apology was given and no incentitive. Not to mention an employee in the background was getting smart with the Manager because I asked for a confirmation on my refund. Wow.

name: Daniel Davis
text: The worst experience I’ve even had with any food place! I don’t even Write reviews but this was so awful, food was cold, wrong, and over 2 hours late!

name: Forbidden Goddess
text: Very very slow and always cold pizzas. Need to do better

name: Fred Westrom
text:
The food is always good enough, but the delivery service is extremely inconsistent.
I have frequently waited 2 or more hours for deliveries from the Leeds dominos when the website predicts 25-45 minutes.
Consider calling the manager in person to place your order and ask if they can deliver in reasonable time because sometimes they just don't or can't.
Frequently when they are busy they don't even answer the phone so you can't even check on your order.

I restate though that the food is usually what you expect.
It could just take a long time to get your order.

I do still order from them.  I just have very low expectations when I do.

name: Loren Henderson
text: Terrible customer service. Employees clearly do not care and management does not hold them accountable whatsoever. I will go out of my way to pick up rather than use this location. 0/10 do not recommend.

name: Beckii Perea
text: Extremely laid back atosophere.  They were helpful with local deal's.

name: Elizabeth Bendall
text: WORST PLACE EVER!! Was promised 15 minutes and ordered at 7:10 and was ready at 8:20. Late to our movie and the place was disgusting.

name: Geoffrey Allen
text: I was pretty mad that every other Pizza place in the area was closed by 9pm. We chose to go to dominoes as a last resort and boy that was a mistake. Our experience with Noah was hands down the best customer service experience that we have had in a long time. He provided us with menu choices as we had no idea what we wanted. He even knew the exact cost of menu items after tax. Excellent customer service we will definitely be back.

name: JACOB FREEZE
text: This is the worst food service establishment in history. I should have learned after the experience that took us 3 hours to finally cancel a pizza that never came. I ordered a pizza and chicken around 10:15 on a Monday. An hour later the order is still in prep. I called the store to be put on hold for 20 minutes. I drive to the location and when i show up the phone is ringing and the manager just walks lazily out of the back. He hasn’t made the food, he isn’t doing anything. He says he has one driver that is about to quit. He asks if he can give me something for free. I said my food. He says he’d have to make it. This place would be better off as a parking lot. Add to that Domino’s has no real corporate support for these situations and you’re in for an evening of pulling your hair out.

name: rick baker
text:
The pizza arrived on time but it was Cold no cheese barely any toppings
Just a bad pizza

name: Josh Locklear
text: Absolutely horrible service. Called to check on my order, keep in mind I live less than 2 minutes away, and was told it would be right to me. An hour later, still no food.

name: Bradley Soto
text: Pizza was burnt and not even cut. Not even cut!!! Both of them!

name: N C
text: They will cancel your order after making you wait over an hour, not contact you to tell you if anything is wrong, and have an angry response for you when they finally answer after making you hold for 15 minutes on the phone. Save your money and just order from carpenetti's.

name: Caleb Smith
text: I understand being understaffed, but I waited for my food for hours with no call and the store wouldn’t answer the phone either. Never received my pizza and still am waiting for a refund.

name: Miguel Gabriel
text: Too expensive   small pizza $15  ridiculous  had about six pieces of sausage  a couple of pepperoni  never again

name: Nicholas Toth
text: Very nice people and good food.

name: slydawg97
text: Placed an order that was "being prepared " for 1.5 hours, called and sat on hold for 10 minutes only for someone to pick up the phone and hang it back up. Went to the store that was for once not understaffed and not busy, the cashier said she'd check the status of it but who the hell wants the food that long after ordering, they didn't even give me a refund, just a store credit for next time as if there's ever gonna be one

name: Austin Park
text: Got lunch from here for carryout and it was ready   in about 10min and tasted great!

name: Ethan Keating
text: Me and eboi just had the best pan pizza we ever done ate. Man that was good. Hold that crown, kings

name: Nicholas Toth
text: Great people and good food.

name: Oshun El
text: Food made wrong i waited an hour on a 45min wait time. Dont order from here it took 3people to get on the phone to do a refund

name: ashley decker
text: I don’t normally do reviews but let me start off with the lady on the phone was great. She was trying to help me. Now I ordered the $19 mean deal 2 pizzas parmesan bites and a 2 L and cinnamon twist. I got everything came inside got everything out and the Parmesan bites had nothing on them no butter no cheese so I live 3 mins from there. I called them asked if they can just send me some more.... she said yes but you’ll have to pay the delivery charge... uh no I already paid it once for the order to be right but it wasn’t she said ma’am I can give you a credit I said okay I’m thinking she just going to refund me the amount that it was for just them. No she said it’s a credit for when I want to order again I can call them. She said they are under new management and couldn’t do anything but what she has already tried to do... I was done fighting I just said okay thanks and hung up. I’m tired of this dominos not the first time something like this happened at this one.

name: Sareena Bagley
text: I wouldn't even give one star. Placed order at 7pm and it said Dustin was preparing.  Went to the store because nobody would answer the phone and they said they had not even started preparing yet, 8:57pm... plus, they acted like they could care less. So, I canceled my order and its a Sunday where everything closes at 9pm. Dominos, you SUCK....

name: Christopher Nix
text: Placed an order online a whole hour before they closed and they rejected my order. Negative five stars. Horrible service

name: Hannah Abrams
text: Well after my order took longer than it should, my drink was not included. So the guy ran to the store and then when I opened my box of pizza I didn’t receive any of the sauces I PAID for. Is didn’t even come with the regular garlic sauce. So I have been on the phone waiting for someone to answer for 10 minutes trying to let them know to bring the sauces with the drink. But of course, no one is answering. I’ll just start going back to Papa Johns.

name: JT Kendrick
text: Order took over an hour on more then one occasion, didn’t answer any phone calls.

name: TJ Piazza
text: Ordered a pizza at 845PM for delivery. Called the store at 10:30pm requesting an update and was left on hold for 15 minutes while some one went to “check” called back at 11PM and was told they’re short staffed and had to cancel my order. It took them 2 hours to tell me that. Ridiculous

name: manuel delgado
text: Very bad, I waited 1:30 and I saw a lot of people making complaints

name: Jeff Viehland
text: Don't expect curbside delivery, when there so busy. corporate should resend the ad. If they only had a clue.

name: Carl Benefield
text: Twice now it has taken over two hoirs to receive our pizza. I habe called multuple times and have never been able to speak with anyone.

name: heather kelly
text: Ordered boneless chicken tonight 2 buffalo and one plain from the Leeds, AL store. Got home I had 3 buffalo and one order was nothing but the crumbs cooked. Had to go back to the store, and when I got there a young gentleman asked what was the problem I asked for a manager another young gentleman said Im the manger. I opened the box and "YES" I tossed the open box on the counter and ask is this what you have people pay $8 for (trash) crumbs. The young kid said I can give you a free order NO its called replacement. Was waiting in truck when one of the employees came out and tossed the box of chicken on top of my hood and walked away. Then to top it off NOT one of the employees had on a mask.

name: Artie McIntyre
text: Very efficient and easy to use.

name: Debbie Alexander
text: Ordered pizza & it was burned & the garli c parmesan wings are just plain wings with what looks like dressing on them !! Won't order again

name: Jennifer Netherland
text: If I could give them zero I would ordered my pizza at 10:30, being the patient person I am I calmly wait at 11:57 it stated my driver left. Never showed up, and I called the store for an hour and no one answered. I am livid , and will never go to dominos again. I tipped 25% and can't even get my money back for pizza I never received.

name: Cherryl Streeter
text: The pizza was horrible.  The customer Service was excellent.

name: Jon Bryant
text: Average pizza and average customer service

name: YoungSandwich
text: its service is slow and its attention to detail is lacking such as if you dont want a certain thing such as onions on your food it will be ignored so i wouldn't even bother with requesting it to be taken off but outside of that and its extremely long time before you receive your order its ok i suppose as long as you are willing to wait 2 hours maybe more before getting it

name: Andy Hawkins
text: No one answers phone after recording. On hold for 15 minutes or more.

name: Bobbie Jean
text: Was doing an online order. But couldn't because I had to pay with card and only have Cash

name: Robin Ransom
text: If I could I would give this place a ZERO! I have tired to give them the benefit of the doubt, however that third times a charm! First time delivered burnt pizza and yet still was delivered when it was “checked”, 2nd time they only had ONE driver and ONE cook with the driver having to deliver to 5 different homes once again why was delivery an option? 3rd time I wanted to see if they had anymore drivers to help with delivery since well today is Friday and should be a busy day and their should be more drivers to help speed things up plus my children wanted pizza, however it was taking up to 45 minutes  to an hour to deliver if I would have known that before selecting delivery things would have been different. Preparing and keeping quality should be number one! Delivery  should be the new norm and prepping should be done quickly as possible as well as workers being prompt to show that Dominos values and respects the rule of less contact is best and  social distancing is being taken seriously. Leeds,AL location lacks this lesson.I use to live in Hoover, AL  and would  order from the Vestavia Hills dominos and my order was done all within good timing and even on a FRIDAY at that! So for the manager to give such a poor excuse as to why they are not meeting the same expectation as a more populated area like Vestavia, AL  is just plan sad. Leeds location should not have ANY reason for such a long wait.For a small community you would think the turn around time would be within reasonable time frames. Plus per the manager they have SEVERAL drivers! So trust me save your money invest in Papa Johns!!

name: CHRISTOPHER TAYLOR
text: Drivers will get lost and blame me because they can't find my house. I haven't changed my address and have no control over their navigation.

name: Austin Park
text: Food is delicious. They get a little behind sometimes but you just gotta make sure to order ahead of time if you wanna order on the weekend

name: Bare Grilles
text: If bipolar disorder was a restuarant this Dominos would be it.

name: Collin Snider
text:
Ordered a pizza on the online app and waited 3 hours and called a couple of times before I finally went to the dominos myself. This was the day COVID-19 started and they had a sign on front of store claiming they were closed. Which is fine, I completely understand. That being said, no one was answering the phone to tell people this. What I do not understand is the young guy at the counter yelling at me and other people and telling them they would get their money back in a couple of days. There were a lot of cars waiting outside on the phone. We never got our money back and called corporate multiple times. Months later and still no refund.

I would not recommend doing business with this particular Dominos. They need a heavy dose of class.

name: Sophia Hussain
text: Absolutely do not order from this Domino’s. My fiancé wanted to order pizza for a zoom game night with his family and not only was it 2 hours late from the 1.5 hours it spent in quality control, it was cold by the time it got to my house. Then both my fiancé and I got food poisoning. When I called the next day (May 28th) and spoke to Ned who promised me a refund. One week later my account was still charged. I reported it to corporate and they basically brushed it off and said they reported it to the local owner. There has been no action since. This place sucks.

name: American Patriot
text: Domino's is always good.

name: Adrian Lacey
text: Every time I order a pizza from this location, it always arrives cold. It takes over an hour for me the receive my order even though I live less than 10 minutes away. When I use the tracker, it always sits at “quality check” for at least 30 to 40 minutes. I have been very unhappy and will most likely never order from here again. I hate that it has come to this because normally I really enjoy Dominos.

name: Brandon Coffey
text: The folks at the Leeds location do a great job. The pizzas/cheesey breads are always cooked well (not soggy in middle or burnt crust) Good attention to odd special instructions. The deals are great for fast family dinners before or after a ballgame/practice.

name: Adrian Lacey
text: Every time I order a pizza from this location, it always arrives cold. It takes over an hour for me the receive my order even though I live less than 10 minutes away. When I use the tracker, it always sits at “quality check” for at least 30 to 40 minutes. I have been very unhappy and will most likely never order from here again. I hate that it has come to this because normally I really enjoy Dominos.

name: Michael Altman
text: Was left on hold for thirty minutes, I literally had to drive to the store with the phone still running, didn't even get a please hold. Went into the store with only one customer, I could here the phone ringing,they were just ignoring it this really upsets me  since I  am a regular customer

name: Richard Diamond
text: Easy peasy like always.

name: Ashley Lewis
text: Couldn’t order on the app because it said the store was closed (at 7:30pm on a Monday). I called to try and make an order and was on hold for 30 minutes. Cool. Papa Johns it is

name: grace alexis
text: Ordered 2 pizzas. The pizzas tasted ok but the pizzas were cut terribly. On one of them the edges were burnt.

name: Chris Batton
text: Got crust wrong and was home before I noticed

name: Jazzed MO
text: Cold medium pizza (supposed to have been a large)..and raw chicken wings

name: BloodOfCrimson Roll Tide
text: Food is great!! The staff is really friendly as well. The best part about it that my son has the opportunity to watch the process from start to finish.

name: Todd Sims
text: Placed order at 7pm and was told would be approximately an hour. Started calling them at 8:30 to find out where pizza was....no answer....called again at 9pm....no answer. Called again at 9:15 and just let it ring until they answered. Was told they would cancel my order and refund me within 2-3 business days. Told them I would be there the next day to get cash. Was also told my pizzas were never even made. Hang up the phone and 15 minutes later the driver calls and says he's in my driveway. Cold pizzas and all. Never again.

name: Denise Mayo
text: We ordered a five topping large pizza! It was ready when told! the toppings were great!  A large number and covered the whole pizza!

name: Tammi Hinds
text: Absolutely love their Philly steak Pizza and their Vegetarian Pizza.  Only issue is they need to offer Coke Zero instead of Diet Coke.

name: Lynn Reece
text: Every time I try to place an order over the phone for delivery, they always say they can't deliver it to me because my order wasn't enough money ($13.00).  However, I can immediately go online and place an order for the exact same thing I tried to order when I called and the order goes thru with no problem.  How is that possible?

name: crazy cat Lady
text: Got their cinnamon twists to try & a hand tosses pepperoni pizza, & those twists are heavenly!! Also got one of their Caesar salads to try & was surprised how good it was. Beautiful green lettuce with delicious chicken and shredded cheese! Very happy with my visit!

name: Star Stemas
text: Good quality, decent wait time. In and out in thirty minutes, and saved money because of the enployees sharing information on deals.

name: Wanda Monti
text: Wonderful place, I actually was standing in Little Caesars ordering my Hot Wings. Little Caesars allowed my order to go through for the wings and they didn't have any. So I ordered the wings from Domino's while standing in Little Caesars. And of course Domino's had just what I was wanting. Thank you Domino's for an awesome dinner

name: Chris Jones
text: Horrible, Horrible, Horrible. Tracker said order was ready at 611, got the at 622 to be informed my order was not ready. Did find out that two of the 4 were sitting there and also once I got home found that I had someone else's order, so half of my pder was sent to someone else so they had to remake mine. The girl at the counter acted like it was a task to help me or anyone else that walked in. Once I finally got the pizzas and returned home, well Walmart deli pizza is better than this. Two of the 4 were burnt, the cheese bread was burnt on the outside and not done on the inside. Each pizza barely had any sauce at all on them, you could not see it or taste it. Just a very bad experience all over. I usually love Dominoes but this is ridiculous.

name: Samantha Smith
text: Delivery driver was fast earlier than 30 minutes  good job

name: Taylor Madsen
text: This location is THE BEST!!! We just moved here and they were very nice, welcoming and informative on the current deals and specials. You can even watch them make the pizza!! The pizza and cheesy bread was BOMB! 10/10!!!

name: Amanda Tucker
text: This is my favorite Dominos. I order here online at least 3 to 4 times a week. Thank u crew for always having my order ready on time and hot.

name: Shawn Hamby
text: Its dominoes. No more ..no less.  Courteous though

name: Slater Brazeal
text: I love Domino's Pizza in general because they are moderately priced and their Domino's app and rewards program makes ordering Pizza extra awesome! While I have never had any issues with product quality from this location on several occasions the pizza has been extremely late the last time my pizza tracker said my food had arrived when it had not and when I tried to call the store no one answered... Finally 20 minutes after my pizza "had arrived" my driver finally pulled up. He was polite but offered no apology.

name: Leslie
text: I always order from Domino's because I can watch how my order progresses, and they've always been nice to me. I would remove half a star because sometimes they under cook my pan pizzas. I like them crispy. But full credit for effort! :)

name: Lexi Williams
text: I’ve been waiting on my order for an hour and a half I call and guy yells saying I’m waiting on a driver still my pizza isn’t here and I payed 41 dollars for two pizzas

name: Joshua Dodson
text: The worst dominos i have ever they hung up in the midfle of me ordering my food dosnt take 50s or 100 doller bills the manager is rude as hell when i called to get the general managers number she wouldnt even tell me by far the worst dominos experience of my life

name: Minis Tirith
text: Trash service. All I can say.

name: Ericka Byers
text: My pizza is always good from here.

name: william powell
text: Still taste like cardboard with tomato sauce.

name: Melanie Payne
text: Deliciousness on thin crust! Had never had a Supreme on thin crust, and it was so much better than the thick crust version. Great service!

name: karen everett
text: Always get good service.

name: Alexis Colwell
text: pizza is always fresh tasting and hot when we pick it up. Has always been ready when we get there and no mistakes. We love the new deep dish pizza, so yummy!

name: Nickie DiMartino
text: Steak sub.... Very good

name: Matthew Pledger
text: Their driver kept almost $20 in change from my mother-in-law's order without her permission back in January 2018. She will never order again from Domino's (Cowabunga Pizza franchise from Atlanta) again. The previous local franchise owners took better care of their community than the Atlanta based Cowabunga ever will!!!

name: LRice 9018
text: Pizza was great tonight!

name: Emmerald Sado
text: Great place and always a deal

name: Austin Fondren
text: I would definitely dub this the highest quality pizza joint in the state.

name: Don Blackall
text: We ordered a pizza for delivery and it took the pizza place an entire hour just to prep it and another 3 just to get it to my house. I have no idea what has to go on in a management stand point here but something needs to change. Obviously things aren't working out if it takes 4 hours to get pizza delivered.

name: Jenn Cornwell
text: Ordered pizza and stuff at 7:26pm over an hour later still no pizza! Called on hold for over 17 minutes and never and answer or a call to say hey your pizza is gonna be late we are trying our best or something. Doesn’t make sense

name: Debra Cowan
text: Meat lovers was awesome..the 2nd pizza was to be thin crust n it wasnt. But roommate said it was still good. Live on Margeret, to far to drive back. Over all very good!

name: Bobby B
text: Their Philly Cheesesteak pizza is the best

name: Amylia Phillips
text: They stopped delivering to moody. I have been a loyal customer to this company. I always tipped well and even when they messed up my order I wouldn't be a bother. I am extremely unhappy with their new 9 minute rule.

name: Monica Montes
text: I like the quick service and the option to track the delivery using the “Tracker”. Drivers could be more fun when delivering, sometimes they don’t look happy.

name: Kelly Williamson
text: These guys rock. Food is always fresh, made correctly and on time (most of the time it's here early). ~Kelly W

name: Monica “Beautiful Moe” Henderson
text: The pizza was awful..it was full of grease. I took it back  the next day because It was night when I purchased it didn't feel like taking it back. They tried to give me a hard time about bringing it back..needless to say they gave me my money back 🤔

name: Tamika Miller
text: The staff are wonderful and the pizza is really good and their handmade pan crust is the best!

name: Vexing Devil
text: Pizzas were made correctly and on time every time I've been here. Couldn't give 5 stars tho, cuz they are very skimpy on the toppings and cheese

name: Tina Thomas
text: Just disappointed!  I finally convinced my husband to try Domino's again and our large Meatzza pizza was awful. I ordered online and watched the tracker to make sure we arrived on time to pick up our order.  He went in and had to wait almost 20 minutes to pick it up.  We opened it up at home and it hardly had any cheese on it after I ordered double cheese and paid for double cheese!  Also, very little meat and it was cold!  We only live about a mile from Domino's.  At least the bread twists were warm.   So disappointing.....guess no more Domino's now!

name: S M
text: They're okay, food sometimes takes a little longer than I'd like (45-70 minutes). Also even though they are less than 5 miles away it won't let me place the order online so I have to call. They know this, but when my order took over an hour last week they sent me a voucher as an apology and when I read it it's for a deal they already run and only for online orders which sucks. They do tend to over cook the food and a few of the employees are kind of unprofessional on the phone but all in all it's an average pizza joint so don't pay attention to the people judging so harshly. It's dominos not some high class restaurant guys.

name: Latonya Bowman
text: I'm not sure if they don't care what you order or if they are soooooo busy that they just cant get orders correct.

name: Alex Algiere
text: Always forgets to put hot sauce on my pizza, otherwise it's good.

name: Michael Howell
text: Every time I order late they cancel my order. You can’t order more than $25 on app for cash delivery. I order minimum of $300 a week from Pizza Hut in Moody. Receipts to prove it. This restaurant is hurting themselves by not accommodating this bar.

name: Cassandra Naylor
text: Clean store

name: Amanda Hatcher
text: I ordered over the phone. The man told me it would be 15 mins. When I got there they didn't have my pizzas. Also, they told me they couldn't take a $100 bill. Alot of people use cash over cards because of the identity theif. The guy that told me they didn't take 100's looked like he was high. I will not be back to that domino

name: Justin Gilbert
text: On time and very courteous!

name: Janet L Hunter
text: This was another awful experience and the last time I try to do business with Domino's pizza. I was told go to Sonic to get change for my order. Why didn't I avoid the hour wait and go to sonic to begin with? There very rude customer service. Slow and food suffers as well as customers with there bad attitude.

Second time our pizza, sandwich, and bread were over an hour later than the tracker said it would be (last time was 2 hours) paid for extra chicken was given THREE pieces on the entire sandwich. Pizza wasn't cut, was cold and our bread bites which were supposed to have 16 pieces only had 8..needless to say, we won't be ordering from here anymore.

text: I wish I could give this store zero stars. Food delivered literally an hour late with zero remorse. An incorrect order that was, not surprisingly, cold. No forks delivered with one salad when two salads were ordered. Wow. Wowwowwow.

Maurice is a great guy and his business is perfect for the area. Don’t go through these other delivery sites. Keep it local!
Fast delivery, friendly driver and easy to use site!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words 🙏🏽

text: Best delivery service in town!! Expand to the beach!!

resp.text: Thank you . We will consider that recommendation. Which beach needs our service ?

name: Hannah Tucker
text: Every time we order Kat’s Delivery we are super satisfied! Luci, Myles, and Austin have delivered to us and they are always so kind and make sure we have everything we need! We will definitely keep using Kat’s!

resp.text: Thank you so much.

name: Jay Clyce
text: Are you looking for quality service and professionalism, to deliver your food?  KATs Delivery is a great choice.  I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you Jay for the recommendation. We are here to make a difference one order at a time !

name: Steven Scott
text: Every time we use them fast delivery in less time than it would take me to go get it myself.  Busy days at work everyone eats anything they want within surrounding areas.  Drivers are always very nice.

resp.text: Thank you Steven. We appreciate your continued support.

name: Robin Connell
text: So grateful tonight that our little town has Kat's Delivery. Our family had a rough day today. As I'm on my way home I have my son order our food from a very well put together website. Paid added the tip and got a delivery time. Our food arrived shortly after getting home and was exactly what we needed. So thank you Kat's for servicing our small town. You have no idea how you helped us tonight.

resp.text: Thank you so much for trusting the KaTs Team. It’s our honor and our pleasure .

name: Jamie McGinnis
text: KATs is a fantastic company. We love the mission of KATs and the easy access to grocery and food delivery it gives people! 5 STARS!

resp.text: Thanks Jamie for the kind remarks.

name: Ryan Northcutt
text:
Not sure why the company doesn't tip the people who make the food (they work for tips). So if you order from them you are making someone work for free to make your food. The drivers get tipped but the employees at the restaurant who did all of the work get nothing. Please look into fixing this problem as there are more and more people using your service. Thanks.

EDIT: not sure about the rude response from this owner, my mother works in the medical field and I don't know anyone from Longhorns. I was referring to a different restaurant. No one is trying to shake you down, just trying to give feedback!

resp.text:
Ryan , the employees at Longhorn where your mom works get a salary / hourly wage from Longhorn Steakhouse in Alabaster . Every driver doesn’t always get tipped and when they do they have maintenance and gas on their vehicles . This review should be for people who used our service
Not for people who are upset they didn’t get a tip . We deliver to all our customers with or without a tip . Your mom should serve her customers . I will send someone to management in longhorns in the morning to let them know what their employees are
Up to harassing Longhorns customers when their off . Y’all are trying to shake Kats down like a NewYork mobster looking for his cut on a private business .

name: Amanda Mercer
text: Great locally owned company. Drivers are friendly and communicate with customers during the delivery process! We love KATS!

resp.text: Thank you for all your support!

name: Isabel Santiago
text: Maurice is the kindest individual you’ll ever meet. Love supporting his business!

resp.text: Thank you Isabel for your support and kind words.

name: John H. Stubbs III
text: Great experience!!! If you’re in need of a food delivery service, definitely give them a try! You will not be disappointed!!!

resp.text: Thank you sir. We appreciate the feedback.

name: Andrew Simmons
text: I was in town on business and had the pleasure of ordering from KAT's Delivery. What a surprise it was. My food was on time, the driver was neatly dressed, and none of the transaction made me feel uncomfortable. I love ordering from the locals when I'm in any city, and this delivery service is five star all around!

resp.text: Andrew, Thank you for your review. We look forward to serving you when your in Bham.

text: This was the most wonderful service! I love everything about this company! And the food🤩

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review

resp.text: Michelle , thank you . It was our pleasure and we will see you again soon .

text: My son used KATs Delivery for dinner a few days ago and received texts from time of order to delivery about status of his order. Great service!  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know our drivers are communicating to the highest standards . We appreciate the feedback .

name: Trent Walls

resp.text: Trent, It was a pleasure to meet you as well. I look forward to continued growth with you and other RDS owners!

name: Melanie Chavez
text: Smoothie King in Athens is one of the best places in town to get something DIFFERENT. Sick of fast food? Cooking and eating out? Go by and see Gannon! She’s the sweetest.

resp.text: Melanie, thanks for the amazing review about our healthier smoothies! We’re glad you loved it and we're glad to hear Gannon has been doing an amazing job in blending your smoothies. We can’t wait to serve you again!

name: Ariel Marie
text: Overpriced but wonderful! I had a coupon thank goodness and was able to enjoy the immune booster smoothie!!

resp.text: Ariel, thank you so much for the 5 ⭐! We're so thrilled we were able to blend your perfect immune booster smoothie. Be sure to download the Healthy Rewards app so you can start earning rewards to use on your Smoothie purchases 🥤🍓🍎

name: Jason Garner
text: The variety is amazing. Staff is phenomenal. They are one of the cleanest and fastest smoothie kings I've been to since I moved here from Atlanta. Keep up the good work and thanks for my morning smile

text: The prices are a little higher than some similar but it's worth it. I almost always get the pineapple surf and it is amazing. If you're trying to drop some weight or just want a better alternative to ice cream,  this is the place to go.

name: pizzamilkshake
text: The smoothies are great! Looks like they overwork some employees, though. I love the vegan mango kale. Plenty of different options and customizations. Little on the pricey side. It's around $5 for a small size.
