text: They get your order to you quickly and you are on your way. Friendly, knowledgeable staff

name: Jack Durden
text: Today was the worst. Normally this is a clean tidy place today the white girl behind the counter did not seam to want to work. Wanted to spend more time with her freind and children. She had a filthy apron on and keep whipping her hands on it. The floor behind the counter was coverd in water and the counter top was disgusting. Gave 2 stars as the other girl was working so hard to keep up with the orders and I could see she was stressed.

name: Kelsey Farr
text: Flavor is good but consistency is awful! Smoothie was not smooth; it had ice, frozen spinach, and fruit chunks about half the size of a standard ice cube. Need a spoon not a straw for it, too. Plus, service is very slow.

name: Hailley White
text: I love everything about this place. Everyone who has ever served me has been nothing but nice to me and flavor is very great..

name: Tlacahetl
text: They stop serving at 7:30 so they should change the sing.

name: Erica Porter
text: Done this once would just rather be contacted. This is why we need more local business owners. The level of disrespect I reacieved and to not even get a reply...😢😢

name: Melissa Burgess
text: Fast & friendly service! Smoothies are tasty. Very clean establishment

name: Jesse Zombie
text: Love there smoothies never disappointed such great flavor

name: Lance Allen
text: Never thought I'd like something like this until I tried it. Now I get at least 3 smoothies a week from this place.

name: rain
text: I've only had it once but they seem to have good deals, my smoothie was actually very tasty as well.

name: Roy Chambers
text: Love this place.  I go there for meal replacements, need to get back to ot.

name: Joel Hamm
text:
Went in to purchase $50 in gift cards. Only one person was working and she was busy with drive thru, and told me she had never done a gift card before, but told me another employee should be there any minute. After waiting about 5 minutes, I told her I would come back, walked over to Starbucks and purchased additional gift cards in less that 1 minute total.
Walked back to Smoothie, where 2 employees were now busy making smoothies. The other employee had never done a gift card either, but after waiting another 5 minutes (I was the only customer in the store both times, besides drive thru) I left without being spoken to. Good luck being open 6 months, and I hope you are because Athens needs places such as this. I have bought smoothies there before which I was very pleased with, although a little pricey.

name: Arien Juring
text: Waited a little for them to get settled before I tried them out and was very happy with service and product received. Planning on going stopping by in the mornings for on my way to work

name: SpaceLord 4Life
text: Healthy option in athens. Nice employees

name: Sherri Skipper
text: Friendly and Fast service

name: Austin Proffitt
text: Super cool smoothie place!!!

name: Anna Thomas
text: They're expensive but very good

name: Emma Nolan
text: Absolutely love this place

name: Gena Prince
text: Love It ,

name: Alex Reed
text: Love ir

name: Trenna Tribble
text: Not my favorite

name: Armstrong Heather
text: Why woulnt i like a smoothie

name: Frederick White
text: Good service.

name: Mark Hammond
text: Nice, clean and friendly

name: Amy Stinnett
text: Every Friday

name: J M
text: I like how now their smoothies are more healthy and more variety. I like you can choose what kind of sugar you want and also choose if you want added sugar strawberries or natural strawberries as example. Some fruit you can choose if you prefer wild ones with no sugar added. What i don't like is their app. It doesn't always function when you went delivery but recent with all the fees for delivery, it's no reason to order. The fees alone are so high it's like you ordering the same thing again. I order a smoothie that's 11$ but the fees also equal that much, so to me it's like I'm missing out on a smoothie so it's pointless to use until they figure out a better approach.

resp.text: J, thanks for the amazing review about our healthier smoothies! We also appreciate the feedback on our app as your feedback helps us improve on this in the future. We will share this with our team.

name: Heather Ormsby
text: Super helpful and friendly staff!

name: Jessica Lewis (Jess)
text: A very large menu with all assortments and addons! They are featuring a tart cherry flavor add-in right now. I wanted to try Banana Boat because it sounded absolutely divine but alas, they were out of the frozen yogurt used to make it so I settled for a Caribbean Way, which consists of strawberries and bananas blended with a nonfat yogurt. It was actually really good. They offer 3 sizes for their smoothies. Lots of Smoothie King merch for sale, as well as various "health" chips and snacks. I would have given 5 stars except for their being out of stock of  a main ingredient for items on their menu. The young man that was the cashier was very knowledgeable and helpful, polite.

resp.text: We appreciate the 4-star review and your feedback about our Caribbean Way smoothie, Jessica! We look forward to serving you again and making it 5 stars. 🥤

name: Heather Ormsby
text: Best smoothies but a little pricey unless you go on Fridays.

resp.text: Heather, we’re glad you enjoyed your smoothie! Thank you for the 4 stars and we hope to make it 5 stars next time.

name: Hasnain Meghani
text: Love the smoothies.

name: caroline ezzell
text: It was 8:50. They close at 9!! We pulled up at the drive through and the person started to talk to us but before we could order it shut off. We went to the window and they ran to the kitchen to ignore us. We are very angry. We were trying to build muscle after our workout.

resp.text: Sorry we weren’t there to serve you, Caroline. We are looking into this and apologize for any inconvenience. Thanks for sharing.

name: Dana Childress
text: Staff always has great customer service, great friendly and fast service, and I love there smoothies and now I can stop and get one on my way to and from work in the early mornings and afternoons.

resp.text: Dana we love to hear that! Nothing makes us happier to know we’re part of your healthy routine! 🥤❤️🥰

name: Richard Fernandez
text: Did you change your hours, we were there after 10am this morning(Sunday) and no one was there?

resp.text: Richard, sorry we weren’t there to serve you. We are looking into your feedback and apologize for any inconvenience. If you want to share more details, please email us at guestfeedback@smoothieking.com

name: A Redfield96
text: Smoothies are great! But customer service is terrible. The male working the drive through made us repeat our order several times, forgot to give half of it to us and we waited in the drive through at the window for over 15 minutes. Ridiculous. Not even an apology when we finally got our last drink either.

name: Amanda Villarreal
text: Why wouldn’t I be able to customize my smoothie at a smoothie place ?

name: Godzilla
text: Great smoothie's and good service.

name: Christopher Calvin Reid
text: Excellent smoothies. It isn't cheap but the quality makes the price worthwhile.

name: Taylor Robinson
text: I had to actually ask for my card back after ten minutes because she forgot. Smoothie was ok, but it was chunky.

name: Gary
text: Love the smoothies here opens early drive thru is easy and service is fast. Friendly staff and I like the protein powder they have inside I take it home and use it in my smoothies.

name: Kristi Edwards
text: The service is good and they are helpful but don’t try to pay for your order with anything more than a 20 dollar bill. Even if your getting multiple smoothies they would rather throw the product away or send your on a goose chase to find change than to give you $20 in change out of a $50.. Absolutly obsurd!! Someone needs to use their brain ..

name: Ajahni Richardson
text: Mmmmmmmm : ) healthy and delicious. As well as friendly customer service.

name: Lindsey Moschella
text: I walked in and ordered. The two ladies decided to make all the drive thru people’s orders first before mine. I asked why and she said “they make them in ordered received.”.....uh, dumb answer for someone who paid and and ordered and then waited and heard you taking all the orders on your headset after mine. I got mine last. After three cars ordered and got theirs. Just choose the other smoothie king, the new one sucks.

name: Greg Anderson
text: coffee protein smoothies are great.

name: Mark Evans
text: Expense but really good smoothies

name: Carol Becker
text: Pleasant atmosphere.  If it is busy, there is a wait.

name: Meagan Adams
text: Out of Strawberries but you guys are located by a Walmart and Publix...half of your items contain strawberries so???

name: Robert Knie
text: Love the food and drinks.

name: Lee mccraney
text: Best smoothies in town!!

name: Tammy DeVane
text: Great customer service

name: Rita Marques
text: Awesome tasting smoothies!!

name: Kimberly Jones
text: Love this place

name: Christine
text: Ordered take out, it was phenomenal.  Probably the best Chinese/ Thai food I have had in Auburn.  I had the Masaman curry and my bf had the sweet and sour chicken.  His had huge pieces of chicken and was more meat than sauce.  My curry had lots of veggies and meat, usually it’s more sauce than anything else at other places.  They are only doing take out.  Please support this business.  Prices were very reasonable also.  We had 2 entrees, fried rice, egg rolls (2) and a small order of soup and it was $28.  Not bad

name: Yang Hu
text: Nice Thai food, and inexpensive.

name: Thomas Carlisle
text: First time to visit China Palace for takeout tonight. Will definitely add to my favorite places list.

name: Emily H
text: Pretty disappointed with the food. The chicken seems more bready than meaty. If you want vegetable lo mein instead of rice, you must order separately. So I tried both the rice and the lo mein. Those were okay. However, I did not end up eating most of the food, as much as I hate to waste food, it was just not pleasant.

name: Terri Davis
text: Meh. Some things are ok (Thai fried rice), others are not (hot and sour soup, tiny egg rolls, any sort of breaded chicken). Lunch prices are good.

name: charly barry
text: Nice people good food like the feel of the place can’t want for indoor dinning to come back

name: Nicky Bravo
text: Absolutely horrible food! I requested teriyaki chicken with no onions as I’m allergic. They sent me something completely different and put onions in it. She then said her “chef” put no onions in it but yet here they are clear as day in the picture. Worst Chinese restaurant ever. Never order from here. You will not be happy!

name: Timothy Reynolds
text: A very good Asian restaurant that is off the beaten track. Hopefully they are busier than what we observed as we were the only diners early on a Saturday night. Students were not back yet so maybe that accounts for the lower traffic. An all Asian cuisine, the food was prepared well and served hot and enjoyed by everyone. They easily accommodated our dietary restrictions without loss of flavor or taste. They do not use MSG which is a plus for us. Don't let the exterior throw you as it looks more like a road house or dive bar than Asian restaurant, it is worth the 5 minute drive out highway 14.

name: Meg Fullington
text:
Picked up some take out. I had the Mongolian Beef with steamed rice and hot & sour soup. The soup was delicious and on the spicy side. Rice was nice and fluffy and I asked for a little cup of the “red sweet/sour sauce” as I like to put it on the rice. They were happy to accommodate my request.
The Mongolian Beef was outstanding! It was still piping hot when I opened the carton at home. The meat was tender and full of flavor. Best I’ve had in town. Will definitely order from them again.

name: Isabelle Kallenberg
text: I love their Thai food!! I recommend trying the red curry and Thai coconut soup, they’re so delicious!

name: Nikki Richardson
text: I always enjoy their food. It’s consistently good. My favorite is the honey chicken! They are also friendly.

name: Michael Irwin
text: The Chinese and Thai food here is the very best in the area. It always tastes so fresh and tender. Have been getting take-out here for years, every Friday night. The Thai curry dishes are just incredible, especially the green curry. They do not skimp on portions... a typical dish is more than enough for my wife and me. I love this food.

name: Frederick Riedel
text: Great prices, tasty food, friendly staff! A good spot to grab lunch.

name: Bhargav Y
text: One of the good Asian restaurants around Auburn/Opelika. I had the chefs special Thai over noodles(chicken) and it was amazing. I expected a little more meat in the dish for the price. But, all in all a good restaurant. Good place for people who wanna try something new

name: Tido daman
text: Food was fresh and was very good. The lady that seated and took our order was very polite.  I've been here several times and service is always amazing.

name: T Gilbert
text: Good food if they get your order right. I've ordered from them before with no problems and the food was great but these last few times they got my order wrong and refused to give me a refund. I will not be ordering from them again these last few experiences were very unprofessional.

name: Rebekah King
text: I have a very mixed opinion of this place. Im giving three stars only because the food is always great, fresh, etc which is why I keep going back. HOWEVER, the service in house is subpar. Staff always seems frustrated that you are there and it takes FOREVER to get your food. So only go if you are not in a hurry to be anywhere soon. As far as calling in, good luck. That’s hit or miss. Some days I can get an answer and other days I never am able to get anyone to pick up the phone, and yes- I am calling during their funky business hours. Also, if you call in, still expect it to take at least 30 minutes or more for your food to be ready to be picked up.

name: Sandra Ortega-John
text: Amazing food. Can honestly say this was the best Chinese food I've had in awhile. Good egg rolls and crab angels

name: Britt S.
text: This place is a hidden gem in the rough. They make the best coconut curry soup I've ever had. They're vegetable spring rolls are so full of flavor, you'd think they're was meat in them. If you're unsure of what to try, order the chili chicken with bamboo shoots; truly top notch.

name: Mark Barber
text: Seriously the best Chinese and Thai in this area. All of is made by one guy, the owner on a traditional wok. The real way. Fresh every time and made to order

name: Shannon Stringer
text: Great place to eat, to enjoy company and family. Great service and friendly atmsphere. Love coming here every visit to Auburn. That you David

name: anon anon
text: I never write reviews but I just had to for this place. This best Chinese food in Alabama. It came out so fresh and delicious. You have got to try if you're in town.

name: Kenneth Dyer
text: Don't let the appearance keep you from enjoying this little place. Food was prepared fresh, fast, and with a smile. I had the teriyaki chicken with fried rice and egg drop soup. Will definitely be going back.

name: Jessica Hartley
text: Our favorite chinese! We love the food and the wonderful server. We always bring family here when they're in town.

name: Jill Barnes
text: We love this place. Been following that s business for over 20 years.

name: Aaron Spraggins
text: Lunch is very cheap. I got the sesame chicken special. It was sweet & sour style chicken with sesame sauce on it. But I guess it was okay for only $6.

name: Mark Barber
text: The best Chinese and Thai food in this area, it’s cooked by the owner and only him every time. It’s amazing

name: M Stevens
text: Long wait for food because it is cooked fresh. Have ordered from here one time only and not my preference for Chinese food.

name: Sherry N
text: Best chinese/thai food in the county. You won't be disappointed.

name: Ellie Byrd
text: The food is AWESOME at the China Palace.  It is my family's favorite restaurant in the Auburn area.  Also, it is the best chinese or thai food in the Auburn/Opelika area.

name: Howard Smith
text: Significant wait time (45-60 mins) for just "ok" food.  Unclear if staffing was the issue.

name: Mark Miller
text: Have been a customer for years.  The food is excellent.

name: Bobby Burks
text: Food not to bad.

name: Cody Ivey
text: We waited outside for the restaurant for ten minutes before and twenty minutes after they open (they have 1:30 posted). Their opening time came and went, which was expected from a small restaurant that doesn't expect business early, but at 1:50 the staff/owners (?) came out back, noticed we were were waiting... Then got in their car and left. Their food is okay, but I refuse go here again because of the blatant lack of business standards or basic respect for their customers.

name: Axel Santizo
text: Good food

name: Markesha Cotton
text: GREAT place to eat

name: Grant Benson
text: Favorite Chinese ever and a great atmosphere

name: Cooking made easy with Richie
text: Food is the best in auburn

name: Kiairra Winchester
text: Very poor customer service. Last time doing business with them.

name: John HDD
text: Food was mediocre at best, service was pretty terrible. I don't know what they did to the rice, but it was not "fried rice."

name: Grayson Dabbs
text: Awesome lo mein

name: Charles Greenleaf
text: Great, authentic Chinese cuisine.

name: Shaun Greg
text: Excellent

name: Theresa Parker
text: If you are looking to get your family back at the dinner table but don't know what to fix, Dream Dinners is perfect. Schedule a session to put together meals for a whole month, bring them home, freeze, then when you're ready for the next week thaw, cook, and enjoy dinnertime again. Easy peasy!

name: Carla Phelan-King
text: It was great fun preparing meals with my husband. The staff very friendly and helpful.

name: paul ierna
text: Interesting place,  great for a first date and to create premade meals for your household.

name: Bill Tomlin
text: Good, quick way to get pre-portioned meals to cook at home.  Menu changes monthly and the service is great.

name: Ben Smalley
text: Bad

name: Schuyler Powell
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE ! The people and the food are equally fantastic. They tell you the truth, which now a days no busines does. I can't a believe a place so good actually exist. It is a little pricey for my taste,but the customer service, food, and atmosphere is enough to keep me coming back. What can I say, you get what you pay for.

name: Clif Brownlee
text: Awesome dinners for people that dont have alot of time to cook but want healthy homemade meals.

name: Kathy Smith
text: I don't hate it,never heard of it

name: Becca Jackson
text: My husband and I have gotten food from here like four or five times because we work close by. Every single time the order has been not even close to what we ordered. I wish that was an exaggeration. Also my husband used to work at a different Jimmy John's. He knows how it works. The other locations we have been to are fine but this particular one is consistently bad. There are other sandwich places that are consistent and delicious.

resp.text: We are sorry we got your order wrong and we want to help fix this. Could you please share your feedback with our customer service team here: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback so we can educate the local store owner?

name: jonathan tidwell
text: Past two times we have been to this location.  There is only one person in the store working making sandwiches.  The rest are out delivering.  It seems that they should always make sure the store is staffed with more than one person.  We ordered online in the car parking lot and it took 25 minutes to get food.  You call that freaky fast.... look at the order time then compare to the actual time on phone.  Poor management.

name: Mike Mixson
text: Consistent product, never a miss. Freaky fast at a great price point.

resp.text: Thanks for the love! We’d love to pass on the positive words to the franchise owner. Please share your experience with our team here: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Ash H
text: Listen, I gave this location a chance over and over again. They’re incredibly slow. I’ve been waiting for an online order for almost 25 minutes inside the store - there’s literally five employees behind the counter, and five other customers who all have their food. I know there’s a lot of online orders but this is ridiculous to experience multiple times at the same location.

resp.text: We are sorry for your experience and we want to share it with this location’s owner. Could you please share your feedback here: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Greg Mcclain
text: Great food

name: J C-A
text: The delivery driver came in and didn't wash his hands and attempted to just put on gloves! I asked the guy taking my order...why isn't he washing his hands? He says hey man wash your hands! NASTY! Then the guy taking my order his mask wasn't covering his nose! The only one that was masked properly was the guy making the sandwiches! Who's enforcing these workers?

resp.text: Please let us know the specifics of your experience so we can look into this. http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Asher
text: Jimmy John’s is supposed to be fast. Don’t expect that if you come here.

resp.text: We are sorry for your experience and we want to share it with this location’s owner. Could you please share your feedback here: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Prince Home Builders Inc. Prince
text: Down a star 3 was 4, found bug 🐛in my greens and the waitress just said O it happens sometimes don't get  washed off from the garden?  Crazy

resp.text: Thanks for the love! If you’d like us to share your feedback with the store’s team, please reach out to our customer service team: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Telly the Owl
text: Everyone at this location were so helpful and kind! Special shout out to DeVante who went the the extra mile and helped me out to my car with my large order. Thankyou so much!! ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

resp.text: Thanks for spreading the love! We’d love to pass on the positive words to the franchise owner. Please share your experience with our team here: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Kyle Hamilton
text: Love the way their fresh baked bread tastes. And the service is very quick. They will let you come in earlier in the day and sell you the day old bread at a very discounted price and it's still just as good.

name: B A Buckland
text:
Love the tuna salad.  I especially love the tuna salad delivered.  Online ordering system is one of the best.  Really cuts down on confusion and incorrect orders.

Edit 09/20/19  This has become a regular for me.  A once a week delivery of tuna, just like I want it.  Service is generally fast and friendly.

name: Chop E.
text: Terrible experience. No one wearing masks. Ordered online for pickup and it took 20 min. Turns out it was made but lost in their chaos. No apology given.

resp.text: We’re very sorry for your underwhelming experience. Please send us the details on what happened here if you would like to be contacted further about your experience:  http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Eric Kolsto
text: Great food but $9 for a small sub is a bit pricey. Stick with Subway.

resp.text: Please feel free to leave your feedback here, and we will pass it along to the store owner: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: Keith B.
text: Never been to a Jimmy johns, we went today, it was the best sandwich I have had in a long time, yes I will be back, turkey bacon 👍

resp.text: Love the love! We’d love to pass on the positive words to the franchise owner. Please share your experience with our team here: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback

name: William Goodson
text: When I want a cold sub this is my favorite place to go. The sandwich customization is lacking but I never order anything too fancy anyway.

name: Carole Jackson
text: Quick service, fresh ingredients, menu well written, tasty sandwiches

name: Angela Renfroe
text: First time at JJs...awesome all the way around.   Benji, the GM, took so much pride in his store and the food!  Fresh bread and meat!  I'll definitely be back.

name: Kristen Kowalski
text: Best delivery. I have my order at my front door in usually under 15 minutes. Let’s just say I’m a repeat customer. Food is pretty good too.

name: Chris Bagley
text:
The food is great and the staff are pleasant!

I travel through Alabama often. I typically come through before they officially open and these folks are nice to accommodate me. I really appreciate that due to this being the last Jimmy Johns for the next 2-3 more hours of my drive.

name: Kayla DeRider
text: I travel the country with my husband and have been to plenty of locations let alone have worked at 4 locations over 6 years and never have i walked into such a messy store! There were box lunched boxes everywhere stuff all over the cold tables ... and idk if its a new thing to not wear aprons and to be able to wear leggings but to me that was unacceptable.... and another thing .. is there a new way to make sammies? Cause i dont understand why both of my #16s and my 15 had its lettuce and onions underneath the meat and cheese?!? That just really ruined my whole sandwich... i think im going to message corporate ....

name: Carrie Fountain
text: Super fast service great food

name: Sheri M
text: It was alright. People were nice. I don't feel the food is worth the price. I don't mind paying if the food is great. Just my opinion.

name: Erin Walton
text: Friendly service and always delicious!

name: Eric Oneal
text: Awesome sandwiches. 5 grain wheat bread is amazing! And they are right in the commercials: FREAKY FAST!!

name: Marshall Mooney
text: Good and fast.  Very fast delivery.

name: Rebekah Winter
text: Fabulous and fast sandwiches. They did mess up my brother's sandwich, but very promptly and apologetically made him another. Nice staff

name: Andrea Townsend
text: I ordered Mini-Jimmy’s 24 pack yesterday and the sandwiches were delicious!! The employees were friendly and my order was ready when I arrived!

name: Brandon J Arnold
text: Not the best I have ever eaten at this restaurant. The guacamole was so thin it was almost non existant. We actually had to disect the sandwich to find it.

name: J T
text: Great sandwiches and fast service. Beats most chain sandwich shops.

name: Holly C Carter
text: We were traveling back to GA and stopped in to get food to go. We spent $35 on food and got charged 27cents for a cup of ice! Paid a dollar and let them keep the change bc evidently they need it! Absolute nonsense. Lost our business for life.

name: Aaron Dettling
text: Great, fresh, delicious sandwiches, faster than you can get the words out of your mouth!

name: Edgar A
text: Consistently fresh, fast, and good.  Eat here all the time and never had a bad experience.

name: Nathan Wallace
text: Always super fast and delicious

name: Daniel Temple
text: I ate here on Jan 8 because I wanted something quick before the national champ game.  I ordered a country club with all the freebees except sprouts and cucumbers.  The cashier rang up all freebees, add sprouts, add cucumbers.  Instead of remaking the sandwich, my toppings were scraped into the garbage and more toppings were placed on top.  There were still some reminence of sprouts on the sandwich.  Long story short, I got food poisoning from the sandwich.  Jimmy johns has now suspended sprouts from the menu temporarily due to salmonella.  I feel like this could have been avoided had they discarded the sandwich that was made in error and made me a new one.  (I have not been back)

name: Marinda Love
text: Quick and good sandwiches but a little bit pricey

name: Reba Champion
text: Amazing and freaky fresh!

name: Kassady Gibson
text: Love love love Jimmy Johns and this location. Very nice staff and its fast.

name: A.J. Patrick
text: Great Staff!

name: Brian Friedman

name: Chris Eastridge

name: kim Park
text: I used to love their sandwiches until I found out the owner kills Rhinos and elephants and stuff I will not support that

name: Kevin Kelley
text: They are freaking slow !!!!

name: Krish 8810
text: Tasty sandwiches!!

name: Devin Matthews
text: Always good food

name: Jase
text: Best sandwich place in hoover

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Best service yet

name: Joseph Hester
text: Favorite sandwich shop

name: Cameron Riggs
text: best sandwich shop in town.

name: Romara Ahallow
text: will not deliver past brocks gap.

name: Matthew Vickery
text: I’ve been going here since I was a kid! The owners have always been present and the food is always well made and consistent. The service is always on point. Best wings around

name: Leslie Weaver
text: We LOVE Exotic Wings and eat lunch (take out) from here at least once a week.  Everything is made to order with fresh ingredients.  A handful of times, we have had less than perfect food, but it was cooked by a new employee and typically those employees don't last long.  If you haven't, try the philly cheesesteaks and chicken phillies!  You won't be disappointed. You're welcome. :)

name: Jessica N Kimberly
text: Great spot to eat! Great selection of foods and drinks and they always hook up the orders!! Best Cajun ranch fries in TOWN PERIOD!! BEST WINGS IN TOWN PERIOD! Even when i moved away from Birmingham EVERY time I vist I check out exotics and grab something to eat!! 5 stars all the way!! Highly recommend!! Especially if you looking for authentic hood food! I'm okay with them not delivering here, in fact I would have gladly given my $15 tip to the person who prepared my order had they just called and said.... We don't deliver there but we would be happy to prepare your order for pickup ( my husband was already out picking up my chinese, which will be cold by the time I eat because I refuse to eat without my children.) I might live in a budget friendly not so appealing possibly dangerous neighborhood but I'm a good customer, I tip well and I appreciate the courtesy of the places I give my money.

name: Chris F. - iamd4g
text: Even their reply is fake and auto-generated like their b🤬🤬🤬t pizza and service. There will be no "next time" BOTTOM DOLLAR ON THAT. Horrible experiences at this locations but tonight's interaction burns bridges. Granted, there was inclement weather tonight so some delay and difficulties were expected. However, from what I experienced tonight, Domino's Pizza off of Mobile Hwy would have been better closed. No matter, I ordered from the app and request delivery. I finalized the order on the app but I later received a call from the store, saying they didn't have delivery drivers (again, expected difficulties) and I need to pick up my food. What they didn't tell me is that they voided my app order, placing a hold on my debit card (upcoming 'last straw'), and I would need to bring my debit card to re-order. So, when I arrived at the store, lo and behold. They told me that I needed my card. Thus, I had to drive back through Tropical Storm Sally in a partially wrecked car, just to get my debit card. (Now, given my past dealings with this store, I should have know better but I am a naive person person at times.) I get back to the store, just to find out that because of the order I made on the app, Domino's Pizza tried to charge me twice for the same order. One for delivery and the other for carryout. I snapped. So what? I need to have at least 40 dollars in my bank account to order pizza. I am sorry; your tax dollars don't pay teachers enough for that. I find it really funny that Domino's Pizza can jump into your bank account so fast when you order but, refunding and correcting orders, they feint as bumbling idiots. I do not just hold the store at fault but the entire corporation. They have no regard for customer service; Domino's Pizza only cares about profits and their shareholders. I wouldn't drop or invest a dime into Domino's Pizza, with all the dried and burnt pizzas I have ordered over the years. Hell, Pizza Hut has a hotline for situations like this, but you invest your time in 'Pizza Insurance' and 'HotSpots'. How about fairly selling pizza when trying to double dip into people's bank accounts? How about optimizing your systems so errors like this can fixed quicker? Just go under, already. But, before you do, give me my money back because YOU STILL HAVE NOT DONE THAT YET FOR A ORDER I CAN NOT EAT BECAUSE I NEVER RECEIVED IT!

resp.text: Hello Chris, I apologize for your experience and would like to assure you that this is not an automated response and your review is individually read and responded to because we want to make sure your concerns are addressed. name: Michael Murphy
text: Here we go again. Stopped using Domino's a couple of years ago because of their poor customer service. Figured that they had two years to fix it, I'd give them a try. Put my order in for delivery at about 12:30 and their tracker said the pizza was out of the oven at 12:42.  It is about 8 minutes from the store to my office. 1:00 pm, no pizza, 1:10 pm no pizza, 1:25 pm, still no pizza. Called the store. Only have one driver but it'll be out shortly. (Maybe Domino's should consider giving their drivers a living wage so they would stay).1:40 pm, pizza finally shows up at my office. The driver gave me my now cold pizza and seemed a bit miffed that I failed to leave a tip.  Guess I'll wait two more years. EDIT: 5-23-2019 Just got off the phone with a woman who identified herself as the "manager on duty"  per the response from the "owner" I called the number listed and explained that I  was asked to call regarding my order (#19 placed 5-3-19)  but twas told there is no record of it.  Yep, great customer service.

text: My boyfriend and I ordered a pizza from this location tonight and ONCE AGAIN!!!! HORRIBLE SERVICE!!! I recorded both calls that I made for corporate office to hear. So I called back and get an answer from a rude Adrian screaming and cutting me off because I questioned him about waiting 30minutes to call me to tell me they don't deliver in my area after dark. In which I just received a delivery from them about a week or 2 at this hour ago so I guess it's a new policy, So why was I able to place an order and why was I charged and again 30MINUTES before you call knowing you have an online tracker indicating the steps of my delivery??????? Don't waste your time dealing with these people. It's a hit or miss on the quality of your service or if you'll get your food at all. name: Veritas Justice
text: Came in an hour before they were supposed to close.  Was told that they would not take my order.

name: Lawrence Williams
text: The prices here suggest that there's something special about the wings they serve here but what you get for what you pay says otherwise.

name: Hannah Layne
text: We tried Wing Zone for the first time tonight and had an awesome experience! It was manic Monday and you get 10 boneless wings and fries for $9. The wings were awesome and the flavors were excellent! The owner was running the register and was super helpful in us picking our flavors. He also gave us the Oreo churros to try! They were SO yummy! Great experience and we will be back

name: caroline west
text: First time here and was not disappointed. Great flavors of wings and friendly service. We will be back.

name: Esdras Andrade
text: Best wings around Birmingham area, juicy wings, awesome flavors, best customer service, they have board games while you wait and sports on tv!! Great place to hang and good food. 🤙

name: User Name
text:
CHECK THE ORDER DELIVERED..STAFF IS AS LAZY AS CAN BE.

OHHH BROO WE TOTALLY FORGOT TO AD THAT UGHHH -HUU -BROHH

name: Areesha Charania
text: Super friendly staff with quick and efficient service. The owner of the restaurant is also very nice and helpful. The restaurant itself is very clean and all the food tastes amazing! Definitely one of the best wings restaurants I’ve been to!

name: Melvin Jones
text: Very friendly staff and perfect renovations. Good place to eat and watch the 2 new TVs in the lobby. Good music and especially good wings!!

name: Aiyan Lakhani
text: I did a catering order through them for my graduation. They did an amazing job keeping everything nice and hot! Definitely will order again!

name: Deanna Benefield
text: Had the best time at Wing Zone today! My husband and I had a connect 4 battle (i won) then played the most epic game of Jinga before we enjoyed some tasty wings! Super friendly staff and wonderful/quick service! Strongly recommend!

name: CBF Performance
text: Both mine and my co workers wings was so overcooked. It was like eating jerky instead of wings. Will not be back.

name: Tiffany Martin
text: Wonderful flavors, great deals, and kind employees. Had an awesome time here and would definitely recommend if you want to leave with a satisfied, full stomach!

name: Lester Mark
text: The wings were okay. The cause was on the wings not in the wings, if you know what I mean

name: Romon Poole
text: Wings done right!!!  The best wings in town but they have more than wings.   The chicken wrap also 2 thumbs up!  Great food and great service...

name: Kara Moran
text: I'm giving this 2 stars ONLY because the sauce on the wings was awesome. The wings were old. You could taste the OLD. Please dont be fooled by the "cheese fries". These are literally fries with shredded cheese warmed up on them. Not even melted. Warmed up. Waste of 12$.

resp.text: Thanks for taking out time and writing the review..we would love to take care of your bad experience ....please call the store and ask for Faiz ..2058720772

name: ej perry
text: I’ve been a fan for years and the service has never changed! Every time I go the quality of the food is great, and the sauce is to die for! #Ringmeup

name: Barry Adcock
text: My favorite wing place. Love the hot shot wings and blackened fries. They deliver now too! Recommend to anyone who loves wings.

name: Cyndi Morgan
text: Had burgers delivered to our motel last night in Bham because the truck was hooked to our boat and did not want to leave and park it again.  The burgers were horrible.  Bacon on burgers was so undercooked that we gave it to the dog.  We ordered funnel cake type of sticks which were VERY greasy.  The mozzarella sticks were good.  I would not recommend the food here.

name: Chris M
text: Usually very quick and polite, I've never had a issue with this store. Well, that is until my last order. For some reason it took FOREVER and when it got here it was the wrong items plus it was "semi" warm. Again, that's just one bad time. The store is usually great with me.

name: Ke Cake
text: Very clean the staff is friendly receptionist waited while we took our time and also help us with the menu. The food was fresh ! However i wish they had a combo or something similar like wings to go like Huntsville that's where i am from. I was just visiting and decided to stop here since i was craving wings

name: Russ and Scott Jemison-Parsons
text: Surprisingly - probably the best burgers in Hoover. Wings are great, not tiny like you get at a lot of places. If you can stand the heat I recommend the Nuclear Habanero but get the sauce on the side.

name: Cashidah Hunt
text: Will NOT be ordering from here again. Took 50 minutes to get my order AFTER they stated the driver was on his way  and they're only 5-10 minutes away. Lost a customer!

name: Kennedy Lamar
text: Atmosphere was great. Got the Buffalo bliss & lemon pepper. Food was even better. Please pull up

name: Kristen Green
text: Very clean, atmosphere was great, was greeted as soon as we came in... food was delicious as always.... I have no complaints and my boyfriend is very picky about eating at certain places and he loved it .... our lunch date was perfect 👍👍👍👍👍

name: HoneyButter butter
text: Wing not fried enough

text: Went in 2 Sundays back with my Fiance. Had a great experience. Food was excellent and well priced. The service was exceptional. Marty was the associate there on duty. Very friendly and gave suggestions on different sauces to try! I will definitely go back.

name: T D
text: I had an awesome experience at the Hoover location.  The staff is friendly and the food....OMG.... was so delicious!  I tried the Thai chili and garlic parm flavored wings! Did I mention the funnel cake fries?  You have to try them!  I will be back and tell my friends! ❤️

name: Michael Olushoga
text: Waited over 2.5 hours for my order. Food was mediocre.  I even called the place twice.  First call went to voicemail. Second call was put on hold for 10 mins to be told to wait.

Customer service was horrible when the driver finally arrived and the food was cold. I'm a frequent guest of this place, but never again. My advice, stay away! Much better options in the area.

text: I LOVE THIS RESTAURANT!!!!They have so many delicious flavors, my favs( garlic parmesan., sweet samari, and the honey q)these are the best. I also love the deals they have during the weekdays on wensday and Thursday, I go get them for my whole family at a discounted price. I have never had such a great experience with juicy and tasty wings! Definitely going back every week!

text:
Wing Zone took almost an hour and a half to deliver to me, and they got my order wrong (we got a bunch of fries and no wings ¯\_(ツ)_/¯  ), but they were quick to deliver our correct order with even more fries. Please take these fries, there's too many!

Our driver was incredibly kind and understanding when we pointed out the error. She was great even though she was obviously having a rough night, and kept us from getting upset about the error. Customer service done right after a human error.

Bc I WILL be coming back over and over again.

name: B C
text: 3 orders in a row the food took over 45 mins from the time it left the store until it got to my house. That meant my fries were soggy from the steam inside the box, along with being room temperature. The wings were also cold. Finally, they forgot my ranch. I had to call 3 times just to get someone to answer and was promptly placed on hold for 10 minutes. I will eat stale bread and crackers before I order wing zone again. I will walk a mile to the grocery store and cook before I order wing zone again. Stay away! Worst wing place in Birmingham and I've been to all of them.

I just wanted the unwich but she asked me did I want to add a drink, chips, or cookie to my order which I declined. She also asked me was I a rewards member and explained to me the benefits of becoming a rewards member. I had a short wait time while my order was fixed and I like the fact that everyone had on masks and gloves adhering to safety precautions.

resp.text: We are sorry for your experience, that’s not how we roll. Please reach out to our customer service team here: http://bit.ly/JJsFeedback and we’ll share your feedback with the local store’s owner.

text: Wow....other places call them subs. But I can see why jimmy johns are "speciality sandwiches". Tasty . My business staff orders all the time from here....and yes...they are FREAKY FAST.  Those other delivery companies can't hang with JIMMY JOHNS!!!

text: Ordered from them quite a few times now. Their delivery time is very fast, their sandwiches are always prepared as I request. Very good food highly recommend.

text: Honestly I gave a 3 star solely because of the food. It's a good sandwich if you are in a bind and want to be filled with natural cut meats and cheeses but the customer service bites the big one. Everytime I call I get some boo boo Felicia that acts as though I'm inconveniencing her. They interrupt, are rude and really just don't seem to care about you at all. I had to yell to make sure that she didn't hang up on me with her assumption as to my address, phone number or method of pay. Seriously disappointed with this location in Mobile, AL.
